case.state: Does the fact that we share the same name make you want to play with me more, other Robin? Heh, you can call me Nico, if you prefer. It might help us avoid misunderstandings.
It's a pleasure to meet you, my dear namesake. If you'd rather refer to me as Nico, or Nico Robin, I don't mind.
For strip poker, Nami? If you say so... It wouldn't feel right to decline when you're already so excited.
Isn't it Strip Poker, Nami? As long as you're clear on that we can try it. It would be unfortunate for someone to realize that half-way through the game.
Hmmm, was there any mention of a prize? I think I would've noticed something like that. Either way, I'm sure we'll feel like we've been repaid in one way or another.
"Sketchy" sounds like an understatement, Nami. Regardless, I'm quite intrigued by the nature of this place and its participants. A game sounds like a good opportunity to learn more.
I don't think you'd need my protection, Nami, but I'm up for playing a game of... what is it? Strip poker... I see.
Oh, ~player~... How could I forget? Heheh... You and Nami probably have a lot to catch up on.
~Player~, it's a pleasure to see you again. Don't worry, I won't try to get in the way of you and Nami, fufufu...
Strip poker, interesting... That sounds quite self-explanatory.
You want me to play with you? Hopefully you know what you're getting into.
My, my... Strip poker. This should prove to be an interesting experience.
Strip poker... So that's what goes on here. Very well, I'm in.
Nami, look who's here. I'm sure you and ~player~ must have a lot to talk about... among other things.
Ah, there you are, Nami. I'm sure you must be happy to see ~player~ here again, right?
Nami, would you like to play this game with us? Before you say anything, keep in mind it's Strip Poker.
Nami, there you are... Why don't you join us in this game? It might be a good opportunity for you to try something new.
I've been invited to play this game, Nami. Would you like to join us? Before you say anything, I don't believe there's a prize for winning.
Nami... ~Player~, would it be alright if she joins us too? I have a feeling you two will get along quite well once you know each other.
Nami, this is awkward... You caught me right as I was about to start a game of strip poker. Unless you want to join us?
Cagliostro? My, what a surprise. I didn't think we'd be seeing other again so soon.
Hmmm... I doubt schools are offering extra credit for these sort of activity. So are you here just for leisure?
Perhaps it would've been wise for you to change out of your uniform before coming here. Certain schools are very concerned with what their students do in their free time.
If I were you I would've preferred to spend my after school time reading at the library, but it's your choice.
Huh... A ghost. It's interesting to learn that they do in fact exist. But what kind of mysterious process is required to create one?
Hmmm, so ghosts are real. I'm sure Nami and Usopp will be happy to know that. I should tell them later.
It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm curious to learn your story.
I can already tell this is going to be an interesting game, ~player~. You have quite an eye for choosing who to play with.
I see... So this game can't be played with less than three players. That's reasonable.
I'm honored that you picked me before ~name~, ~player~.
I'm looking forward to seeing who else you choose as your opponent.
Don't you think a full table would be more entertaining?
I think I'm beginning to understand what your type is, ~player~.
A full table will surely pose some additional challenges... and distractions.
Better get ready. This game might take a while.
And that's everyone. Unless you'd like to make some changes before you begin, ~player~...
So that's everyone... This should be a fun table.
So, ~player~, is it customary where you're from to not wear anything under your waist? It must be quite a... unique place.
I must say, ~player~, I wasn't expecting anybody to show up to this game already half naked, especially not the bottom half. As you can see I'm quite shocked.
It's somewhat disappointing that your chest is already exposed, ~player~, as I was expecting that to happen during the game.
Don't you think it defeats the purpose of the game to be half naked before it even begins, ~player~? I apologize if it's customary for your people to dress that way.
Nami, I don't think anyone here cares that we're pirates. It seems like a fairly normal occupation in this sort of place.
There's no point in being concerned with that, Nami. If there was anyone truly dangerous nearby they would locate us even before we mentioned who we are.
I doubt you have any cause for worry with me here, Nami. But if it'll make you feel safer I'll try to play along.
Hmmm, it appears to me that there's quite a lot of space here. Especially for someone who can fly...
There's no point in us standing close to each other, is it...? Hmmm, I believe I've heard that high-pitch voice before...
I don't see how that could be an issue even if there were more players here, Nami. But I'm glad that you feel more comfortable this way.
Were you concerned about that, Nami? I never thought you had a problem blurting out important information like that.
Hello there. My, what a small cutie you are. But perhaps you should speak up. I'm not sure ~player~ can hear you.
I'm glad I'm here to keep you in check, Nami. I wouldn't want the others to throw another intervention about your money problem after how the last one went.
Someone is clearly motivated. Just remember that money isn't everything, Nami... for your own good.
Hmmm... {small}Did anyone actually mention a prize? Did you, ~player~? That's what I thought. She must've heard what she wanted to hear again.{!reset}
No men... That's unfortunate. I'm sure this game would be more interesting if there was more variety in the players.
I wish you had invited a man to play the game, ~player~. Don't you think having both men and women at the table would make for a better game experience?
Gentlemen, let's begin. I'm sure you'll find out I'm more than enough woman for you, fufufu...
So I'm the only woman here, huh? You're way in over your head if you think that will make me cower, ~player~.
I find this place quite intriguing. The individuals that gather here seem to come from drastically diverse settings...
I have many questions about the history of this place, but I'll save them for later.
I'm sure we'll have the opportunity to maintain an amicable conversation as we play.
It's always more fun to play these sort of games with people you don't know. Especially ones that look so intriguing...
I'm certain Nami would enjoy this game, although it's possible she'd play it under the misconception that there's a monetary prize for the winner.
If this experience is enjoyable, maybe I'll convince Nami to come along next time. She stresses out too much for her own good.
Perhaps Nami would enjoy playing strip poker too. This isn't the usual way in which she likes to relax, but that might be good for her.
I'm back.
None for me. Thank you.
I think I'll stick with what I have this time.
I'm satisfied with this hand. No swapping for me this round.
I'll take my chances with these cards, thank you very much.
Hmmm, I'm curious to see how things unfold with this hand.
Nuh-uh... This won't do. Give a whole new hand.
I don't have much expectations for this hand. Give me five new cards.
Hmmm, no. I'll need a full new hand this time.
My, how awful... Give me a new hand, please.
Such hideous luck... I'll swap all of these.
I'll be taking ~cards~ this time.
~Cards~, please.
Hmmm, I'm sure ~cards~ will be enough.
~Cards~... That's all I need.
Let's see... ~Cards~, yes, that should work.
Maybe ~cards~ will be enough. Well, we'll see...
~Cards~ cards and a little bit of luck is all I need.
Heheh, I like how ~cards~ sounds.
Give me ~cards~, dear dealer.
Hmmm... ~cards~. I'm going to go with ~cards~.
~Cards~ would be just fine, please.
I'll be taking ~cards~ cards, if you don't mind.
I believed ~cards~ sounds like an appropriate number.
... ~cards~.
I require ~cards~ new cards.
This lake makes for a very idyllic setting. It also seems quite deep... Perfect for disposing of dead bodies.
This view is beautiful. It would be perfect for building a house and settling down. Although I've read many stories on lake monsters... You never know.
And so, the excitement continues...
Mmm, I wonder who'll lose this time...
Whether you rely on luck or skill, I wish you the best this round.
Oh... I wasn't trying particularly hard in this opportunity.
I'm curious to see how you'll react to this...
Hmmmm... Seems like it's not time yet.
Curious... This isn't exactly what I was going for.
I see... If I told you I have a good hand, would you try harder, or would you give up? Remember there's always a chance in this game...
Have you thought about how many games would be better played naked? Heheh...
Even if I win the game at this point, you can take solace in the fact that you saw me fully nude. Not many have had that privilege.
It seems bluffing wouldn't offer more than a minor advantage in this version of poker. That means there's no reason not to relax and enjoy ourselves.
It's all coming back to me... The rules of Poker. It didn't take long, seeing as how it's a fairly simple game.
This is without a doubt a very forgiving game.
I'm interested to see the reward for winning this round.
Before spending time attempting to read our faces, remember that it's pointless.
How lovely...
How interesting. Very interesting...
I don't enjoy playing games and then not putting in at least a bit of effort.
I see... Are you ready?
I wouldn't consider it appropriate to gloat for having good luck, so I won't say anything.
Heh, what are the odds?
No point in delaying this any longer, is there?
Believe it or not, I was once the manager of a casino. Even if that was mainly a secret base for a criminal organization, I did learn a few things.
I was the manager of a casino for a while, so I'm familiar with some of these games. But only poker, blackjack, roulette, craps, baccarat, and around twenty more.
Huh... This is interesting. I'll have to remember what I did this time.
Yes...
Don't worry if your cards don't meet my expectations. That's not what this game is about.
It might be a good idea to temper your expectations this round. It's just a suggestion.
Try to avoid making any mistakes you might regret. For your own good.
I would like to examine this place thoroughly, but finishing the game is my first priority.
Just as I thought... Are you ready?
Isn't this game a little too forgiving at times?
While I have no issue lying, I prefer to do it for important reasons, not while playing games.
Fascinating. It's always a great feeling when taking a high risk is rewarded.
I advice that you think your next move carefully.
Even if I'm not ashamed, I'm not used to being exposed outside. The feeling of the wind on my skin is quite pleasant... All of my skin.
The air outside is quite pleasant to~background.time~, isn't it? This being the first time I've exposed my body outdoors makes this quite a refreshing experience.
This is a lovely lodge. I wouldn't mind spending some more time here after the game, given how cozy it is.
I'm sure my crew would love spending some time in this lodge. Chopper would play around near the tree, while Sanji bakes cookies in the kitchen... It'd still be difficult keeping some of them inside.
There are enough weapons here to arm a small army. But who are they fighting, and for what reason? I'd like to find out the answers before I leave.

I don't recognize that banner... The weapons here are not very modern, yet they seem to have been made recently... And what could be in those books? So many questions I hope to find the answer to later.
If you look out the window you can tell that this city has no issues building tall buildings like this one. That must mean they're not at constant risk of being under attack. That's good.
This city has progressed quite a lot. There's no doubt if they're able to build tall buildings such as this one for the sole purpose of containing these offices.
This lake makes for a very idyllic setting. It also seems quite deep... Perfect for disposing of dead bodies.
This view is beautiful. It would be perfect for building a house and settling down. Although I've read many stories on lake monsters... You never know.
I appreciate the consideration of not staring at my nudity directly, but I assure you it's not necessary. After all I've lost fair and square.
I can't say I understand the sentiment of trying to win at any cost. This game is meant to be solely for fun, isn't it?
My, my...
Being on the brink of defeat always makes things much more... exhilarating.
Heh... I'm truly having much more fun than I expected to get out of this game.
I'm glad that this game has allowed us to talk to each other as we play. Many other games can be distracting.
Don't get distracted now. We've come so far, haven't we?
This is getting exciting, don't you think?
Nothing good ever comes of an easy challenge.

I can't help but find this interesting... Hmmm, I guess you don't know what I'm talking about.
Oh...

Let's see how this unfolds.
Would you like some advice? I believe we're past the competition at this point.
I might win, I might lose... The only certainty is that I'll enjoy the outcome to my heart's content.
I see...
I imagine this game is played by lots of different people. It might be worth it to come back and play another game some other time.
It doesn't seem like we have a lot of control over chance in this game. That's oddly liberating.
Hopefully none of you'll mind if I approach this game casually. I'm sure we'll all have a better time if things are evenly matched.
Are you looking at our faces to see if our expression betrays us? That's cute.
How long do you think it'll be before I experience my first loss?
I wonder how many people leave this place with a smile on their face. More than half? There's only one winner, technically.
Of course...
If any of you needs more time to think, let me know.
Don't fret, remember there's a finite number of potential hands in poker. Although it's almost three million...
Hmm? Are you looking for advice from me, your opponent? That would take guts.
Aren't things usually more fun when the outcome is at least somewhat unpredictable?
Nothing unexpected happened here.
In regular poker, the players can choose whether to show their hands or not. Of course, that wouldn't work here, as we're choosing a loser.
It doesn't seem as if these cards have been shuffled properly, for better or worse.
If I told anyone later that I played strip poker and I only had to take off my sunglasses, they'd find that quite amusing, heehee...
Seeing as how this isn't the easiest hand to beat, perhaps I should be more generous if I happen to lose this round.
I'm looking forward to seeing what you have. You seem very focused, so I'm sure it's good.
I see...
Do you find it interesting that the cards are being dealt by a...? Never mind, we can talk about that later.
Want to see what I have? Now, now, don't get impatient.

Is it strictly necessary to say something at this point in the game? Well, that should be enough anyway.
I don't mind standing here in my panties while you make your choice. Just stay focused.
I consider it refreshing to play a game without lying or manipulation involved. For starters, it wouldn't be much of a challenge.
A reasonable outcome.
Heheh... There's something funny about this hand, but it would take too long to explain it.
These few seconds of anticipation before we find out who loses the round are quite exciting.
Hmm, as expected.
Don't worry about me if I sometimes stay quiet. Usually I prefer to let others talk while I listen.
I'm done on my side, but take your time.
If you want to know what I have, you'll have to rely on your instinct this time.
I believe it's more interesting when the outcome can go either way.
Ah, apologies, ~player~, but I accidentally saw your cards. However, I've already swapped mine, so I can't do anything about it regardless.
If I don't lose soon, I might start losing interest. So do your best.
It's interesting that getting the cards you want isn't even close to being the most satisfying part of this game.
Time to decide whether I should let you see me nude. Hmm...
I'm very interested to learn more about where ~nonhuman~ comes from... Most likely a place with quite a unique culture and history.
If there's one person here I want to learn more about, I'd say it's ~nonhuman~. I can't stop imagining what new information I can learn...
Purple is my favorite color, but this does seem somewhat excessive.
This is a room. It's purple. It doesn't seem as though there's anything else that's remarkable about it.
Half a second. That's how long it takes me to disarm another person without moving. Do you understand what I'm saying, ~weapon_opponent~?
~Weapon_opponent~~, if you insist on pointing that weapon at the other players I'll have no choice but to disarm you. Speed is useless against me, so it would only take an instant.

state.text: You clearly like taking photos, ~camera~. However, I'll have to ask you to be discreet while photographing me, for your own good. There are dangerous people who would like to know my whereabouts.
~Camera~, if you don't mind I'll have to ask you to avoid taking my picture. I don't want to alarm you, but there are people that would harm you to get any photos you take of me.

~Camera~, if you take any pictures of me, I'll have to ask you to delete them later. I don't mean to alarm you but there are very bad people that would do anything to get any information on me, including hurting others.
~Camera~, you can take my picture with your camera if you want. However, I'll have to ask you to delete the photos afterwards. It's for your own sake.

case.state: This alley seems like the sort of place where some horrible crime took place. An interesting location, but probably not the most appropriate one for this sort of game.
A part of me would be very interesting in hearing about what sort of crimes have taken place in this alley. They must be interesting if you chose this location for our game, ~player~.
I have to wonder where all these ghosts came from. Perhaps there was a village that was decimated by a terrible plague, and the bodies were buried near this forest.
From what I know about ghosts, they persist in this world due to unfinished business, often of the vengeful type. That means there's no guarantee that these ghosts won't turn against us.
With the low visibility due to the steam it would be quite easy to be ambushed here... They might even kill us before we even have a chance to react.
These hot springs are perfect for ambushing people. Not only is there low visibility, but also the people in here are expected to be naked and defenseless.
Is that a dead body inside that locker? Hmm, perhaps they're still alive. If that's the case, I'll make sure to correct that once the game is over.
I can't say a locker room is a very exciting place for a game like this. At the very least, it must be easy to clean. Not like it has been, clearly.
This room is pristine. That should be evidence enough that this is a peaceful kingdom. Then again, that doesn't mean that its rulers don't have blood on their hands.
Such a beautiful, clean throne room. It's unfortunate that I've seen kingdoms whose apparent peacefulness disguised a history drawn with blood, so I can't enjoy it in earnest.
I'm not the kind to talk much about myself, but I figure I should say something... My favorite color is violet, I like flowers and my beverage of preference is coffee.

I'm sure seeing me naked will feel much more satisfying if you know me better first. Let's see... For starters, my favorite hobby is reading, my favorite season is autumn, and I'm not fond of absurdity.

state.text: I believe I heard a horrifying scream, like that of someone who has been stabbed to death a hundred times... Or maybe it was just the sound of the waves.
The sound of the ocean is perfect for drowning screams. Which means if someone died a horrible death on a ship, they wouldn't be heard even by someone who's nearby.
It's slippery over there, so watch your step. It would be terrible if you fell and broke your neck, ~player~.
The ~background.surface~ is slippery, so pay attention, ~player~. I've heard of people who have ended up paralyzed for life after slipping and falling the wrong way.

case.state: Huh... It seems I'll have to bare everything, after all.
Are you doing well? If so, I might be cornered here. Oh well...
Huh...
This is... interesting. I didn't really think I'd be put in this position when we started the game.
From the beginning I've been fully aware of what losing entails in this game, and yet... It's impossible to predict what might happen.
It can feel good to be the one on the ropes every so often...
Any of you interested in seeing my breasts may be in luck...
Intriguing...
Hmmm... Should I? Maybe...
Letting fortune decide your fate is not always unpleasant.
My, my...
If you're so invested in seeing me lose, then don't just play. Win.
The only reason why losing doesn't seem unappealing to me is because this experience has been quite fun... And I have you to thank for that, ~player~.
Oh? Could this be it?
Hmmm...
Are there any other games played in this establishment? Such as strip darts, strip checkers, strip chess...
Luck is an interesting thing. Sometimes it brings you fortune, other times you end up inside a pit surrounded by blood-starved creatures.
Oh, well. There's nothing that can be done now.
Let's see how this unfolds. The result might not be what we expect.
Hmm, of course. This had the highest chance...
I'd rather spend less time focusing on these cards, and more on my opponents. So, let's move on.
Uh-huh.
Hmmm... I think I understand what happened this time...

I've been told I have strange reactions to things. My expression probably won't tell you anything about my cards.
If you don't mind, I'll take a look around.
Surely, if I had a bad hand I wouldn't be smiling right now. Unless I didn't care about the outcome, that is.
The sooner you're done, the sooner we can move on to the more interesting part.
Hmmm, I see... I'm ready for whatever the outcome is.
I see...
It would be most unfortunate to discover that this game is rigged in some way.
If this is the way things will go, so be it. I'm curious to see what happens next.
No point in stressing out over a game.
Huh, the designs on these cards... There's nothing interesting about them. Nothing at all.
Even if I'm not trying to win with all my skill, I wonder if I could've done something different this time.
Hmmm... quite a predicament indeed.
Card games are certainly not one of my areas of expertise, even if I rarely lose at them.
Interesting...
My... I've gotten myself into quite a plight, heheh.
Winning was never my goal. Getting to know you and this place is rewarding enough.
Are you feeling nervous, now that victory is within your grasp?
I better enjoy these last few seconds before I have to expose my body... Okay, that should be enough.

state.text: I often wonder what it must feel like to be able to swim with no repercussions... but would it be worth drowning to death? Most likely not.
Swimming certainly seems like it must be quite a fun activity. It's unfortunate for me that drowning is a particularly unpleasant way to die.
It appears like it's quite cold outside. If any of us walked outside, it most likely wouldn't take long before we succumbed to frostbite.
It's fortunate that it's not cold inside this lodge. If we were playing outside we'd possibly die from hypothermia the sooner we lose. That wouldn't be a very fun game.
Considering purple is not very different from red, it's not strange to imagine that a murder could've happened in this room and we simply can't see the bloodstains

Do you think the decoration of this room was intended to hide evidence of a horrible crime, and the only reason they picked purple instead of red is to arouse less suspicion? Or perhaps, they simply like the color purple.
I must wonder how many of these books have weapons hidden inside. It's not something I condone, out of my love of books, but it does happen more often than you think.
Clearly this library isn't very well organized. There are books about crimes and serial killers in the children section. Perhaps a kid with unique interests paid a visit once.
Hmmm... I can't help but wonder if this Birthday cake and this entire set-up is some sort of trap. Perhaps the cake is poisoned. Or maybe...
I wonder why anyone would prepare a Birthday party in such a remote area... Perhaps they intended to lure someone here in order to kill them, and then dispose of their body in that lake.

case.state: While I appreciate the effort in having a library such as this that's open to the public, it seems they require more staff. So many of these books appear to be filled with doodles of profanity.
I'm not sure this library is the ideal place for people to go study. It'd be difficult finding a table without messages carved into it, or a chair without gum stuck to it.

state.text: Isn't it lovely that nobody has been killed in this game yet? That's quite common in games played among strangers. Looks like you might be able to leave unscathed after all, ~player~.
I wonder what's the most common cause of death while playing this game. I'm sure things tend to get heated, depending on the players. But I'm sure a solid percentage is due to overexcitement.

Can you feel your heart beating faster, ~player~? That might mean that you're enjoying this game, but I've also read that your heart rate can increase when your life is in danger, even if you aren't aware. The heart is truly fascinating.
Hmmm... I thought I heard something that sounded like a scream. Assuming there's another group playing this game nearby, someone might've finished. It probably wasn't a horrible murder taking place.

Considering none of us know exactly how we got here or where we are, it'd be inconvenient for us to be unable to return to our worlds. Perhaps we should leave a message here, in case any of us doesn't make it.

If we were to be ambushed and killed in this place, it'd make sense for them to wait until we're done with the game. That way, they won't get any blood on our clothes and the evidence will be easier to eliminate.
Don't sell yourself short, Nami. You're not bad. I'm sure you'll only get better after you have more practice with our mutual friend here, fufufu.
I hope you're not jealous, ~player~. Nami is my friend, and she only has eyes for you... Unless, of course, you were into it.

case.state: Don't feel bad, Nami, you tried your best. I suppose I'm not a very ticklish person. But I'll give you some advice: next time you should try my thighs.

state.text: Already asking for advice? Heheh... You might want to relax your lips a little more next time, Nami.
Don't worry, Nami. Nobody is good at kissing from the get go. I think it's adorable that you're interested in learning about it now. I can give some notes later.

case.state: I see... Isn't she also the woman that was living with Zoro and Dracule Mihawk during our training? It's quite a coincidence meeting her here.
I haven't met her in person, but her voice surely sounds familiar. It seems it's the same one her ghosts have.

Those ghosts... From Thriller Bark, right? It's unexpected meeting you face to face for the first time here.
Why? It's just a slap. You could ask ~player~ to give you some light spanking next time, Nami. You'll see it's not a big deal.
Nami... I must apologize. I thought you'd get a little flustered, but I didn't think a light teasing on your nipples would be enough to almost make you---

state.text: Mmm, I was holding back drastically but it seems you have delicate skin. What matters is that now we can call it even.
I'm sure that was your first spanking, but you should be grateful that I only used a small portion of my strength. Besides, who knows? It might not be your last.

case.state: Why? It's just a slap. Now if you'd asked me to touch my body more thoroughly I might've hesitated a bit.

state.text: I was expecting you to tell a lie about our occupations, such as us being merchants. But this is a pleasant surprise, Nami.
That's right. I'm glad that you feel comfortable enough to not lie about our identities, Nami. I also don't think we have anything to fear here.
Using our identities as pirates to intimidate the other players isn't a terrible idea, I suppose. But I doubt it'll work in this case.
This is the kind of day in which a woman likes to feel young and attractive, Nami. I think this is the perfect way to spend a birthday, if you ask me.

Normally I'd rather forget about my birthday, but playing a game like this makes me feel younger, which might be just what I need. Besides, this should be a fine precursor to the surprise you and the guys have planned for me.
Today is... a special day for me. The kind of day people celebrate, but personally I wouldn't mind ignoring. This game should help me occupy my mind.
Hmmm, I'm sure my crew is going to prepare a special surprise for me when I return to the ship. They're very thoughtful, but I'd prefer not being reminded that I'm a year older from now on.
You were fantastic, Perona. I'm very proud of you. I'm glad I was able to witness you experience this for the first time.
You're a good girl, Perona. I'm pleased that I got to witness a young woman like yourself experience her first orgasm. It was delightful.

case.state: I'm serious, ~player~, if you want to see my behind all you had to do was ask. Wouldn't it be a waste for a woman to undress in front of you, and not show you her whole body?
I almost forgot to show you my backside too, ~player~. Now how does this compare to the curves you like in women?
Here, I'll turn around for you now that I took off all my clothes. I know my body is on the more voluptuous side. I hope that's to your liking, ~player~.

state.text: If you wanted to learn how to dance you could've asked me to help you, Nami. Even if I'm not as talented as Shantae. But I like seeing you work hard to improve regardless.
Why the sudden interest in dancing, Nami? Would you like to give a certain special someone a private dance in the future? I'm sure they'll appreciate it no matter what.
I apologize. I should've included you in the conversation, Perona. But there's always next time.
Were you hoping to participate in our conversation, Perona? I apologize for that. Maybe later we can talk about it all you want.

case.state: Here you go... It's only fair that you get to see my backside too. After all, you've been skilled enough to leave me fully naked.
You've earned the right to look at my whole body, and that includes my back... I hope you enjoy this.
Huh... A ghost. It's interesting to learn that they do in fact exist. But what kind of mysterious process is required to create one?
Hmmm, so ghosts are real. I'm sure Nami and Usopp will be happy to know that. I should tell them later.
Huh, a talking butterfly... I'm looking forward to see how this is explained.
Hello there... talking butterfly.
What I saw back there shook me to my very core. I could describe it, but I think you should all go see it by yourselves when you have the chance. Anyway, let's continue with the game.

...and that's everything I've discovered about what the Inventory is. Did you listen to what I said, ~player~? It seemed as if you were spacing out while I was talking. Perhaps you're simply concentrating on the game. Let's do that.

Whoever attends this library appears to have no respect for literature. One of the books had a piece of gum stuck between its pages, and another was filled with drawings of penises in every page. The drawings weren't even anatomically accurate.

There was something called a "doujinshi" mixed among the books. While I'm not opposed to the existence of erotic fiction, there was something about its crude portrayal of women that irritates me to my core.
This is certainly an interesting collection of books. However, they don't appear to be placed on the bookshelves in any specific order. If we had time after the game, I'd like to take care of that.
Assuming this is a private library, the owner must have an interest in very diverse topics, considering the books that are here. Regardless, I'm glad that they all appear to be well cared for.
You're quite a handsome man, ~player~. I understand why you'd like to play this game. I hope you don't leave disappointed.
So what's a handsome man like you doing in a place like this, ~player~? Heh, I already know... I hope we both enjoy ourselves.
I'm quite happy seeing that such a cute girl has no issues playing a game like this, ~player~. Worst case scenario, now we can keep each other company.
~Player~, you're so cute... Just knowing that you have no problems coming to these sort of games makes me like you. But I hope I get to know you better.
Thank you for inviting me to play this game, ~player~. Even if I'm not your type, I hope we can get along.
I'm sure you have your reasons for inviting me to play this game, even if you don't like women, ~player~. At the very least, I hope we find our own fun.
I appreciate you inviting me to play this game with you, ~player~. You could've chosen a man instead, but you picked me. I'm sure we'll get along.
Even if you don't like women, I hope you won't regret inviting me here, ~player~. I only have a handful of female friends.

state.text: Hmm? Oh, you're a zombie. For a moment I thought you had a certain serious disease for which pale skin is a symptom. This is a relief.

case.state: Cagliostro? My, what a surprise. I didn't think we'd be seeing other again so soon.
A goblin... I've read about them in books, but I had no reason to believe they were real until now. I have to say you're much more lovely than as depicted in the picture.

Nami, I have an idea. Since you're clearly so convinced that you're not going to lose this, how about we make a wager? If I get naked, I have to do whatever you tell me to. if you get naked, you do the same. I'll be sure to make it fun.
Would you care to make this game more interesting, Nami? How about if one of us has to get naked, they have to do one thing the other one tells them. Anything.

state.text: Nami, I know it's not really my business, but while you're both here I think there's something you might want to say to ~player~ about how you feel. After all you don't know when else you might have the chance.
My, my, Nami... I thought you were going to tell him that you like him. But "love"? Heheh... Well, isn't it nice to get that off your chest?
Nami... If you ever want to have some alone time outside of the bath, you could sit on a towel. You've probably thought about it before, but you didn't want me to notice, did you?
Hello.
Good introduction, Nami. Very concise.
I'm sure you'll have more questions after that introduction, so feel free to ask whatever's on your mind.
Exactly what Nami said. It's nice to meet you.
That's right, we didn't introduce ourselves at the beginning.
Well, we made it to the end, Nami, just like you expected. Isn't this nice?
Heheh, now you can finally relax, Nami. We've already won. Now we simply have to settle matters between the two of us.
I see, so your society considers women in their twenties to be at the peak of their life... If I had a baby I'd rather not neglect them, and my current goal keeps me too busy at the moment.
I can give you a haircut later. It'd certainly be a shame if your hair was longer, Nami. You'd no doubt lose some of your charm.
Mmmm, you certainly shouldn't let your hair grow much longer. I have a feeling some of your appeal would be lost, Nami.

case.state: I like how your hair looks right now, but if you want I can give you a haircut later.
I told you before, Nami. You have perfect hair, so it's fine if you want to let it grow longer. But if you'd rather get a haircut I'll help you with that later.

state.text: That's a nice topic of conversation. I'll share my own: My dream is to uncover the true history of the world, specifically what happened during the Void Century.
I'm also interested in hearing if you have any dreams. Nami already knows my own, which is to learn the true history of the world, and the Void Century.
I might as well share my dream, even if you already know it, Nami. I want to find the Rio Poneglyph which contains the true history of the world, and the events of the Void Century.
Good idea, Nami. Even hearing the name of a dangerous place would be helpful, so we don't mention it near Luffy.
Do you ever think maybe we've already visited the most dangerous places in the world, Nami? I doubt that's the case, but we might have a record.
That question might be useful, Nami, but I believe the most dangerous places are the ones nobody can tell you about, because there were no survivors to tell the story.
That's quite the appropriate question for this situation, Nami. I must've told you at one point, but my favorite part of my body are my legs.
Fufufu, I'm sure someone will appreciate that question, Nami. If I had to choose only one part of my body, it'd be my legs.
I'm not surprised that's your preference, Nami. You have every reason to feel that way. For me, it's my legs.
It was clear to me how your ability works once I saw Luffy, Franky and Zoro get affected by it, but it's good to get a proper explanation.
I wonder if the emotional damage that these ghosts inflict accumulates, or if it merely caps at a certain limit. If it's the former you could give people chronic depression.
My answer to this question is simple: Chopper is the cutest. Seeing him happy is enough to warm my heart every time.
I've never met anyone cuter than Chopper. He awakens my motherly instincts just by being close to me. I want nothing more than to see him smile.
I'd say being a living, breathing being is a significant factor when considering cuteness, wouldn't you? How alive would you say that doll of yours is?
I'm very much in disagreement. I won't stay silent if you speak ill of Chopper and how adorable he is. For your information he's a reindeer, not a raccoon. Also, unlike your doll, he's alive.
I'm not starting this debate all over again. Let's simply agree to disagree.
It seems clear to me that we have irreconcilable differences in opinion. We should accept that, before this discussion gets ugly.
You must be quite desperate if you're making those sort of comments, Nami. I've never seen your seductive remarks get that direct.
Nami... I understand you want to win this game, but you shouldn't make remarks like that to strangers. I might not always be nearby to protect you, and not everybody is as harmless as ~player~.
Indeed. I've never met anyone like Luffy. His resolve and the willpower he displays to accomplish his goals and protect those dear to him is nothing short of superhuman.
Heheh, you just had to mention Zoro's lacking sense of direction, didn't you? He's also an incredibly honorable man who'll never compromise on his ideals.
Usopp has certainly come a long way. He's not only far braver now, but also significantly stronger. And no matter how many hardships he faces, I know I can rely on him.
Not to mention that Sanji is one of the strongest members of our crew, even if he's physically unable to hurt women. I respect that he stands by his ideals.

Fufufu... I can picture Chopper blushing while hearing you talk about him like that. But it's truly impressive what a great doctor he is, despite being so young. And I don't think you emphasized just how cute he is, Nami.
I can't disagree. It's true that a lot of times I don't understand Franky's antics, but he's still a wonderful man underneath all his metal enhancements.
Brook's silliness is completely harmless. He can always be relied upon, no matter the situation. And considering what he's been through, it's a miracle he didn't grow bitter.
It's been great finally having Jinbei join our crew. I'm not saying I don't enjoy the antics of our more frenzied crew mates, but I welcome having a more mature presence around.
Heheheh... I like how motivated you're feeling, Nami.
Ah, isn't she cute when she gets all competitive, ~player~?
I'm sure ~player~ doesn't mind. I was very happy when Nami told me, because I could see how happy she was. And I appreciate learning about her taking another step towards becoming a woman.
Heheh, you truly shouldn't mind, ~player~. If it makes you feel better, she was very impressed with your performance. Granted, she doesn't have a lot to compare to, but it still counts for something.
I don't think I was doing a very good job keeping the "secret" myself, heheh. But now it doesn't matter anymore.
Bounty hunters have never been much of an issue for us, have they? It doesn't matter here what bounties we have on our heads.
I'd very curious to learn if there are any undercover members of the Marines or the Government that are sent to games such as this one.
I'd be quite interested in hearing what you have to say. I'm not fascinated by gossip, but I'll accept any new information regardless of how it's provided.
I'll gladly donate. There are few causes I'd rather put my money on. You don't have to look so sad... Still, you're quite adorable when you pout like that, fufu...
I've dabbled into assassination in the past. When it comes naturally to you, and you're willing to do whatever it takes to survive, it's not much of a dilemma.
I can relate. I also feel my maternal instinct overcoming me when I see a cute kid. I certainly would love becoming a mother, or at the very least an aunt.
It's even easier than you think to acquire a Devil Fruit's powers, Cynthia. You only need to take of one bite. However, there's only one type of each fruit in the world.
It would be my pleasure to accompany you, Cynthia. If you don't mind, I would just need to pick up my bag first and I would be ready to go with you.
I have several historical facts I could share, but I would have a hard time determining whether they're "juicy". Sometimes people don't share my same interest for historical data.
On that note, have you ever heard of the name "Joyboy", Cynthia? Most likely not... It's a shot in the dark, but I thought I'd ask anyway.
I believe the most historical moment that had the most impact in my modern world was the establishment of the World Government, 800 years ago. But that's more a fact than an opinion, I must say.

I once read a theory that life was created as an accident when ancient gods where trying to create a permanent supply of booze. It's rumored that the professor who presented that theory used to partake in certain herbs, which makes more sense.

Once I came across an ancient sexual toy for Devil Fruit users. It used a small amount of Sea Prism stone, which normally weakens Devil Fruit users, as stimulation. I can't say it was poorly designed...

There's a small country in the South Blue that was ruled by a tyrant. After he was overthrown, he was placed naked in the center of the capital, and every citizen was allowed to spank him. Once everybody had their share, he was decapitated.

I realize you're joking, but I prefer to act quickly. With my ability I don't need to get close to my target, and I can snap their neck in less than a second. I wouldn't mind giving you a demonstration, if you'd like.
Gravitational manipulation? That sort of technology would seem years ahead of even today where I come from. If it's an ancient civilization there's only one place it could've come from...

This is truly fascinating, Rouge. While the possibility of life outside of my planet is quite high, nothing is known about it. The mere prospect of learning about civilization on other planets peaks my interest.
I suppose dying without accomplishing my goal would be my biggest fear. Unless you mean more material ones... Hmm... I suppose loud explosions bother me.
What would make me a good spouse? If possible, I'd like to be the one doing the choosing, so the question would be what would make them good for me. That said, I'm good at cleaning and listening.
I like to think I'd never fall for that sort of scheme. Besides, the best ones involve destroying innocent people's lives, which is not something I can condone.
Hmm, I suppose using a wish to fulfill my goal would be tempting. However, it wouldn't feel right. A nice cup of coffee would be just fine.
I am physically unable to swim, so you're not alone. Perhaps we can take comfort in the fact that if we fell into the water we'd drown together, and therefore we wouldn't die alone.
I used to conceal my entire identity, but now I don't have any more secrets. At least not from my friends. I would have no issues lying to a stranger for the right reason.
I prefer honesty, but I understand why someone would lie under the right circumstances. If someone told me that they didn't spill their drink I'd pretend I believe them.
I'm not fond of smoking, but it's not something I'd chastise someone over. For instance, if I told the smoker in my crew to stop I'm sure he'd do it, but that'd feel unnecessarily cruel.
Family is very important. However, I think the meaning of a family is whatever you decide, and not simply what you were given.
I take it "dollars" are the currency you're familiar with... If I had a large sum of money I'd save it. It's the smart choice, even if it's not as appealing at times.
Of course not. Everybody makes mistakes, and even the largest ones are not worth condemning someone over.
Heh, I think both options are fair. Personally I prefer to feel with my hands, so I don't mind. Although I think there's great value in seeing your partner's face.
Well, I've never really had a stable relationship, so I can't say I have. But I think commitment is important, even if that compromise involves a more flexible relationship.
I don't think that'd necessarily contradict having a successful relationship. Sex is not about love or even intimacy for everyone, after all.
I don't see why anyone would stop masturbating while in a relationship. You can't always depend on other people to satisfy you, as sad as it sounds.
I don't exactly "watch" porn, but I do have a small collection of erotica books that I keep by my bedside. Not that I need anything to stimulate my imagination, but some are quite good.

My, that's quite a question... I'd rather not say a specific number, as that can depend on a lot of factors. But I do have a good amount of stamina, and I can go for a long time. So as long as someone can keep up with me...
I like to be on top, preferably facing away from him. Feeling him squirming underneath my body while I control the rhythm with mine is one of the greatest pleasures of having sex.

Are you talking about anal sex? I've never tried it, but I would be interested to see what it's like as long as he's fine with it and I have the right toy at hand... Oh, did you mean on me? It depends.
Your friend is very... vivacious. You must like her a lot to keep her around.
What an adorable little creature. I'd love to feed you. If only I had my bag with treats right here.
My, my... Anyone that isn't the big spoon while cuddling with you would clearly be missing out.
I suppose I'd reassure my younger self that things are going to be okay. That's what I would've needed the most.
The place I come from doesn't exist anymore, but I have traveled across the Grand Line for years. If there's one thing to know it's that you never know what to expect, and it can always be dangerous.
I certainly prefer to be the one in control. If I was pushed into a submissive position I'm sure I wouldn't be able to have as much fun. Not that I've ever heard any complaints.
So you're a fellow lover of nature, Sucrose... I love all kinds of flowers, but my favorite would be lilies. I think they're majestic and I always feel soothed when I'm near them.
A girl as cute as you having a bit of a wild side too? Fufufu, how could anyone not like that?
Did nobody teach you that it's not polite to ask a stranger's age? I'm thirty.

case.state: I see... That does sound more interesting. I'd like to hear the details of how a Dread works from someone who can explain them.
Fufufu... You're so adorable that I'd be surprised if people don't want to pet you wherever you go.

state.text: I love hearing you talk about our friends, Nami. But now I have to wonder: What would you say about me? If I wasn't here right now.
It warms my heart listening to you talk about our friends like that, Nami. I wish I could hear what you'd say about me, if I wasn't here to~background.time~.

Nami, you're so humble talking about our friends but not yourself. I can say that Nami is the most amazing navigator I've met. She cares deeply for every single one of her friends, even if she shows it in peculiar ways.

Nami, since you chose to only talk about our friends, I will talk about you. Nami is the best navigator in the world. The only thing she cares about more than maps and treasure are her friends. She's one of the most caring people I've met.
I'm always willing to hear about the travels of those who have visited many different places. I'd be honored if you'd join me sometime, ~adventurer~.
If you have an afternoon free, I'd love to hear about your adventures, ~adventurer~. You never know what you can learn from other people's travels.
I'm very curious to know what kind of places you've visited, ~adventurer~. Maybe you can tell me sometime, perhaps over a cup of coffee.
I'd love to gather with this same group another time, and spend an afternoon having a stimulating conversation without this game getting in the way.
While this is a lovely table, I would be interested in gathering with this same group at a different time and partaking in some intellectual stimulation, as opposed to this other type.
There are certain ancient tribes in the world that pierce parts of their bodies as custom... Although in much stranger places than the nipples, usually.
~Pierced~, I take it you got those piercings of your own accord, and not due to religious beliefs or tribal affiliations.

case.state: You can call me Robin. I'm an archaeologist. I'm interested in getting to know you more as we play.
My name is Robin. Nice to meet you. I'm sure we can have fun playing this game, while we get to know each other little by little.
I'm Robin, by the way. It's a pleasure to meet you.
How rude of me not introducing myself earlier... You can call me Robin. I hope we can have a good time.
Oh, forgive me... I haven't introduced myself properly yet. My name is Robin. Let's make this a fun game for everyone.

state.text: Taking a look at this table, it seems clear that we're from drastically different places. I'm curious to know what you can tell me about your place of origin... Its culture, history, or just whatever comes to mind.

While the purpose of this game is to have fun, that doesn't mean we can't learn from each other. For instance, I'd like to know what you can tell me about the place you come from. Anything about its culture would be interesting to hear.
I would love to hear about the places you come from. I take it they're very different from mine, with their own history and culture. Anything you can tell me would be helpful.

case.state: Just you and me now, huh? Should I go all out? No, just may the best one win, ~person~.
My, I made it to the end... What do you think, ~person~? Should I let you win, or should I try my best? I wonder...
How surprising, that ~person~ would be my final opponent. But I wouldn't want it any other way. Shall we?
This is now between you and me, ~person~. I look forward to seeing what fate has prepared for us.
This has been a fairly long game... That's good. This wouldn't be an interesting game if there was no competition.
Are you tired yet? This game has been going for a while. Perhaps I should start getting serious.
Mmmm, this is the end. How exciting... like staring into the darkness of the abyss, just before taking a leap into it.
Oh, my... I didn't think that making it to the end of the game would be quite as exhilarating. What is it gonna be? I can't wait, fufufu...
Is it just my idea, or has this game become even easier in these recent rounds?
It must be frustrating for you that I'm so close to losing, yet I keep winning...
Hmmm, I suppose winning continuously is not necessarily fun in this game.
I very much doubt you're pleased with my nonstop winning streak. That's not why you invited me after all, isn't it, ~player~?
Perhaps there should be a way of making this game more difficult. I doubt I'm the only one that enjoys a challenge.
I came here expecting this game to pose more of a challenge.
Hmmm, perhaps I've been taking this game too seriously...
I came here to have a good time. There's no reason why I should be trying so hard to win.
I have a strong feeling that I'll regret it later if I win this game... So I'll play with more leniency from now on.
You don't want to go home without seeing me lose, do you, ~player~? I also don't want to win with such ease, so I might as well ease up on my game.
I should probably warn you... Do not be alarmed if you see any limbs sprouting nearby. It's simply my Flower Flower ability.
In case anybody here has a heart condition, I should let you know that this is my ability, the power of the Flower Flower fruit. I'll most likely be using it from time to time.
It's common courtesy to tell you about my ability, isn't it? This is the power of the Flower Flower fruit. It allows me to replicate parts of my body on any surface.

state.text: Are you still tired, ~player~? Heheh... I'd like to hold you in my arms and caress your hair...
You've certainly earned a good rest, ~player~. I want you to know how much I appreciate you behaving so well during your performance.
If you're feeling thirsty you should go get some water, ~player~. It's alright, we can wait for you.
~Player~, I hope you don't feel overcome with negative emotions after you've finished pleasuring yourself. This is a completely natural and beautiful thing, you know?

case.state: Personally, I would've preferred to play a game with more people. But this should still be enjoyable.
Any reason why you only chose two players for this game, ~player~? Perhaps you're shy, heheh...

state.text: I realize that I explained my ability, but not how I got it. I obtained it from eating a Devil Fruit. They're mysterious fruits that grant special abilities at the cost of being unable to swim for the rest of your life.
My apologies, I realize now that most likely you've never heard of Devil Fruits. They're rare fruits that grant special abilities to those that eat them. That's how I acquired mine.
You've never heard about Devil Fruits before, have you? They're fruits that grant abilities to those that eat them. That's how I obtained the ability I showed you earlier.

case.state: Nami, I have a proposal for spicing up the game. How about if either of us loses all her clothes in this game they have to do anything that the other one chooses.

I think having to undress is not enough of a punishment, don't you agree, Nami? So how about if either of us loses all her clothes, then the other one has the right to ask them to do one thing. Anything.

state.text: Nami has a lovely posterior, doesn't she? Tight, yet smooth, and with the right amount of fat. I can't help but notice whenever I give her a massage.
I might be the only person that can confirm that Nami's butt is as pleasing to touch as it is to look at... From when I give her a massage, of course.
Very subtle, Nami. Heheh...
I don't think you're giving ~player~ enough credit, Nami.
I do agree that ~player~ is very cute.
What do you say, ~player~? Would it change your mind if there's one more woman here who wants to see that?
I'm sure it'll be a kiss on the cheek at most, but she purposefully omitted that part.
You're going to count blowing a kiss, aren't you, Nami?
That's not a bad strategy, keeping things vague.
Not bad, Nami. Not bad.
I'm sure someone will be naked soon.
Isn't that the entire point of the game, Nami?
But only a look, I take it...
That... might actually work.

case.state: Hmmm... Upon closer examination, these weapons don't appear to have ever been used. This appears to be a decorative armory room. But for what purpose?

state.text: Whoever is in charge of cleaning up this room has done a perfect job. There isn't even a single blood stain on these weapons. Either that, or they've never been used.

case.state: If nobody minds, I'd like to take a look at the books they have here later.
I'm interested in seeing what kind of books they have in this library... but later. The game comes first.
~Cheater~, just because some of us have easier ways of winning this game, that doesn't mean we have to use them.
~Cheater~, wouldn't you rather enjoy the game and have fun regardless of the outcome than looking for unethical ways to win?
Congratulations, Nami... Ask me anything. No point in holding back.
Well, a bet is a bet. Feel free to ask me any question, Nami. Don't make it an easy one.
I suppose it was my idea, wasn't it? Very well, lay it on me, Nami.
I see the irony, since I came up with the idea. Okay, what's your command, Nami?
Hmmm, you see...
If I had to say, it'd be...
I most likely would not be able to dodge your ghosts. However, I've always been a bit curious about what it feels like... But if you attack me, I assure you I will have no choice but to retaliate.
You ability is quite fascinating to me, but that doesn't mean I'm looking forward to being inflicted by your ghosts. Even if I'm not interested in fighting, I'll certainly hurt you back.
Heheh, I must've missed that. Did you find out what was in the bottle after?
Hmmm, do you think you hit him too hard sometimes? The other day he was talking weird, with slurred speech. I'm worried all your punches might be causing him brain damage.
Do you mean when he caused the soda explosion, or when he threw our laundry in the water?
That's unfortunate. Did you go see Chopper so he could help you with your hand?
Maybe I'm out of practice with card games. That's unfortunate... or it might make the game more exciting.
It has been a long time since I've played Poker. It should take me a minute or two to refresh my memory.
I'm glad to see you're having fun, Nami.
It didn't take you very long to get into the spirit of the game, Nami.
It wouldn't feel right to win this game without losing a few times, Nami. That's the point of it.
I can't say you're wrong, but now I'm curious to know what led you to that conclusion.
Is it so obvious? Or maybe you just know me that well by now, fufufu... I suppose I'll remove my skirt, even though I really like it. Koala picked this skirt for me.
Did you think I was going to remove my skirt, or is that what you want, Nami? Either way, I'll oblige.
Well, it was always possible that it would come to this. I already accepted that from the beginning.
I wasn't counting on the game reaching this point, but it's certainly not outside of the realm of possibilities.
I could choose to be upset over this development, or I could accept that it only makes the game more thrilling when it's challenging. In every possible way.
You don't need to protect me, Nami. There's not much they could say that would offend me.
I could've played while sacrificing some sportsmanship, if you know what I mean. But that wouldn't be very fun now, would it?
It's okay, Nami. I would've never been on board with us playing this game if I thought there was a chance of you being uncomfortable.
Yes, Nami. I lost.
I'm delighted that you're enjoying this, Nami.
No, I'm here simply to have a good time. My crew isn't with me.
If you must know, I came here by myself. My only objective to~background.time~ is to enjoy the game.
Hmmm, I'm afraid not. Rather, I didn't have any expectations whatsoever.
I can't say that I ever thought about you. Not at all.
I stand by what I said. However, I didn't anticipate that'd be enough to make you cry. For that I apologize.
I apologize if my tone was too harsh. You cry very easily. Still, I was being completely honest.
That's right. You've met Nami, haven't you?
Nami didn't come with me. You two have met, right?
Weird? Not at all. But it is somewhat disappointing that ~player~ has already seen me naked. That surely must take some of the excitement away from this game.
It's not weird for me, at the very least. But I'm worried ~player~ is disappointed to be playing with me after he already saw me naked. It's unfortunate for me too.
Heh... You have a bit of a sadistic tendency, Perona. That's interesting...
Will I? I truly don't know. I suppose we'll find out.
Is that your impression? I don't mind people looking. That's what I took my clothes off for, after all.
It wouldn't be fair to cover myself. I'm sure someone would find it disappointing to see me lose only to not be able to see my body clearly.
I'm sure you're right, but I have no problem with that. If a man can't even muster up the courage to talk to me, odds are I would have no interest in him.
I like men who can display at least a minimum amount of courage. If the sight of a taller woman is enough to intimidate them, then they don't matter to me at all.
Do you wish to be taller? If you're still young then it's possible you might still grow a little more, as long as you're well fed.
You're certainly not short and you have good posture, but you might grow a bit taller still. Just make sure to eat properly.
I study a bit of everything, but my main area of interest is the hidden history of 800 years ago surrounding the Void Century.
Heh, the history I have a particular interest in isn't as ancient, but perhaps just as unknown. I want to learn about the Void Century from 800 years ago.
I wouldn't say every crew needs an archaeologist aboard. However, there's plenty about my world that is unknown. Any bit of information can make the difference between life and certain death.
In my experience it's not traditional for a pirate crew to include an archaeologist. But information is of the essence in a world as big as mine, so I like to think it makes a difference.
Apologies. Perhaps you're simply mistaking my patience for indifference. You could say I'm used to dealing with children of all ages, after all.
I know what you're saying. Perhaps it's due to me being surrounded by several people with childish tendencies, but I assure you that I always take them seriously when the situation demands it.
I've had this ability since I was a child. It took a while for me to accept that I'm different from other people, but I've had a lot of time to come to terms with it.
I was very young when I acquired this ability. It was harsh as a young girl to come to terms with the fact that it doesn't make me a monster. Now I see it simply as a part of me.

I would be delighted, Y'shtola. It's been a long time since I've had a chance to participate in an intellectual conversation. However, I think I must warn you that my interests include sensitive information that can be dangerous to know.

It would be my pleasure to have a discussion with a fellow scholar. But it would be reckless of me to share my findings without warning you that very powerful people don't want them to be public knowledge.
My, I'm certainly not a model, heheh. But it's quite flattering to be mistaken for one. I'm a pirate, in fact. And an archaeologist.
A model? Heh, I'm afraid not. But I appreciate the compliment. I assume I don't quite look like most pirates or archaeologists.
Certainly. For people that constantly travel around the world any piece of information can prove invaluable. You can never underestimate the importance of history.
I wholeheartedly agree, Fina. You can never dismiss any piece of historical information as useless. Anything can make the difference between life and death.
Outnumbered? My, don't tell me you're scared? I believe Pit is feeling a bit intimidated by us, Nami.
Heh, I get it. If you have trouble making eye-contact, you can look anywhere you want. I don't mind.
This is nothing new for me. If you don't want to look up at my eyes, then simply look where you feel comfortable. It's not an inconvenience for me.
It would be quite ditzy of me not to notice. I don't see the need to wear a bra with this jacket. Is that so unusual?
Of course. A bra is only meant to support the breasts, so I don't see the point in wearing one when this jacket already offers enough support.
I could grow an extra head, but unfortunately I wouldn't be able to regrow this one if I lost it, as I would be dead. This is of course my theory, and I haven't tested it yet.
Regretfully, if I was decapitated I would die, and therefore I'd be unable to use my ability anymore. This would be different from growing an extra head, which I could do.
While I do spend a lot of time reading, I quite enjoy going out into the field. But that isn't to say I enjoy being on the spotlight. That's how I've lived most of my life.
I'm quite aware that I'm traditionally attractive, but I find it much more comfortable to not be the center of attention. It's a natural instinct that I've cultivated since I was young.
My, you're quite insecure, aren't you? There's more to attractiveness than good looks, in my opinion. I consider intelligence to be quite alluring in others.
I don't see why a girl like you should be envious of me. Besides, appearance isn't everything. I'd consider them secondary to confidence and intelligence.

There was a century of history in my world of which there are no records, except for these stones called Poneglyphs, and I'm one of the only people who can read them. The government doesn't want that information to be known.

800 years ago, there was a void century of history except for what's written in these stones called Poneglyphs. Only I can read them, which made me a target of the World Government, that doesn't want that knowledge to become public.
That's right. Nami is my friend and crew mate, and Ghost girl is... I suppose she's a former enemy. I'm not entirely sure what she is to us now.
You might be surprised about how many different kinds of Devil Fruit abilities there are in my world. Is there any power you'd particularly want to have?
Whatever superpower you want, perhaps there's already a Devil Fruit in my planet that can grant it to you. What would make you happy?

It's not uncommon... However, it's unfortunate that most men that show attraction for me don't truly interest me in the slightest. I'd much rather focus my attention on someone who can keep it for longer than a minute.
It happens, every so often. Perhaps I'm overly selective, but it's a pity that most of them have nothing to offer to me. You can tell that they only focus on the superficial.
Hmmm, I see... Perhaps it's simply your natural instinct. I could, after all, easily crush you with my body alone. It's similar to how a mouse would be scared of a giraffe.

I'm used to people being intimidated by me, but in your case I believe it's perfectly reasonable. After all, if I fell on top of your small body I could easily crush you to death. Be glad that I'm not clumsy.
Is that so? To say that there are few archaeologists where I come from would be an understatement. I hope yours is doing well.
Interesting. Archaeology is basically an archaic profession where I'm from. I'd be very interested to have a conversation with a colleague, assuming they're available.
Not at all. I obtained this power through eating a fruit, just like many others. But I'm very interested to hear about this spirit world... What is it like?
No, I gained my power after eating a fruit. It's the same way many people have obtained abilities where I come from... But this spirit world sounds very interesting. Can you tell me more about it?
My concern is more with historical rather than monetary value. However, you never know what kind of knowledge will be useful. Not just from books, but also from the newspapers.

Only an inept pirate wouldn't be concerned with treasure. However I'm more interested in their history than their value. My service to my crew doesn't come simply from what I read in books, but also in the newspapers.
Heheh, I wouldn't say there's a secret to being confident. Usually I find that there's more important things to worry about than what other people think of my body.
I don't believe there's a secret to feeling confident. Perhaps overthinking can lead you to focus too much on what others think of your appearance.
Hmmm, I don't believe I've ever been asked that before. Last time I checked I believe it was exactly one hundred.
That's an interesting question, mainly because nobody has ever asked that to my face before... If I remember correctly, my bust size was one hundred last I checked.
I can sprout any part of my body, so... yes. I can even create a full copy of my body, although it's challenging to keep it for very long.
I'm sure you're not the only one who has had that question, yet you're the first one who has actually asked me. The short answer is yes. I can also copy my full body, but not for very long.

At the risk of boasting, it's true that my knowledge has helped my crew on occasion. But just as important as knowing which treasure to look for, it's to know which to avoid. There are many traps out there.

I can't deny that my historical knowledge has assisted my crew a few times, although more useful than knowing which treasure to go for it is to know which to avoid. Many set up traps to catch unaware travelers.
Most of the texts I have encountered contained information that wasn't of interest to me, such as descriptions about the location of powerful weapons from ancient times.
The ones I have been fortunate enough to find until now didn't contain what I'm looking for, but merely details about the location of ancient weapons with the power to destroy the world.
My crew is quite dear to me, however I'd rather keep sex separate from the place and the people I spend most of my time with. Surely you understand.
The bond my crew has is quite strong, yet it's more akin to what you'd consider an unlikely family. I wouldn't want to involve them in my sexual needs.

Well, I couldn't really say there's anything I'm shy about, so the order in which I expose my body is irrelevant to me. Besides, doing something unexpected can be quite enticing sometimes, don't you think?
I could've exposed my breasts first, as the choice didn't hold any significant consequences to how I feel. But sometimes acting against what people expect is one way to catch their interest.

I wish I could say I have a secret, but I've always been able to stay calm in extreme situations, perhaps out of necessity. If I do feel as though I'm losing my patience, taking a deep breath always helps.

If I wasn't able to stay calm most of the time, I probably wouldn't have managed to survive this long. I've found that taking a deep breath always helps, but beyond that it might simply be my natural disposition.

My world is certainly out of the ordinary. It has a huge amount of cultural diversity, as every island is mostly isolated. But it's frequent to find giant creatures, people with strange abilities, and bizarre weather everywhere.

I suppose by most standards, my world is quite outlandish. It's composed of countless different islands, each with its own distinct culture and level of progress. If there's one common element to them that's how strange most of them are.
While we do spend most of our time at sea, there are countless islands in my world that are worth exploring. Many of them are no longer inhabited, so historical places are preserved intact.

There's no lack of places that are rich in history in my world. In fact, once we were sailing in the middle of the sea when a two hundred year old ship fell from the sky on top of us. It was filled with historical artifacts.

I'm sure many people want to ask me that very same question once they learn my ability, yet not many dare. The short answer is yes, although there are things that I restrain myself from doing so as to not alarm others.

Heheh, curiosity is one of the most natural human qualities. Yes, I can replicate any part of my body with ease. That doesn't mean I'd be willing to do it and risk terrifying those faint of heart for life.
Very perceptive of you, Leon. I'm in fact a pirate, and also an archaeologist. Who I am is common knowledge in my world, but I wasn't expecting to be figured out so easily here.
If you were from my world, knowing my face and occupation wouldn't be anything special, so I must say your observation skills are impressive. I'm a pirate and an archaeologist, Leon.
Any artifact with historical value is important to me, but if I had to choose one, it'd be books, as they contain more information. Especially finding one in good condition. It satisfies me deeply.

Every type of artifact with an ample history is special to me. However, books are definitely my favorites. It's always a treat to see what they contain, and if they're in decent condition my heart gets filled with joy.
While I might not look it, I'm an archaeologist and a pirate. As I'm always traveling, I dress according to the weather. As you can guess, I came here from a summer island.
It was quite warm in my place of origin before I found myself here. I'm an archaeologist by profession, as well as a pirate.
Heheh, are you perhaps not used to meeting tall women? But when it comes to women, many prefer those with a more petite figure. Myself included.
Being described as imposing is quite flattering, heheh. Personally, I much prefer a woman such as you, with a body small enough for me to easily lift in the air.
My ability is quite useful in combat and espionage. However it has many more applications. Is anything specific on your mind, Sucrose? I'd like to hear you say it.

Long distance combat and espionage are the natural applications of my ability. It has many other uses that would take a long time to list. But if you're curious about anything specific, you can ask me, Sucrose.
I grew up in the island of Ohara, home to a 5000 year old library. The scholars there were my only friends as a kid, so I think it's not happenstance that I took an interest in history.

Growing up I was very much a loner. I'd spend most of my time at the library of Ohara, my native island. The scholars there were my only friends, so that's how I originally became interested in history.
I very much take that as a compliment, Trixie. I think I would enjoy teaching about history. It's unfortunate that spreading knowledge is heavily controlled where I come from.

That's very nice of you, Trixie. Just as I enjoy learning, I believe I would enjoy teaching others about history. But my world would have to reach a point in which the free distribution of knowledge isn't forbidden anymore.
There was a time in which I would've done anything to stay alive, but my service was mainly used as an assassin. Someone with my ability is rarer than an attractive showgirl, after all.

If I didn't have my ability, I might've done that. But in the criminal world a girl who can break someone's neck from a distance is more valuable than a girl who can take her clothes off while dancing.

If I had to explain it, I'd say it's not very different from using my actual body, except my reach is much longer than a normal person's. Once I saw it that way, it became easier to accept what I can do.

I'd say it's more like having a body for which range isn't an issue. But the parts of my body I sprout are still very much my body. If I can reach what others can't, then there's no reason not to do it.
That's right, it seems you remember. As an archaeologist, I'm mostly interested in history, yet all knowledge is precious to me.
Precisely, Cagliostro. Unearthing the hidden history of my world is my goal as an archaeologist, yet learning about any sort of subject is priceless to me.

While I can't disagree with you, Cagliostro, I can't say that intelligence is everything. My crewmates possess a fortitude of spirit that I've seldom seen in my life. That's a quality worth admiring just as much.

It's true that at times they can be... thick. But they have other qualities that are more important than intelligence, such as the willpower to overcome insurmountable odds. It's something I rarely, if ever, see.
Indeed. That's the same sentiment that my mentors imparted onto me, which I still carry to this day.
Well said. That's precisely the reason why I consider the study and conservation of history to be such an important task.

Is that so? It's unfortunate that us dominant types are incompatible with each other. I take pleasure in being with a well behaved boy or girl who knows their place. Do you know anybody like that, Revy?

It doesn't please me to hear that there are many women like me. I'm sure we all want the same: someone who lets us take control of them, and can only moan without complaining. Now where could I find someone like that?
Perhaps you're right, Aaravi. That's why I can also help during combat. Despite being an archaeologist, the years I worked as an assassin haven't been wasted.
It's true, not every group of adventurers would benefit from an archaeologist. It's fortunate that I can also provide my combat abilities and my experience as an assassin.

It's difficult to question the naming of Devil Fruits, as their origin is unknown. But I presume the name of mine is due to the fact that the limbs "bloom", the same as flowers. And it sounds better than any alternative.

I quite like flowers, so I've never questioned its name. As you can see, the body parts I create almost appear as if blooming, which I believe to be the reason for the name. I doubt there's a better name for it.
I can use my ability to create a giant version of myself, but this is my actual body. Could it be that women don't grow as tall as me in your world? It would make sense.

No, this is my real body. While I can create a giant version of myself, I only do that in battle. Am I unnaturally tall in your experience? So you might come from a world in which women don't grow past a certain height...
Hmmm, interesting... Could it have been the voice of someone who suffered a horrible death in your room, and was haunting it?
Oh, a story about a mystery... My first thought in that situation would be that someone died horribly in my room, and was now returning as a vengeful spirit full of regrets.
Oh? What makes you say that, Nami?
Do you think so, Nami?
That's true. I've seen you deal with perverts swiftly and effectively, Nami. That's why I don't see the need in getting involved.
Heheh, I think you have enough energy to handle any perverts, Nami. You don't need me getting in the way.
Are you concerned about the guys in our crew finding out that we played strip poker? I suppose that'd be annoying.
What's on your mind, Nami? If the guys in our crew discover that we lost a strip poker game it would be a little annoying, but...
Heeheeh, you know me too well, Nami.
Am I that obvious? I assure you I won't let the books distract me from the game.
Heheh. I'm sure I get mad every now and then. Perhaps you simply don't notice, Nami.
I might have a good deal of experience controlling my emotions, but that doesn't mean I don't get angry at times, Nami.

Long ago, among some hidden ruins, I found a very unique treasure: a penis made of diamonds. Apparently a certain rich man was ashamed of the size of his member, and he would wear that artifact while making love to his wife.
