I once found the ruins of a fallen kingdom, and kept hidden was a crown that had a mechanism that would cause spikes to pierce into the head of whoever wore it. Turns out it was a torture device used by a very cruel king.
That's unfortunate, Trixie. I was looking forward to having those lovely red eyes on me all the time. What if I take off my panties instead? Will you look?
And here I wanted to have your eyes go all through my body, Trixie. Perhaps we can reach a compromise, and I can remove my panties first. Would you watch then?
I don't believe I've been very shy about how much I'm enjoying this, Revy. My heart is beating quite fast already.
Aren't I blushing ever so slightly? I wholeheartedly believe that not losing all my clothes would've been a disappointment. And I don't mean solely from your perspective, Revy.
I take it that means that people don't have an interest in learning about your world where you come from, Aloy?
Being curious about the world is natural for humans, and yet some people would rather the past remained a mystery. Do you know people like that, Aloy?
You honor me, Prince Miko. I'm sure there's a lot I could learn from you. In what area would you take me as your student?
I'm humbled by your generosity, Prince Miko. The learning process lasts all your life, so anything you'd like to teach me I will heed to graciously.
Are you talking about their genitals, Nagatoro? Indeed, they're proportional to their bodies. It'd be quite bizarre if that was the only small part of their bodies, after all.
Do you mean if their genitals are also giant, Nagatoro? I've never confirmed it with my own eyes, but it's a fact that they're proportional to their bodies. The alternative would be quite shocking.

In my case, I have two stories seeing as how I'm both an archaeologist and a pirate. I was born in the capital of archaeology, and growing up I'd spend most of my time with the scholars. So I suppose it was meant to be.

I have two occupations, so also two stories... When I was very young they put a bounty on my head, and I became wanted. I found that the easiest way to survive was to work with criminals. That's how I eventually became a pirate.

When I was young I was branded a criminal, and given the epithet "Devil Child". It wasn't a name I was fond of for a long time, as it made it nigh impossible to form long term relationships. But with time I grew to embrace it, and make it my own.

I became a wanted criminal when I was 8 years old, and people called me the "Devil's Child". Needless to say, I was hated and feared by people, so I wasn't fond of that name. But now I see it as a part of me that I've come to accept.

The limitations of my ability in scope extend as much as my current stamina allows it. As for your second question, I can indeed create a full copy of my body, but maintaining it drains my energy much quicker.
There isn't a hard limit as to how many parts of my body I can produce. It depends on my stamina. Likewise, I can produce a full copy of my body, although it's quite exhausting.

Heheh, I actually enjoy being taller than other people. And I like boys who are tall as well, so I wouldn't say that's a concern. But even if that wasn't the case, I think you can find the charm in looking down at your loved one.

It has never bothered me being tall. In fact I enjoy towering over people, including those I fancy. Although I do prefer men who are as tall as me. But isn't there also a sense of delight in seeing a boy look up at you?
Hmmm... What a sorry display this has been for me.
Unbelievable...
Heeheeh... I'm losing quite a lot, aren't I? What am I going to do...?
Apologies. Clearly I'm a bit rusty.
Oh, it's impressive that you managed to make me lose with this hand. That's not easy task. You clearly know what you're doing.
Huh, I wasn't expecting to lose this time. Consider me impressed.
Heheh, I haven't even said my name and I already have to undress. My name is Robin, nice to meet you.
You're not playing around, huh? Making me lose even before I have introduced myself. You can call me Robin.
I see... This game might be more interesting than I expected if I'm losing the first round. But I like a challenge.
Heeheeh... I don't consider it funny that I'm the first one to lose. In fact I'm relieved that this might be more difficult than I anticipated.
Heh, "It's about time she lost"... Is that what you're thinking? Oh well...
Alright, then... This wouldn't be very interesting if I go even longer without losing, don't you agree?
It's finally my turn, huh? Not a problem. I'm sure this will be more fun for everyone.
I see... Looks like you're not here just to play around.
Would you look at that? I lost. There's always a first time for everything, isn't there?
Alright, it's my turn now. Let's see if I understood this correctly...
Oh, it's my turn... Fair enough.
Hmmm... Yes, this checks out. I lose this round.
Makes sense. I could've done better this time.
Heheh, it's my loss.
Oh my, I lost again. As you can see I'm not wearing a lot, so this is quite a predicament.
Hmmm, if this continues I'll be backed into a corner. Interesting...
A game without risks is no fun, so you can understand how excited I am that things have gotten to this point.
You might think I'd play better the more I lose, but there's only so much I can do in this game with skill alone.
Hmmm...
I see... So it's finally time to expose my body. How are you feeling? Are you intrigued?
It would've been a disappointment to go through this game without some actual stripping.
Hmmm... Now for the first time I'm faced with an important decision.
I should congratulate you. By now it's clear that you're quite good at this game.
My... In the end I have to get fully nude in this strip poker game. Not quite an unexpected turn of events.
So I ended up losing all my clothes. This shouldn't surprise me, given the nature of the game, but I did try to avoid this outcome... within reason.
Hmmm... Perhaps this should bother me, but I'm partially intrigued to hear what you have to say about my naked body.
Ah... This means you won't be leaving here with any questions about what my body looks like. Good for you.
Makes sense that a pair wouldn't be enough to win. Statistically, it's the second most common hand.
Uh-huh, I only had a pair this time. Did you know that on a standard deck there's a 42% chance to get exactly a pair? Of course, that chance increases with swapping by...
Enough...!
That's enough! Both of you!

I do believe the anticipation is sometimes the best part, Rouge. I'm sure many would be pleased to see everything on display as soon as possible, but the point isn't to get their attention, but to keep it.
Fufufu, but isn't the waiting simply delightful, Rouge? The look of anticipation in their eyes before they see what you want to show them is so much more enjoyable when it lasts longer.
I'm positive accessories are considered fair game in strip poker games. This one shouldn't be any different.
Accessories usually count as items one can remove in this game. Otherwise they wouldn't last very long, would they?
Are you asking me if I've played Strip Poker before? Does that seem like something I'd enjoy, Nami?
Do you mean Strip Poker, Nami? Is that what you think I used to do with my free time? My, my...

"History of the Shishino Kingdom". It's a very interesting read, being the only recollection of the history of that kingdom that doesn't skip over the rebellion of... Well, we can talk about it later.
"A Long War". It's a very comprehensive history of the origins of the war between the Longarm Tribe and the Longleg Tribe 1000 years ago. It still skips over some details though.
That was this exact same pair. He asked me to lend them to him. Something about wanting to look "manly and cool".
It was this very same pair that I lent to him. If I remember correctly he mentioned something about trying to look more manly, like Franky.
Nami, are you... jealous? That's very unlike you. I don't think I've mentioned Koala at all recently.
Is that so? I can't even remember the last time I mentioned Koala to you. Don't tell me you're jealous of her, Nami?
That's true... Do you think I should get a tattoo, or something?
I can say the same about you. Maybe I should get a tattoo. What do you think?
Mmm...? What for?
What are you thanking me for?
I don't think that's true... Having food on my face after eating would be quite embarrassing, for example.
There are certainly some situations that would make me feel embarrassed, such as if I spilled my coffee on my clothes...
That's amusing. Did you think I'd changed so much during the two years we didn't see each other that I'd developed a taste for not wearing underwear?
Heh, how curious. I never thought my skirt would give people that idea. You must've thought I'd found some new interests since we last saw each other.
My, it would be quite a predicament if my clones were fully nude. Especially considering I use them to fight in very close quarters.
If my clones were fully nude that would certainly complicate things, don't you think?
Hmmm, that reminds me of when I wore your clothes. Remember, Nami? Back when I first got on the ship and I didn't have my own set of clothes.
Heh, do you remember when I first joined the crew and I wore your clothes until I was able to buy my own? They were the only women's clothes around, after all.
Are you saying you want to try new naked experiences, Nami? I've read of certain nudist beaches in the Grand Line, in case you'd want to go to one together.
Don't tell me you're getting curious about where else we can be naked, Nami. Maybe you'd like to try sunbathing on the deck of the Sunny without wearing a swimsuit next time.
I didn't know that. Perhaps it would be unusual for some people to see dismembered limbs everywhere when they're not used to it. But you're not scared of me now, are you?
I wasn't aware that you felt that way about my ability. You could've told me, but I suppose I wasn't as easily approachable back then.
It's not that I didn't think it was annoying, but Chopper looked so excited to see what Franky was building that I didn't want to interrupt. What was he making in the end?
I considered saying something, but Chopper was jumping with excitement in a way he only does when he looks forward to Franky's inventions. But I'm afraid I didn't see what he was building in the end.
Seriously? That's your question? That sounds like something a schoolgirl would ask her friend in a sleepover.
Is that really your question? I was expecting something a little more adult. That's something a teenage girl would ask her friend to tease her.
My favorite sex position? It's reverse cowgirl.
That's an easy question. It's reverse cowgirl.
That's interesting. I don't believe anyone forced you to come here, am I wrong?
Didn't you come here out of your own volition too? I don't see why your situation would be any different to mine.

I wouldn't say I know you, but I get what kind of person you are. You make fun of others to feel better about yourself, you put up an aura of self-importance even though you're very insecure and lonely... Should I keep going?

I think I understand what you're like. You're a very lonely person, yet you're too insecure to admit it, so you act as if you were doing a favor to others by being in their presence. Is that accurate?
I know what is like to feel lonely. But if you antagonize people, all you're going to do is perpetuate that. There's nothing stopping you from being honest.
I also felt lonely for a long time, and all I did was distrust others. Most times it was with good reason, but if you aren't willing to give people a chance, then you'll be alone forever.
Hmmm, that does sound like her.
I see...
I wouldn't say that. The best part of this game is the anticipation. You must've felt some of that the first you played with ~player~, right?
I can't say I agree. Do you remember what it felt like your first time playing with ~player~, Nami? Did you feel something when he was looking at you take off your clothes?
Well, that's easy to answer, but I'm not sure you'll like it... I fantasize about you and ~player~ having sex while I watch.
That's it...? Alright, let me remove this first...
Heh, very well... If that's what you want to try, come over here. But I assure you, it won't be any different from how it always goes.
I believe I explained this already. Perhaps you were spacing out at the time.
No, this is my ability. I explained it earlier. I appreciate your concern regardless.
Oh? I wasn't aware that not wearing a bra is so special. Why is that, Perona?
Does it now? Please, Perona. Explain to us why it makes sense for me not to wear a bra.
You could say that. I used to stop at nothing for the sake of my research. I even joined several criminal organizations if it meant I'd get closer to my goal.

I have no interest in stealing from innocent people. I suppose there could be a scenario in which I'd like to reclaim a historical artifact if it was in the wrong hands, but I'd like to avoid violence if possible.

Do you perhaps wish to be taller for the sake of your girlfriend? While I might seem tall to you, where I'm from there are people who are twice as tall as both of us, and they're not even considered giants. Basically, it's all about perspective.

Have you by any chance heard of a rack? It was commonly used as a torture device, but in some cases it was also utilized as a device to grow taller. There's no evidence that it works, but if you're desperate...
It's the same everywhere. My entire life I've fought against people that want to keep destroy the past. The damage they've done to history is far worse than the passing of time.
I'm not surprised. What few records there are of the past have often been hidden, manipulated or destroyed. The true enemy of history is not time, but people.

I don't think age is the most important factor. I'm not the oldest one in my crew, and some of my elders often join the silliness. Even I find myself wanting to feel like a kid again sometimes. What about you?
Age doesn't always equal maturity. One of my crew mates is over 80 years old, yet he behaves like a child most of the time. But I can relate to that feeling of recovering your childhood, don't you?

The fact that I grew up without my mother around, and I spent most time alone didn't help. I don't think most kids know how their actions have consequences. Still, while I didn't have a happy childhood I'm not bitter about those times.

Kids do not partake in bullying out of rationality. Whether they did it because they saw me as a pariah, or if that was a consequence of their teasing is a mystery. Regardless, I don't resent those times.

Hmm, I don't believe I've ever heard anyone comment on the way I dress. Most are perhaps intimidated by my presence. If I chose this outfit myself, then it has to be something I'd be comfortable wearing.
I don't see how my outfit could make me feel flustered. I chose it, after all. But I never hear people comment on the way I dress. Perhaps they think I won't take it the right way.
I understand. Wanting to experiment is a natural sign of curiosity, which is quite a valuable trait in my field. How else can we discover our limitations?
I can relate quite well to being curious about something. I enjoy experimenting myself, even when I have a small inclination that something might yield an interesting result.
Well, if you're that interested in having intercourse, then you need to compromise on your attitude. Otherwise you'll have to settle to have fun by yourself.
Ah, if you have such deep carnal needs then you should present yourself as a more viable sexual partner. That is, if you're not able to satisfy yourself.
So you say, but I can't help but feel that... U-Uh...
Is that so? Well, perhaps... Hggh...
It seems we're very different people. While I've never had a particular interest in people admiring my looks, I tried my hardest to conceal my vulnerability. It's a habit I still have to this day.
You want people to see how vulnerable you are? I always worked hard to hide that from others. It's a habit that is difficult to break away from.

My main goal is to uncover the history that the World Government has tried to erase. Particularly from 800 years ago there's a century of which we know virtually nothing except for what's contained in these stones that have stood the test of time.

In broad terms, there's a century of history 800 years ago that has been erased from official records. My interest is to uncover what truly happened then, and the only information is kept in stones that are hidden around the world.
So far most of the information I've uncovered pertains to these all-powerful weapons from ancient times. That's not what I'm interested in, but at least I know I'm on the right track.
I've been unsuccessful in finding what I'm looking for so far. The stones I've found contained information about these ancient weapons, which is not knowledge I want. But I know I'm close.

While I certainly find great pleasure in talking about my work, I don't think it'd be important for a partner to be interested in it. But they should at least be capable of forming a smart thought, and behave like an adult.

Hmm, I wouldn't consider it a requirement for a sexual partner to share my interests. However, they should certainly have a moderate degree of intelligence and maturity that wouldn't make me feel unstimulated.
Well, there you go. Leadership skills are also quite an attractive quality in a woman. I couldn't tell you how many people I've met that enjoy being told what to do.
Maybe "insecure" is an understatement. But if you're a good leader, then you must be able to gather admirers galore. A strong woman who can give orders is her own category of attractiveness.

There's a number of Devil Fruit abilities that allow you to fly, such as the ability to transform into a type of bird. I once fought a man that could transform into a falcon... but I'm not sure if you know what a bird is.
There's no shortage of Devil Fruits that grant you the power of flight. I once met a falcon man... Oh, I'm sorry. A falcon is a type of bird... And a bird is-...
Ah, that's unfortunate. Although I can't say I wouldn't have done the same if the answers I'm looking for were there. Dying in a library is not the worst way to go for an archaeologist.
I'm sorry to hear that. However, any archaeologist would be in their element surrounded by books, so perhaps his last moments weren't as tragic as it sounds.
Is that so? Are you sure your friend doesn't simply have a hyperactive imagination? If one of mine told me that he sees spirits I've never seen, I'd be at least sightly concerned.
Hmm, that's interesting. But if you've never seen proof of these spirits yourself, how do you know that they don't simply live in your friend's imagination? Not that I want to doubt him.
In theory yes, but since I'd be splitting my concentration I likely wouldn't do as good of a job. Same with my sensations, so the sex wouldn't necessarily be better for anyone.

On my part the intensity would be split by half, as I can't feel the same thing twice at the same time. And I wouldn't be able to focus entirely in two bodies, so I can't guarantee that it'd be a better sexual experience overall.
Somebody tried to smother you with their body? You poor thing. I hope you didn't break anything.
Who would be cruel enough to sit on a sweet little thing like you? Even as an accident...
I believe so, yes. Most of my early life I've spent on the run, trying to stay alive. So I can certainly say that I wasn't very concerned with any personal reservations regarding my appearance.

Hmm, I've read on some tactics for dealing with embarrassing situations. A classic one is lightening the mood by making a joke, although I can't say that works from my experience. People seem to be put off by my comical observations.
How interesting, Sucrose. One of my main concerns upon making any archaeological discovery is the preservation of them. If I had any material that could aid me in that regard, that'd be invaluable.
Fascinating. Despite being an archaeologist, all science interests me. I certainly wouldn't be opposed to using any sort of research that allows me to preserve my findings.

Oh, you misunderstand, Rouge. While I do warn my crew against any potential traps, my words fall on deaf ears. My crew is very curious, so my role often becomes defusing the danger rather than avoiding it.
Unfortunately, I can't say we've ever left any traps untriggered. Warning my crew against danger serves no purpose other than fuel their interest, for better or worse.
It saddens me to hear that. In my world, the destruction of libraries and knowledge in general has been perpetrated for centuries. I think I'd take solace in knowing that other worlds are different.
The preservation of knowledge is sparse where I come from, especially when there are those that aim to destroy it permanently. I wish other worlds were different.
Indeed. The destruction of such weapons of mass destruction would no doubt benefit the world, but it's a fool's errand. The only thing people fear more than a weapon is not owning one themselves.
As unfortunate as it is, that will never change. The temptation of owning such a powerful weapon far surpasses the fear that its existence inflicts on people.
I'd only choose a lover that doesn't see sex as a competition. Whether they're a man or a woman, if they don't have any problem with me taking a more dominant role, we might be off to a good start.
My first requirement for any sexual partner is that they don't think of sex as an expression of power. There are many people that don't want to be intimate with a woman who likes to take charge.
I'm mostly concerned with the history that the government tries to keep hidden. It's not exactly something that can be found at the library.
What I'm looking for is the parts of history that has been erased and concealed by the government of my world. Any means by which I might uncover it are far from conventional.
Well, they say size isn't everything. And even if it was, ninety-three is still... respectable. Now if you're willing to put on a bit of weight, that might help your chest grow.
When it comes to breasts, there are more important qualities than size. But if it truly bothers you, then putting on some weight might help you in that area.

state.text: All knowledge is precious to a scholar, so I don't discriminate on what I find. However, what interests me the most are these indestructible stones called Poneglyphs that contain knowledge from centuries ago.

case.state: There's a sea above the clouds in my world. That ship sailed to a sky island on that sea, but through unknown circumstances they were sentenced to die adrift on a cloud. Centuries later, what remained of it fell from the sky. At least that's my theory.

Indeed. As you can see, there's no delay in the appearance of my limbs, so I can chokehold anyone in less than a second. Not to mention that I can also create eyes and ears anywhere, which is very useful for gathering intel.

It has many uses. It doesn't even take me a second to incapacitate anyone in my field of vision, but even outside of combat I can create eyes and ears to gather information without putting myself at risk.
That resembles what it feels like to me. It's a skill that requires concentration, but with enough practice it becomes second nature, like moving your own body.
That sounds quite familiar. It took me many years of practice to reach this control over my ability, but now it's as natural as moving my own body. I barely have to focus anymore.
I'm sure you can, while leaving large scale destruction in your wake. I can break the spine of ten people without lifting a finger, and leaving no bloodstains or collapsed buildings behind.

Surely you know that in the assassination business, someone who is silent is more valuable than someone who is deadly. Guns and explosives, while effective, can't compare to the efficiency with which I can operate with my ability.
Most likely a prank, I presume. Was the head bloody? I've always wondered if the state of decomposition varies between zombies.
Hmmm, not only a zombie, but quite a prankster, apparently. Was there any blood in addition to the head? I've never seen zombies bleed, personally.
Sometimes it can be difficult to put the right amount of effort to keep the game going and everybody having fun.
I thought you wanted to win. Besides, unlike you I don't have many reservations about others seeing my body exposed.
Who knows? If I'm in a generous mood, perhaps I'll let them enjoy the show. It takes guts to peep on someone like me, after all.
I guess it'd depend on how I'm feeling at the moment. Perhaps I'd reward their entrepreneur spirit by letting them enjoy the sight of my naked body.
I see... I believe there's precedent for bounties being placed on streakers, so I can't say it's impossible.
Hmm, you have a point. I read a story about a woman from the South Blue who became wanted after streaking during a World Government event.
Well, I take quite literally the saying "don't judge a book by its cover". Even if a work doesn't seem to be to my liking at first glance, I won't know until I turn the last page.
While I wouldn't say there's a general type of book I'd dismiss, every so often I've found some that were merely trying to push an ideology that I don't agree with. So that'd be my answer.
Hmm... I seem to recall one time in which Luffy spilled juice over one of the books I was reading. However, I wouldn't say it made me angry as much as it disappointed me.
Hmm... Yes, I can't think of any time I've ever been even annoyed at Chopper. How could I, after all?
Do you remember when Franky was inside Chopper's body and making those crass faces? I'm ashamed of myself for saying this, but I was very close to taking drastic measures.
I often feel exasperated when I hear Brook's recurring puns. But I know that responding to them with silence is better than humoring them with an actual response.

I can't remember a single instance in which I was angry at you... But since you're asking, I do recall once you woke me up from a very nice dream in the middle of the night when you screamed because you thought you saw a ghost.
Zoro once implied that I was old. I'm not entirely sure I ever forgave him for that.

When I first met Usopp, I overheard him telling Chopper about how he once met a race of people with heads shaped like cubes. I didn't truly take his word, but as a scholar it's not good to dismiss anything you hear.
Jinbei is quite mature and well-behaved. I don't see how I could get mad at him. Although you sure gave him a scolding last week.
We both know how obnoxious he can be with his constant grovelling. When I want him to leave me alone, I simply ask him to do something for me that'll keep him busy for a while.
Fufufu, that's a lovely way of putting it. You can stare at the flowers all you want, Sucrose.
What an adorable analogy. I'll say that you can look at my garden all you want, Sucrose.
Certainly. Although I'm curious by nature, I would never violate someone else's privacy without a good reason. But it would be substantially easy.
That's correct. If I had voyeuristic inclinations, my ability would be perfect. But I wouldn't want to spy on someone unless I had to.
I was thinking more along the lines of rulers participating in the murder of thousands of people, but I suppose that's a decent example. Either way, censorship is the enemy of education.
That's a decent example. Be it such embarrassing incidents or current governments raising to power through the eradication of innocent people, there are always matters that they want to keep hidden.
If you're so eager to see my breasts, should I reward you even though you've been quite rude the entire game? I think not.
It's in my nature not to reward those that don't behave properly. If you'd like to see my breasts, you'll have to hope that I lose again.
Thank you. However I wouldn't say I'm dedicated to violence. Whenever I have to resort to it, I try to put an end to the conflict swiftly and without causing unwanted destruction.
I'm certainly dedicated to one of those things. But I try not to indulge in violence if possible. That's why I prefer to go for the kill rather than cause too much pain and destruction.
Yes... You didn't have to say them out loud. While I'm more concerned with practicality than presentation, I do try to use my powers with a certain level of grace and dignity.
Those are the sort of descriptions I try to avoid evoking when I use my ability. That's why I put a certain effort in keeping my elegance when I fight, even if the practical side is more important.

My height might be above average where I come from, but there's much more fluctuation in stature than you might think. There are humans who are five meters tall, and they're still not even close to the giants.
I suppose I'm taller than most women my age in my world, but it doesn't feel very special when there are also humans who are five meters tall. And they're still a fraction as tall as actual giants.
Yes, diamond is not the most practical material for a fake penis. But perhaps the opulence was a turn on for that royal couple.

When I found it, the spikes had fallen off from rust, probably from the blood. Apparently, there was an attempt to overthrow this king. He used the device as a way of punishing those that tried to take the real crown from him.
In your experience perhaps. But increasing sexual excitement does not always mean going bigger, but deeper. An intimate situation such as this can do much more than being at the center of an orgy.

Is that what you do during the weekend, Revy? I find myself much more aroused by situations that stimulate me intimately rather than physically, such as people using their eyes and words to show their interest instead of their genitals.

Precisely. I'm sure a group composed only of the most brilliant scientific minds would still reach a dead end if there's nobody willing to try something a little different, however dumb it might seem.
That's right. If my crew had only people like me and we encountered a wall I'm sure we'd spend a long time examining it, unless someone comes along and decides to break... possibly using their head.
That's an interesting question. My presumption is that they would have to find other ways to share their love. But also it's a strange world, so I wouldn't be shocked if they find other options.

I would like to know that as well, and if I ever meet someone in that position I'll surely ask them. Obviously, regular sex would be out of the question. But in a world like mine, you never know what people will come up with.
Who would put a joke inside a bottle and throw it in the sea? It's possible that it contained a hidden message. Do you still have it?
Hmm, that has piqued my curiosity. Do you remember what the joke was, Nami?
Hmm, would you've felt bad for punching Luffy if it turned out to be a treasure map?
Maybe it's for the best that it got lost. Even if it was something significant, like a letter, there's no guarantee that it would lead us to anything good.
That's true. Making Luffy go to bed without eating would be akin to slaughtering a pig in front of other pigs.
I have no doubt that would be a worse punishment. Not only that, but we can't risk having our captain spend most of the time with low energy and barely moving.
It was the two days ago, after dinner. He was talking strange and not pronouncing his words properly all night. I could barely understand what he was saying.
Don't worry about it, I'm sure it was nothing serious. It's sweet to see how you care about him when things get serious, despite how violent your interactions can get sometimes.
Don't worry about it, I took care of it. I saw the basket full of clothes falling over board and I managed to grab it in time.
It wasn't as serious as it sounds. He knocked over the basket full of clothes, but I was able to grab it before it fell in the water.
That's right. Our poor doctor is the one who truly suffers. Luffy, on the other hand, is up and running around again not five minutes after you beat him.
In that case maybe you could give Luffy an easier time next time so Chopper has less work. It's still a mystery to me how you can even damage Luffy, but at least it doesn't seem to stick.

Of course, I often ponder what swimming must feel like. As I've had my Devil Fruit since I was a child, it's not something I ever remember doing. But every fiber of my being reminds me that I'd drown if I tried.

I do indeed wonder what it must be like to swim. If I ate my Devil Fruit at a later age I might've tried it once, but that wasn't the case. However, I'd have to overcome my survival instinct that warns me not to go in the water.
Quite so. The knowledge you hold must be comparable to the biggest libraries in the world. I presume you've written a few books yourself, Prince Miko?

I'm certainly curious to grasp the full extent of the knowledge you have, Prince Miko. The kind of knowledge that only comes from living through history... Surely, you must've preserved this knowledge in written form?
Very good... Now I can't help but wonder if you can make a third accurate observation about me. That would surely make me swoon.
Heh, not bad. That's two correct guesses about me. Although they could've been lucky guesses. But if there's a third one...

Oh my, apologies for misunderstanding your proposition, my Prince. I'm even more flattered now. I'm quite confident in my sexual expertise, but I'm sure it must pale in comparison to someone who has lived for centuries.

Oh, I see. Heh, your interest in my intrigues me greatly. I won't say I'm not interested in reciprocating, but does this mean you have some sort of agreement with your consort? Either that, or you're quite fearless.
Isn't it better to take things slowly? The anticipation of what's to come is always the best part...
If I'm to take this game seriously... I might as well go one step at a time.
It's always better to leave the best for last, so my first choice is an obvious one.
Obviously I'm going to start with the smallest item I'm wearing, as any reasonable person would.
Right, I'll remove my shoes for now. I prefer to feel taller, but it has to be done.
Of course, I must remove my shoes first. It's simply the most logical decision right now.
I wouldn't have a problem exposing my body now, but I prefer doing this in order.
Isn't it better to save the best for last? That's what I prefer.
Time to make this a little more interesting... This is the point of the game, after all.
I'm feeling more generous this time, so I'll take off my skirt.
If you were disappointed the last time I lost, perhaps this will satisfy you...
I wouldn't want you to think I'm not taking this game seriously. Therefore, this is my choice...
I've never considered the fact that I don't need to move in order to undress as a perk of my ability, but it does come in handy.
There's no part of my body I'm self-conscious about, so I'm neutral about this choice... I'll just go with my panties first.
In the spirit of keeping things interesting, I'll go with the unexpected choice and remove my panties first.
These panties are quite small, aren't they? I might as well remove them first.
There's no point in wearing a bra with this jacket. It offers a good amount of support by itself.
I think we all know what comes next...
This jacket feels quite satisfying to take off. As you probably noticed, it's a little tight.
I don't know why anyone would think I'd have to wear a bra with this jacket. I think it's quite obvious that I don't.
This feels like the right choice right now, considering how hot it's to~background.time~, wouldn't you agree?
It's quite hot ~background.time~. I'm sure nobody will mind if I remove my skirt to get more comfortable, right?
Do you have a preference for what I should remove first, ~player~? I believe I'll go with my panties. If you're lucky, you might see the rest later.
You're welcome to share your personal preferences on the female body, ~player~. However, I've already made my decision this time.
Now apologize to each other. This is not how adult women behave.
Now say you're sorry. If you don't know how to behave, I'll have to treat you two like children.
{nami}Mmmgh... Is this working? ~Player~, is she at least cracking a smile?{!reset} {robin}Perhaps try my abdomen.{!reset} {nami}You mean around here?{!reset} {robin}Hmmm, I guess not...{!reset}
{nami}Mmmgh, come on, laugh...{!reset} {robin}Heheh...{!reset} {nami}Ah, I did it!{!reset} {robin}No, I simply enjoy your determination.{!reset} {nami}Dammit... My fingers are getting tired.{!reset}
{nami}Mmmgh... Is this working? ~Player~, is she at least cracking a smile?{!reset} {robin}Perhaps try my abdomen.{!reset} {nami}You mean around here?{!reset} {robin}Hmmm, I guess not...{!reset}
{nami}Mmmgh, come on, laugh...{!reset} {robin}Heheh...{!reset} {nami}Ah, I did it!{!reset} {robin}No, I simply enjoy your determination.{!reset} {nami}Dammit... My fingers are getting tired.{!reset}
Of course, Nami. There's no reason why we can't rely on each other, just like always.
Fear not, Nami. It's not against the rules for players to help each other.
Don't fret, Nami. In truth I might've participated in games like this one in the past. However, back then I had a goal in mind other than having fun, so let's just say they didn't last very long.

Heh, I was just messing with you. A better question would be whether I've lost games like this before. Back then I wasn't playing for fun, so I had no reason to abide by the rules, if you know what I mean.
Would you like to? It's only 1500 pages, so it shouldn't take you very long. I'm curious to know what your opinion is on chapter 17.
I'd be delighted to lend it to you. Well, actually I forgot to mention it's separated by volume. I'm on volume 7 out of 24. So you can start with volume 1 right away, Nami.
I couldn't agree more. I wish I'd taken a picture of him... Well, there's always next time.
He sure did. I had to hide my face behind my book so he wouldn't see me giggling and think I wasn't taking him seriously. I wish I'd taken a picture.
I'm surprised you'd even question whether you're my best friend, Nami. After everything we've been through there should be no doubt in your mind.
But I've known you the longest, Nami. I don't think I've ever had a friendship with a girl that has lasted longer in my life... Of course you're my best friend.
Maybe... a butterfly, or a flower. But you're right, I like my body just the way it is.
It was just an idea... I'm not sure there's anything I want to have engraved on my skin, considering I have a good memory.
In that case I think I should be the one thanking you... but what's important is that we have each other in the end.
You don't need to say it, Nami, I know exactly how you feel... because I feel the same way.

Just because I don't feel like covering myself it doesn't mean I don't feel the impulse to do it. It's a natural reaction, after all. But this game is all about the loser showing their body, after all.
Hmm, I'm sure even I have my limits. If I were put in a situation in which my body was fully exposed in front of a large group of people, who knows how I'd react?
It's funny that you'd say that considering I'm now, quite literally, not wearing panties anymore in front of other people.
And I'm sure you thought that was true all this time, until right this very moment, in which your fleeting thought became true...
Certainly... To answer your question, Nami, I think there are things in this world that have no explanation. It's unlike me to say that, but this is a rare occasion in which that stands true.
Very true. About your question, Nami, I don't believe you should think about it too hard. It's not every day that I say that, but this is a situation that is perhaps better left as a mystery.
To be fair, most of them drown only after jumping into the water to rescue another one of our friends who just... fell in. I guess you do have a point.

Drowning is definitely not a pleasant way to die. I've seen it described as being quite agonizing. Once your lungs fill with water it feels as if your insides were burning hot, and yet you're unable to do anything but suffer slowly until you expire.
That was two years ago. Now I've no doubt you could easily wear my clothes, if you want.
I think you'll agree that there's much less of a difference in size between us now than two years ago. It's worth considering in case you want to borrow one of my outfits sometime.
It's certainly not the kind of place I'd go to by myself. However, if you were interested, I wouldn't want to let you go by yourself, Nami.
I was simply checking. I can't say I have an affinity for naturism, but if you were interested I would tag with you. I wouldn't want you going there by yourself.
I'm sure it wouldn't be too difficult to find a guy to keep the others occupied somewhere else. But it's true that it would be difficult to explain if something goes wrong.
Certainly we could arrange for the men to be somewhere else for a day. Although if we get caught it'd be quite uncomfortable, to say the least.
That's a relief. I wouldn't want you or anyone else I care about being afraid of my ability... ever again.
That's reassuring, Nami, thank you. My peers being afraid of me because of my ability is not something I'd like to experience ever again.
Oh, in that case I don't care.
Was that all? Okay then.
Okay, that's fair. I'd have to say... Zoro. We're both the quiet type, so I think we'd get along well and we wouldn't be uncomfortable with awkward pauses.
Fair enough. In that case I'll say... Franky. He can be weird, but I have a feeling he knows how to treat a lady right. Besides, we're both older.
Alright, then I'll answer your question. I'm going to say... Jinbei. He's the only one mature enough to hold a long conversation with, so it seems the logical choice.
Reverse cowgirl is when the woman is on top of the man, who's laying on his back, yet facing away from him. Well, let's continue with the game.
The reverse cowgirl position is when the woman straddles on top of the man in a way so that his face is facing her backside. Is that enough, Nami?
Shall we move on?
I'm done. Let's continue.
Hmm...
Heh... Maybe we can get along after all.
Well said. It seems to be like you've matured a good deal already.
Tread carefully when you talk about my friends in my presence.
If I was you, I'd think my next words very carefully.
Heh, I knew it. On my part, I'll look at the bright side. Perhaps you didn't get a good look at me back then, ~player~.
Doesn't honesty feel nice, Nami? And you, ~player~... Are you sure you had a good look at my body last time? It was a tense situation... And now you have a chance to see a lot more.
Fufufu, you know... Attractive people, unable to contain their passion for each other, honestly and fiercely... Who wouldn't want to see such act of love?
I'm a naughty, naughty girl... How's that, Nami?
Mhm... Well, am I blushing, Perona?
Precisely. Now what was it you wanted to see, Perona? Me getting flustered?
Heh, that's what I thought.
Well then...
Many times, but I wasn't really scared for myself. My main concern was that I would die before achieving my goal. I don't feel that way anymore. I've since found more reasons to live.
Any sense of threat you feel from me is not genuine. But I can't say I don't enjoy it at least a little when people are intimidated by me, heheh...
I-I've been drinking too much coffee... I should switch to green tea instead...
I-I'm too tall for a woman... I apologize for making everybody look up at me...
I told you already, didn't I? I will retaliate.
I can assure you, Perona. I won't forget. And I will get back at you.
Indeed. And that's not even considering the different races that my world has and how anatomically diverse they all are. Although I'm sure if there was an organ farm, it'd only include humans.
For most of my life I've been concerned with more important matters, such as staying alive. But I suppose there's a faint sense of satisfaction in looking down at other people.

That's not very different from my world. The difficulty in traveling from one island to another has allowed for very different civilizations to flourish. I don't think that's a problem in itself, but the lack of knowledge being shared is.

Cultural diversity is a natural consequence of segregation among groups of people. It's not dissimilar from my own world. There's a beauty in that, but when people are not able to share knowledge freely they also can't evolve.
I know. Even being a quiet observer while everyone else is having fun can be a great satisfaction. It's likely similar to how a mother feels when she sees that her children are happy.

Indeed. Simply enjoying the sight of your loved ones being happy can be enough to spread that happiness to you. It's the fulfillment that every mother must feel in their heart when they see their child smile.
They... didn't even have a chance to learn and mature. That was far more cruel than anything they ever did to me in their short lives.
It's impossible to know what kind of adults those kids from my childhood would've grown up to become. That was taken from them... It's the main reason why I don't resent them.
Keeping knowledge alive is an arduous task when its enemies are plenty. But anything that can be salvaged, no matter how small, makes it worth it.
When the world tries to destroy knowledge is precisely when it needs to be protected the most. That's our job, even if it's a losing battle.
I wouldn't say I'm here to have fun by myself, and neither are you. Who knows how this ~background.time~ will unfold?
I'm sure there are much better places to go to if you're looking for meaningless sex. But I wouldn't say the experience this game offers is akin to pleasuring yourself all alone.
Indeed, what constitutes a weapon is not always as black and white as it may seem. However what interests me is what exactly transpired during the Void Century, and how it affected the world.
What some consider a weapon, others might see as a tool. That's very true. But my interest lies in events of 800 years ago, and how they shaped the world into what it is now.
I'm certainly less guarded than I used to be, but I suppose old habits die hard. Not to mention that being in control is my personal preference.

You do have a point. It's a long habit of mine to stay on guard, although I've slowly been letting it down around my crew mates recently. However, there will always be a part of me that enjoys being seen as strong.
You're right... I did use to be jealous of girls that had a normal life. But at one point I stopped feeling that way. Maybe I simply grew up, or I found what I wanted in its own way.
Hmmm, when I was younger I was envious of girls that had a loving family. It was a very unpleasant feeling, but eventually it disappeared. Maybe it's because I found what I wanted.
Most of them would certainly blow their chances the second they open their mouths, so that makes sense.
That's a solid theory. And truthfully, the ones that don't say anything will still have a better chance with me than those that blurt out nonsense.
Many things. For instance I learned to sprout hands to create wings that allow me to fly for a few seconds. It has come in handy many times.
Indeed. Recently I've learned how to sprout a full copy of my body. It's quite difficult to control while I'm moving, but it's very useful during an infiltration.
That's true. I'm not prone to falling over. Any physical contact from me to you would be delicate and tender.
Certainly, I'm not a clumsy woman. You can be sure that if I were to touch you it'd be softly and with great care.

It's not as different as any other type of skill that requires concentration and dexterity. Through practice, it can be improved, just as my fighting has. I might be able to become better at other activities too.
As they say, practice makes perfect. Recently, I've trained my ability so I can do better in a fight. If I practiced enough in other areas, who knows what I could achieve?
Thank you, Fluttershy. It's been delightful to meet such an earnest and kind girl here of all places.

It's certainly worth trying. A good advice is to know your audience. For instance, avoid leaning into dark humor if the ones listening to you are easily shaken, even if that can be amusing in its own way.
That doesn't make it any better.
If that's the case, then my answer doesn't change.
I have no interest in competing with a machine, so whatever you say.
Alright, if it makes you feel better then let's say that your ship is better than me, a human being.
Many cultures put a lot of importance into one's death. But I don't think there's anything wrong with longing for a peaceful death at an old age.
I know several people that wouldn't mind dying in pursuit of their goal. It's the better alternative to living with regrets.
The Avatar... He seems to be quite an important figure in your world. I hope your friend doesn't overwork himself.
If there truly is a spirit world, I'd love to see it with my own eyes. It's natural for a scholar to want to bare witness to such mysterious phenomena personally.
Not much of a dreamer, are you? Dying in the pursuit of my goal has always been a possibility, but it's still preferable to continue living under the shadow they've created.

I suppose the difference is whether being a pirate is your goal, or if that's merely a means to end that allows you to fulfill your goal. And my goal is not one that can be pursued by any other means.

That's not a bad idea either. As I understand it, pregnant women gain weight around their chest first. And after you have your baby, you'll only have to worry about losing the weight on your midriff area.
You do have a point. Pregnant women gain several centimeters around their chest. You'll only have to make sure that the fat that you'll accumulate on your midriff doesn't stay there forever.
I see... Thank you, Perona. That story was quite amusing.
Heh, that's funny. I appreciate you telling me that story, Perona. It was quite amusing as well as informative.
I understand. Then I won't hold back.
If that's what you want, I'll give it to you. But I don't want to hear any complaints later.
I'm not entirely serious, Nami. Of course I'd have to punish the transgressor in some capacity. That doesn't mean I can't enjoy the attention.
Heheh, it goes without saying that I would have to discipline them as well. I'm not fond of perverts that don't understand boundaries, so I wouldn't let them leave intact.
Don't worry, Nami. I'm sure at most our bounties would increase a hundred thousand beri... a million at most.
If it helps you feel any better, I doubt the increase in our bounties would be very significant. Although I'm sure even that would raise some questions.

Hmmm... You do have a point, Nami. I have read such books and I've found myself struggling to push through them, which is something I haven't even experienced while reading a 2000-page long analysis on cacti.
That's a good observation, Nami. But I believe even books of that genre can have interesting elements to them, if you look past the sections about robots.
No, it does not...
I was simply trying to determine whether she's right for him, seeing as how he was so infatuated with her.
It was unforgivable...
I gave him a five minute lecture regarding his wrongdoing. He was falling asleep towards the end, but I think he understood what he did was wrong.
It was indeed strange. I believe I said it looked like a demon clown with sharp teeth dripping with blood.
Maybe we should think of a way to punish him.
It was disappointing because I thought it sounded like an interesting concept at the time.
I'm sure he'll be more careful next time about getting on your bad side.
I doubt there's anything you can ask him to do that he wouldn't carry out with a smile from ear to ear.
Heheh, you got too caught in our conversation, didn't you?
I have? I didn't even notice, heheh...
In my case, that has happened quite literally. I've saved my crewmates from falling into bottomless pits multiple times.
It's fortunate that my ability allows me to rescue people from life threatening situations with ease. Otherwise, our crew would've decimated itself by now.
That's a scenario which sounds all too familiar. History has an intrinsic value that goes beyond it being a means of obtaining power.
That's an even worse situation than books and historical artifacts being overlooked by robbers, and one that's all too familiar.
That's a tempting offer, Rouge. However, the location and even nature of these ancient weapons is something that I'd rather stayed hidden.
I'm sure wherever these weapons go, people will still try to use them for their own gain. The only realistic solution is for their location to remain a secret.
I don't mind a little competition, Rouge. I've met people who thought they were tigers until I let them eat out of my hand, and they turned into purring kitties.
How exciting... But rather than keeping people wrapped around my finger, I prefer to use my whole body to keep them in check. Especially my thighs...

state.text: Oh, it's adorable that you think I'd be risking anything. The only real question would be how much effort I'd be forced to put before you're moaning like you never have in your life.

case.state: What a delightful proposition. But I assure you, Rouge, for someone with my skills there's hardly any challenge involved. Although I'm sure we'd both have a sublime experience.
Recently, I've tried pushing the limits of what I can do for the sake of my crew. That's how I learned to create a full copy of my body, though it's hard to control.
Creating a clone of my body with my ability is a technique I only recently mastered. Even so, I can't do it for long. But if I continue practicing, who knows what I might achieve?
You wrote your country's constitution on your own? That's a very impressive accomplishment. Sometimes one head is better than a hundred.
Considering how difficult it can be for a government to write the set of principles that will guide them, it being accomplished by one person is no small feat.
Same as every Devil Fruit user, I'm unable to go into any body of water without drowning. Also any damage inflicted on the limbs I create affects my body, so I can't use them carelessly.
Just as everyone who has consumed a Devil Fruit, I can't swim. Also I receive any damage that's perpetrated on the limbs I create, although having the element of surprise helps me avoid that.
They were written by an ancient civilization that's been erased from history, in a language that's been forgotten. Not much is known about their origin, at least until I've read the one that I seek.
Heh, you're not wrong. As long as I'm able to scratch the surface on the mysteries my world has to offer in my lifetime, I think I'll die satisfied.
It is quite useful even for doing simple chores at the same time. Although splitting your concentration can be its own challenge. But I can, for instance, read while paddling a boat at the same time.
It does often come in handy... But simply being able to do multiple tasks at the same time doesn't make it any less exhausting to carry them out.
Only people who are cruel can hold so much power. But let's not dwell on that right now. I don't want to see you sad, Trixie.
It is a cruel reality. But for now we should focus on the game so I can see your cute smile again, Trixie.
Yes, you're very special to me, Revy. Heeheeh...
That's fine by me. Making someone else feel as if they're the center of the universe can be very rewarding.
Still, giants are far from the scariest part of my world. But if I told you about them, we could be here all ~background.time~ long.
Giants don't seem very scary when you compare them to... Well, perhaps I shouldn't discuss something that might induce nightmares this early in the game.
You're so adorable. I could just gobble you up whole, heheh...
I can't get enough of how cute you are. It'll be tough leaving here without taking you with me.

state.text: That's accurate. Although I've encountered undead enemies, so there are exceptions. That's why breaking their spines might be better, as that incapacitates them regardless of whether they can still moving.

Indeed. However, sometimes there's value to keeping an attacker alive for interrogation. And breaking all their limbs is enough to keep them from causing any harm, so a swift kill isn't always the answer.

case.state: That's right. However, there have been situations in which I've thrown away my humanity, and I've embraced the devil I can become when I use my ability to its limit.
It's not just for the sake of others. I also find it more soothing for my soul to hold on to my humanity. But when I'm pushed to my limits, I don't mind letting the devil out.
Heh, indeed. But if there's one thing to be learned from this, it's that every historical artifact has a story to tell. Sometimes it's quite a grisly story, but it needs to be told regardless.
That's an understandable reaction, Trixie. But I find it endearing that this royal couple would go to such lengths to lead a functional sexual life, despite the unconventional circumstances.
I'm not a professional, but I think you use vulgar language so you don't have to show your true vulnerable self, Revy. But this moment should be about me, so take a good look...

In my opinion, your crass comments only serve to conceal the way you truly feel, Revy. But that's all I'll say on the subject. I wouldn't want that to distract you from looking at my body now, would I?
You really don't want to say you're sorry, do you? But it's true that he'd far prefer the food.
I... see. Don't fret about it, Nami. I'm sure it wasn't that funny.
That's why it's our duty to always look up after our captain. Even if it can be quite a hassle at times, it's our responsibility. The same way it's his responsibility to protect us.
Yes... or there might've been a precious gem inside the bottle. Well, there's no way to know now.
Indeed, it's good to know it wasn't anything serious. Still, I don't think I've ever seen anyone look so happy after learning they didn't give someone brain damage.
He does seem to have a knack for testing your patience. He never seems to do anything to get under my skin... not that that would be possible, anyway.
Heh... You're enjoying this a little, aren't you, Nami?
Let's see... So you went from hitting him, to wanting to put a collar on him when he misbehaves? Nami, I don't think disciplining our captain should require such extreme thinking.
I suppose I have this idea in my mind that as long as Luffy and the others are happy and having fun, nothing can go horribly wrong.
There's not much to fear when the most serious thing that can happen is for a bunch of clothes to be lost. We've faced worse adversities as a crew.
Not even a little.
No.
Is that what you think? I'd presume it'd be the other way around, and some might not even notice what I'm doing because they're distracted by my body.
I'm not trying to distract anyone. This is no magic trick, but simply the way it feels most natural for me to undress.
As long as Devil Fruits exist in your world, Sucrose. But even if that isn't the case, I'm sure there are other mysterious powers that can be found there.
With enough knowledge and research, it's possible that an ability such as mine can be replicated even in a world without Devil Fruits, Sucrose.
Alright, this is my full body on display. Do you want me to turn around so you can see my back too, ~player~? It's fine if you ask me, or are you too shy?
That's right, this is my body. Was it everything you were expecting it'd be, ~player~?
Did you know that most women's breasts are different from each other? In my case, my right breast is slightly bigger. But you wouldn't realize just from looking. You'd have to touch them to be sure.
If this is strip poker, it should feel like strip poker... Don't you agree?
I don't mind showing my legs. I believe they're my best quality.
I love this skirt, but in this particular situation I believe it was getting in the way.
No words are necessary, right?
That's right. My breasts are above average in size.
Do we move on? Oh, I suppose you all have something to say about my breasts first.
Very well. Now that I have no more clothing items to lose, I should have an easier time concentrating on the game.
This game is possibly the only situation in which I'd present my body like this to strangers. Consider yourself fortunate.
I have high expectations for my opponents in this game... Do you think you can live up to them?
Things haven't gotten nearly as interesting yet as they possibly can. But don't worry, I have quite a lot of patience.
I'm sure nothing but my sunglasses seems like a small reward for you. Then I expect you'll want to continue playing, yes?
I knew this wouldn't be enough to satisfy anyone. That's why you'll have to keep trying.
I hope you weren't expecting me to get down on my knees in order to remove my shoes... I'd rather keep standing, if you don't mind.
I've had this ability since I was a little girl. Using it for mundane things, like removing my shoes, has become second nature at this point.
I'm sure most people don't see anything interesting in a woman taking off her shoes, so I thought I'd get this over with quickly. Shall we move on?
Ever since I was a young girl I've used my ability for carrying out dull tasks, such as taking off my shoes. I forget that most people would find this unusual.
Well, there you go... Let's continue, shall we?
This is simply the most efficient way to shave, in my opinion.
Done... Don't feel like you have to avert your gaze. It's natural to want to stare, after all.
I can only imagine where your eyes are fixating now, fufufu...
Maybe this will give you more to look at, ~player~.
Do you like legs, ~player~?
I hope I didn't startle by using my ability to take off my shoes, ~player~. I did mention I'd be using it from time to time.
You didn't forget about my ability, did you? I already explained it precisely so this image wouldn't seem unusual.
My apologies, I forgot to ask if you prefer for me to slide my panties down slowly.
I take it from your perspective it looks as if some stranger's hands slid down my panties... You can imagine these are your hands if you'd like, ~player~, heheh...
~blank~
After this rough start, how would you rate ~player~'s chances of winning this game, Nami?
Heheh, losing the first round after you invited us to play? I will say, your confidence still counts for something, ~player~. What do you think, Nami?
A rough start, ~player~. I hope you don't quit just because of this minor setback. You never know how things are going to turn out.
Oh, did you needed more time to get settled before we began, ~player~? You should've said it earlier.
You're quite a handsome man, ~player~. I understand why you'd like to play this game. I hope you don't leave disappointed.
So what's a handsome man like you doing in a place like this, ~player~? Heh, I already know... I hope we both enjoy ourselves.
Thank you for inviting me to play this game, ~player~. Even if I'm not your type, I hope we can get along.
I'm sure you have your reasons for inviting me to play this game, even if you don't like women, ~player~. At the very least, I hope we find our own fun.

state.text: Nami doesn't always show it, but she's been quite taken with you, ~player~. The other day I saw her drawing sketches of someone who resembled you perfectly.
You might not know it, ~player~, but Nami has been looking forward to meeting you again. The other night I even heard her mumble your name while sleeping.
I've never heard about these Bio Organic Weapons, but any weapon that exists in the world makes it a worse place to live in. If your job is to get rid of them then you have my thanks.
While I'm not familiar with Bio Organic Weapons, if your job is to destroy anything out there that can threaten the world, then that's a noble duty. I thank you for your service.
This place you come from... Skyworld, is it? I'd love to hear more about its history, if you're familiar with it. I've visited other sky islands and they seem to have quite a rich past.
Skyworld... So that's where you come from. I'd love to learn more about it, if you can tell me anything. In my experience sky islands have a very fascinating history.
I take it you're a warrior of some sort, Pit. If so, what kind of weapons do you use?
Judging by your outfit, I assume you're a warrior for your people, Pit. However I notice you're not carrying any weapons. Do you use any?
Seeing as how raccoons are incredibly agile it's no wonder why you'd have a natural talent for sneaking around.
After seeing a raccoon climb a tree in a matter of seconds, it's easy to imagine one becoming a master thief.
I must ask... Is there anything that you consider not worth stealing? There are many precious artifacts that belong in museums, and I wouldn't want to see them stolen and sold to the highest bidder.
Do you have any preference about what you steal, or not steal? For instance, I can't say I'd cherish a thief that steals historical artifacts from museums in order to sell them to private collectors.
"Twisted Fate"... Such a curious name. I take it there might be a story behind it.
It's not every day that you meet a man with a name as interesting as "Twisted Fate". I assume that's not your real name, although that would be interesting in its own way.
As odd as it may be, you're not the first man I've met who traveled to the future. I'm sure it must be quite a cultural shock. In some ways more than others.
Interestingly enough, I've met other people who have time traveled from the past. I can imagine how shocking it must be to be presented with such a different world.
I've never heard of "Paris" before, but it must be swarming with crime if there's need for vigilantes.
This "Paris" city must have an overwhelming amount of crime. More than law enforcement can handle, if there's a demand for vigilantism.
I have a feeling that you've not had an easy life. I'm glad that whatever you've been through hasn't poisoned your heart. Perhaps we're similar in that regard.
You've experienced a lot of hardship in your life, haven't you? Whatever it was, if it hasn't made you bitter that's commendable. That's the most that one can do.
I've spent my share of time with revolutionary groups. I respect those that rally together against injustice, even when everything stands against them.
I've come to understand how rebels and revolutionaries work by spending time with them. There's no lack of wrongdoings out there that need to be corrected by whatever means necessary.

It's lovely to see a hardworking young man such as you participate in this game. I'm sure it's quite the opportunity for you to learn more about your tastes... I take it you've learned something, right?
I'm delighted to see that this game can serve as an outlet for a responsible young man like you to learn about his sexual preferences. If I may ask, how much have you learned about yourself?

I was partially concerned that this place would only attract men who have recently gone through puberty, but I'm glad to be proven wrong. Especially if it's a handsome man who can still hold a conversation.
I'm pleased to see that fully grown, level-headed men are also interested in this sort of activity. I'm looking forward to a more relaxed, if still arousing experience.
You appear to be a well-traveled man, Dunban. I'd love to hear more about your world... What can you tell me about its topography?
I'm sure you've seen a lot of the world, Dunban... Well, your world, which I suspect might be quite different from mine. What can you tell me about its physical features?
On first impression, I find you difficult to figure out. I can't say I have any idea of what you're going to do or say next.
You seem to be a very unpredictable man. That's not something I say often.
Normally I like men with hair on their chests. But I don't know whether that's hair, or if you're truly human.
When I was hoping that there would be a man with hair on his chest playing this game, this isn't what I had in mind. I'd at least like to be certain that they're human.
I take it you understand how important confidence is in a man, ~player~. Such as the confidence to invite a woman you just met to a game of strip poker, fufufu...
From the moment you invited me to play, I liked you, ~player~. How could I refuse a man who likes to take the initiative? Even if that's usually my role.
I'm not particularly fond of perverts, but unlike Nami, being violent is not my preferred approach for dealing with them. I'm still curious as to what unfortunate childhood made you this way.
I've always been curious as to what sort of childhood events make a man grow into a pervert... Perhaps Nami is right, and violence is the only way of dealing with them.

case.state: My... A man undressing right in front of me... Heeheeh.
Uh-huh, I had an inkling it would be you.
You lose this time, ~name~. What do you have to say?
Perhaps you should reformulate your strategy, in case it's not working as intended.
Just as other activities, I believe this game is much more fun with both men and women participating.
Your turn, mister. What do you have for us this time?
There's always something special about playing these type of games with the opposite gender.
I'm not fond of expressions such as "man up". I do, however, expect you to take this in stride.
Go ahead, ~name~. Undress with reckless abandon, if you'd prefer.
If you amuse me, perhaps I'll think of a reward for you later, ~name~.
Don't you enjoy being challenged, ~name~? Even when the stakes are low.
This is your opportunity to impress me, ~name~...
Am I expected to say I don't want to see you fully naked? No, I do.
Look who it is, heeheeh...
Sometimes you have to take a leap, ~name~. Keep that in mind.
If you'd like to do a little dance while you strip, I can tell you at least someone here would appreciate it, heh...
It would be plain rude of me not to watch...
You know how it goes, ~name~. Obey the rules...
I'd be foolish not to give you my undivided attention right now...
I hope you're still able to focus, ~name~. There's a lot going on around lately.
My body shivers with anticipation... So be a good boy, ~target~.
You're a big boy, right? This shouldn't be a big deal for you.
I doubt I'm the only woman that isn't satisfied exposing her body to another man without him showing at least some level of reciprocity.
~Name~, I noticed you made a mistake with your cards when you... Never mind, just focus on stripping for now.
Go ahead. Show me.
Right at this moment, I feel quite lucky to be here.
What's wrong, Nami? Is the game getting to you already?
Nami, you seem to be losing your patience with the game already. Isn't it too soon for that?

state.text: Very well, Nami... I think you know what happens right now, don't you? What should I pick...?
I see luck wasn't on your side this time either, Nami. So now I get to choose... Hmmm.
Very well, Nami... I think you know what happens right now, don't you? What should I pick...?
I see luck wasn't on your side this time either, Nami. So now I get to choose... Hmmm.

case.state: Well, Nami, it seems I win our little wager. Are you ready to answer my question?
Would you look at that? It seems I win, Nami... Now what should I ask you?
Don't mind Nami, ~player~. I'm sure we'll have a great time, regardless of who ends up winning.
Hmm, I thought it'd take longer for Nami to get so competitive. Don't hold it against her, ~player~. She gets like that sometimes.

state.text: Hmmm...
Heheh, you flatter me, but we both know that's not true. I've never seen a woman more beautiful than you, Nami.
Nami, you're just being modest. You're already more beautiful than me at your age, and you're only going to become more beautiful with time.
Do I truly seem like the sort of person others would find irritating? Me...?
Sigh...
Human friends are very different from doll friends, you know?
Have you ever had a friend, Perona? One that was alive?
I thought it was quite obvious that's what she was doing.
You weren't exactly subtle in what you were doing either.
No idea. I only remember the three of us playing the game and having fun.
I don't. My memory is not what it used to be, but I do remember the three of us having fun.
Nami is not exaggerating. Last time I was in the men's quarters I saw a pair of underpants that were used to cover a stain on the floor. And they weren't even clean.
That wedding dress... Don't you still have that, Nami? I think I saw it among your clothes not too long ago.
Hmmm, if I'm not mistaken you still have that wedding dress, Nami. I believe I stumbled upon it not that long ago, hidden among your clothes.

case.state: Heheheh... I'm sure you weren't expecting to lose first, ~player~. But you never know how things will go down the line.
Did you lose first to make us feel more confident, ~player~? I also take it easier when I play with my friends sometimes, but I assure it's not necessary here.
I'm quite happy seeing that such a cute girl has no issues playing a game like this, ~player~. Worst case scenario, now we can keep each other company.
~Player~, you're so cute... Just knowing that you have no problems coming to these sort of games makes me like you. But I hope I get to know you better.
I appreciate you inviting me to play this game with you, ~player~. You could've chosen a man instead, but you picked me. I'm sure we'll get along.
Even if you don't like women, I hope you won't regret inviting me here, ~player~. I only have a handful of female friends.

state.text: My, aren't you adorable? You clearly put a lot of thought into your appearance, but it paid off.
What a lovely outfit you're wearing. You have a good eye for fashion, seeing as how it enhances your natural cuteness.
If you don't mind me asking, what do women utilize in your planet for pleasure besides your hands and each other? The lack of men must certainly have an effect in that subject.

I hope this isn't a delicate topic for you, but what sort of sexual instruments do you have in your planet? The fact that men are despised might mean that there's a reticence to rely on phallic objects...
I'm very happy for you, Nami. Truly.
Isn't this great, Nami? I'm very happy for you.
So you study the concept of creation, Cynthia. I would love to hear your discoveries, or at the very least the theories you've developed.
Your field sounds like a very interesting one, Cynthia. Have you managed to develop any theories on creationism based on your research?
Heheh, I see you came prepared to make this an interesting game. Very well, I'll play.
Sounds like an interesting game and a good excuse for us to get to know each other better.
I see... So succubi are not merely a folklore tale, but an actual race. I look forward to seeing with my own eyes what separates myth from truth.
Much like many other so-called fantasies, succubi are also real... I promise I won't make any assumptions based on what I've read before I've verified it personally.
I think I'm feeling merciful to~background.time~, so if you apologize for earlier I'll forgive you, Perona.
Well, Perona... I'll give you one last chance to apologize for your earlier behavior. Consider this the last mercy I'll give you.

I'll take you up on your offer, Trixie. What can you tell me about minotaurs? As I understand it, they're a combination of man and bull. That could be the result of a Devil Fruit ability, but as a race that wouldn't make sense.
Tell me about elves, Trixie. I never considered them to be a real race until I met you. All I know is that supposedly they have pointy ears just as yours, and have long lifespans.
I have actually met dwarves before, Trixie. They call themselves Tontatta. They're very agile and small. One can fit in the palm of my hand, but I don't know if those are the same dwarves you know.
I can't argue with that. Population is going to continue increasing. I suppose running out of land won't be an issue for thousands of years, but perhaps your organization is visionary.
Hmmm, okay... I understand why that could be a concern. It's also good that you're trying to increase the amount of land instead of reducing the population.
On the bright side, Nami, now your seduction techniques should work on ~player~ much more effectively.
If you can't seduce ~player~ without your clothes, then I don't see what would work, Nami. I can't imagine how anyone could look at you naked and not have a reaction.
Are you not having second thoughts about coming clean on being a pirate? You've become much braver since we first met.
I'm proud of you for feeling confident enough to admit that you're a pirate to strangers, Nami. Not that it makes much of a difference here, but at least you didn't feel the need to lie.
Remember that Luffy mentioned something about throwing a party later, Nami. You wouldn't want this game to take all ~background.time~, am I wrong?
On the bright side, losing quickly will mean that we won't be late for that party that we were going to have later to~background.time~, Nami.
Did you sleep well last night, Nami? You were moving a lot during the night, and in the morning your bedsheets were practically on the floor.
Hmm... How did you sleep last night, Nami? I hope you didn't have any nightmares. You were moving a lot during the night, and when I woke up I saw that you were in a very peculiar position.
Soon you'll have no choice but to show more skin, Nami. Don't get too comfortable.
You're lucky you came here wearing more clothes than me. Otherwise you'd be on your last ropes now, Nami.
How many is that? Three losses? Are you starting to feel nervous, Nami?
On the bright side, Nami, now your seduction techniques should work on ~player~ much more effectively.
If you can't seduce ~player~ without your clothes, then I don't see what would work, Nami. I can't imagine how anyone could look at you naked and not have a reaction.

case.state: It doesn't look like things are going the way you thought, Nami. I'm sure you expected everyone else to be naked before you.
Hmm, I doubt you were expecting the game to be this difficult, Nami. Having to expose yourself first...

state.text: Say, Nami, if you were invited on a date what would be your ideal destination?
Here's a question for you, Nami: What would be your ideal date? Where would you want to be taken to, and how do you imagine it?
I presume it doesn't bother you if I flirt with ~player~, Nami. You haven't said anything about it.
Unless I missed something, I don't get the impression that you're bothered by me flirting with ~player~, Nami. But if you are...
So cute how you subtly try to get ~player~'s attention, Nami. You like it when it he looks your way, don't you?
Fufufu, I love how you quickly glance at ~player~ whenever you lose to see if he's looking at you, Nami.
On the bright side, Nami, this is a more comfortable situation to be undressed in front of strangers than the last time, am I wrong?
At least this won't be as uncomfortable as the last time you were exposed in front of men and women, Nami. This time you get to undress yourself.
No point in dilly-dallying, Nami, it's your turn. We can wait all ~background.time~ here for you if you want.
This is when you learn the other side of strip poker, Nami. No luck or brains can help you here.
