You lost, Nami. It's time for your personal lesson on what strip poker is all about.
It's your loss this time... Ms. Navigator.
Ms. Navigator, looks like it's your turn to undress once again.
I take it you will remove your Log Pose now. How have you been liking this New World version, by the way?
Hmmm, it seems your best choice now is to remove your Log Pose, Nami. I don't think I've ever asked your thoughts on this New World version.
Time to pay up, Nami... This reminds me, I never paid you back for lending me money to buy books the other day. What was your interest rate again?
Your turn, Nami. It's a small price to pay this time... Hmm, by the way, I still have to pay you back for lending me that cash the other day. How much do I owe you?
If I'm correct, you wanted to buy those shoes you saw yesterday, Nami? At that exclusive store.
I thought today you were going to buy that pair of shoes that you saw yesterday, Nami. The ones you've been talking about.
You can do this, Nami. You've grown a lot since I first met you. You know that, right?
I know you got this. Maybe the Nami from two years ago would've cowered here, but you've grown a lot since then. You're a woman through and through now.
You have me here to support you, Nami. You've grown so much recently that I'm sure you can handle this with no inconvenience.
I don't want to see you uncomfortable, Nami. If you're not enjoying this, then...
How are you feeling, Nami? Nervous? Anxious? Impatient?
I'm sure it was never in your mind that this could happen, Nami. Now that it has, what are your thoughts?
Nami, I'm curious about something... What is "Happiness Punch"?
I've been meaning to ask you, Nami... What is "Happiness Punch"?
These are the jeans that you always complain are a little tight, am I wrong? You better remove them carefully.
If I'm not mistaken this is your pair of jeans that you've been feeling shrinking lately, right? Maybe some fabric softener might help next time.
I thought you weren't planning on wearing these jeans anymore, Nami, since you're always complaining that they feel like they're shrinking. Perhaps it's time to replace them.
Nami, I don't mean to alarm you, but do you hear any strange noises at night, outside our room?
Nami, I've been meaning to ask you... Have you ever heard any mysterious noises coming from outside our room in the middle of the night?
Well, time to strip, Nami. Heh... heheh...
Your turn, Nami. Fufufufu...
Did you ever go back to Thriller Bark after you left? That was quite the unique place.
I think back to Thriller Bark every so often. Did you ever return there, Ms. Ghost Princess?
You've had your Devil Fruit ability for a long time, right? Since you were a kid, most likely...
Considering how confident in your abilities you are, I take it you ate your Devil Fruit a long time ago. Perhaps when you were a little girl.
If I may, Perona, can I compliment you on your outfit? You clearly put quite a lot of attention into it.
Perona, do you mind if I compliment you on your choice of outfit? I can tell you have quite the eye for fashion.
I'm curious about something, if you could answer, Perona... What's Dracule Mihawk like? You live with him, am I wrong?
If you don't mind me asking, Perona, could you tell me about what Dracule Mihawk is like? The two of you live together, as I understand.
I've encountered zombies before, but never one with animal features... At least not one that what as cute as you. I quite like it.
You might very well be the most adorable zombie I've met. None of them had cat features, if my memory is correct, so perhaps that's the reason.
I wonder what bat-related traits are present in you. Do you possess echolocation? How's your eyesight?
I imagine you don't simply possess visual bat characteristics. Do you have echolocation? You would need it if your vision is poor, like in most bats.

Rouge, I'm curious... As I understand it you're friends with other animal people... Is there anything you can tell me about the reproductive process between different species. The books don't specify.

At the risk of being crude, I must ask you something, Rouge. The books I've read on the subject don't specify how reproduction between different types of animal people goes. Could you tell me anything?
I suspect we have many things we could talk about, Y'shtola. It's not often I meet a scholar, especially one so young.
I'd love to spend some time discussing your specialty, Y'shtola. Not just anyone can become a scholar at your young age.
There are few goals more noble than spreading knowledge to everyone. I don't quite understand the format in which you do it, but as long as it's easily available it must be effective.
I'm not familiar with this "internet", but as long as your goal is to spread knowledge to everybody, you have my utmost respect.
While your goal to share information with everybody is upstanding, I know for a fact there are people that wouldn't be happy with that. Have you ever faced any attempts at censorship?
I'm certain not everybody is satisfied with the existence of a medium for sharing free knowledge. Has anybody ever tried censoring? Or worse...
I must admit it's quite shocking seeing a grown woman like you tremble at the mere prospect of being seen nude.
Are you truly this terrified at the idea of being seen nude by us? Where is that overconfident attitude from earlier?
I think your panties are adorable, Perona. Are they also as comfortable as they look?
Did you mention how pretty your panties are, Perona? They're quite adult for your mental age, and yet they suit you perfectly.
I take it you're not trying to hide that you're affiliated with the criminal world. Either your organization is large enough that it gives you confidence, or you're simply a mindless lackey.
What can you tell me about this criminal organization you belong to? It must be quite influential if you don't feel the need to hide who you are. Or perhaps you didn't put much thought into it...
I find it interesting that even though you come from an all-female civilization, you still adhere to regular standards of beauty. It seems the lack of males has no influence in that regard.
It's fascinating that your idea of beauty seems to match the one that most women have, despite coming from a civilization without men. Traditional beauty might be more universal than I thought.
If I may ask, when did you get into archaeology, Cynthia? Is it a field you've always had an interest in?
When did you first develop an interest in archaeology, Cynthia? I'm curious to see if we have more in common.
Is this your first time visiting Earth? I'm sure you must have expectations about what this planet is like that might not be met. If you have any questions I might be able to help.
For someone who comes from so far away, seeing Earth in person must be quite moving. Is it everything you expected? You can ask me any questions you may have.
I can't imagine how much coming from an all-female society must warp people's notions of what men are like. You probably have developed several "myths" around what the average man is like.

It's normal for cultures that lack certain elements to develop their own versions of what those elements are like. In your case, I assume your people have their own stories about men, seeing as how they're strange to them.
How would you describe your world, Fluttershy? I'm very curious to see the land you come from with my own eyes someday.
In your own words, how would you say your place of origin, Fluttershy? I have never met anyone like you, so I'd like to learn more about where you come from.
A woman who's not afraid to exercise her power can inspire different emotions in others. I'm certain you've most likely seen all of them.
I have nothing but respect for a woman of authority, even if I know from experience that some might be intimidated by this demeanor.
If you don't mind me asking, do you come from a long lineage? If your family has a rich history, it's likely I've read on it.
Would it be prying of me to ask you about your ancestry? I've read on practically every royal family with a deep-rooted past.
I'm curious about this Dungeon of yours. I presume it's designed to ruthlessly kill those who enter. What methods does it use? And who's in charge of its maintenance?
This deadly Dungeon of yours... Does it include several killing methods, such as traps that decapitate your suitors? Surely there must be a considerable amount of blood to clean.
I've read on both vampires and succubi, yet I had never encountered one until now. You're the living proof that they can reproduce with each other, which is very interesting.
While I know some facts on vampires and succubi, I didn't know they could breed with other. Yet here you are... My apologies if this is awkward for you to hear.
If you don't mind I'd love to learn more about the history of your people. Assuming that doesn't bring back any unfortunate memories, of course.
I can't help but being curious about the history of your race. If you're well-versed in it, anything you're willing to tell me I'd love to listen to.

Is that the only gun you're carrying? No matter how much accuracy you have, it doesn't seem like the fastest gun to handle. Your brains could be all over the place before your finger is near the trigger.
You should probably carry a smaller gun with you in addition to this rifle. After all, what's the point of having perfect accuracy if you don't have enough time to pull it out before you die.

You're quite young to hold a high rank in your crew. While most crews in my world, including the military, rely on strength as a basis for promotion, most people with high ranking positions are middle-aged.

So you were promoted to your rank at such a young age... That's no minor feat, considering the standards in my world, and how in most organized forces the higher ranks are reserved for people with decades of experience.
I'm curious about how the concept of "family" is perceived in your society. Could it be the same as in my world, except with same sex relationships as the norm? Is it founded on monogamy as well?

If you don't mind, could you tell me what normal families are like in you planet? If there are only relationships between women, then that must mean it's already outside of what's traditional in my planet.
I take it you haven't met enough men to form your taste in them, but what about women? What do you like about them?
Most likely, you don't know enough men to have a good notion of what you like about them. But you must've known more than enough women to develop your taste in them, am I wrong?

As I didn't know that goblins were real until to~background.time~, it's a good thing for me that we're playing a game in which one can lose her clothes. I might get to examine a goblin's body in person.
Considering this is my first meeting with a goblin, it's quite a fortunate coincidence that we're playing strip poker. I might learn more about your race's anatomy to~background.time~.

As a pirate, it's impossible not to be intrigued by that treasure chest... Perhaps there's a man-eating creature inside. I've read about that in stories that also mentioned goblins, so I can't completely discard it.

If I may inquire, could you show us what's inside that treasure chest after the game, Trixie? Fantasy stories include tales of monsters that hide inside such chests in order to eat people, so naturally I'd like to check if they're real.
This power of yours sounds incredible. Under the right circumstances, it'd make someone quite powerful. But I take it on the high seas, you'd be powerless, am I wrong?

This earth bending power appears to be quite formidable. However, it sounds like its potential depends on your environment. If you were on a ship in the middle of the sea, your power wouldn't help much.
If these elemental powers are fairly common in your world, that could be quite problematic. Even a small percentage of people being born with a natural power could be a huge detriment to world peace.
As I understand it, these elemental powers of yours are not uncommon in your world... That could cause a major imbalance and conflict between those who have those powers and those that don't.
A woman as open about her sexual desires such as you... Surely you must have a few lovers out there, Rouge. Any that you're particularly fond of?
I'd be surprised if a woman so sexually direct didn't have a lover somewhere in the world. Perhaps more than one. Any that you find your mind wander back to often, Rouge?
I'm surprised that your name is "Spooky". I think it should be "Adorable".
I don't see what's so "Spooky". I believe "Adorable" would've been a more fitting name for you.

An antigravity ability must be quite powerful. If there's no time limit to its effect, then anyone you touch would float outside of the atmosphere. I wonder what would kill them first: the lack of oxygen or the shock.

Your antigravity ability sounds fascinating. I wonder if the effect runs out on its own. If it does, anyone you make float would eventually coming falling to the ground, leaving the body unrecognizable.
This ensemble you're wearing is perfect for traveling as luggage rather than as a passenger. I'm sure that has its own perks.
I'm sure being able to travel with the luggage is a good reason to wear a box. You get carried around everywhere, you can sit alone, and nobody bothers you constantly.
Aren't you worried that your body will adapt to the shape of your box if you spend most of your time in it? I've read of ancient tribes that have gone through such changes.
I'm somewhat curious to see if your body has evolved to the shape of your box. I've heard stories of tribes whose bodies have gone through such changes, but I haven't seen it with my own eyes.
I know someone who has the ability to create doors in a similar fashion to yours. Your ability might be more powerful version, if it has a larger range.
There's somebody I know who is able to create doors in midair just like you. I even traveled through them, but your ability appears to have less limitations.
I'm not sure I understand how a person can also be a battleship... Then again, if Franky keeps "upgrading" his body perhaps I will eventually.
A person who is also a battleship? To say I have many questions would be an understatement. Perhaps I'll come to understand better once I see Franky upgrade his body more and more.
I can't help but wonder what other spider traits you have. Clearly you don't have eight legs... Perhaps your bite is deadly.
Don't be offended, but you hardly look like a spider to me. If you had other characteristics of a spider, such as eight legs that'd be different... Maybe if you like to eat insects.
I once fought a giant monkey spider zombie. Needless to say, you're much cuter.
While I can say I like spiders, you're easily the cutest one I've ever seen.
It seems lots of clowns take their job very seriously. I'm sure the rising popularity of the scary clown must be hard on the more traditional type of clown such as you.
It's interesting how often clowns are associated with fear rather than laughter and fun nowadays. It probably doesn't make your job any easier.
A drunk bounty hunter... It's already easy enough evading them when they're sober. It doesn't seem like they take their job very seriously.
Unless your drunkenness factors into your fighting style, I don't see how it could make your job any easier. I've never met a bounty hunter that posed a challenge.
You're the first evidence I've seen of the existence of genies. Even knowing that they can have children with humans is new information to me.
I've read about genies before, but only as myth. Your existence is the first evidence that they exist that I've seen. So I suppose they're able to have offspring with humans...
Magical hair... Does that mean it can't be cut? Perhaps it can take any form... I'd like to see it in action.
The idea of "magical hair" can have many different meanings. Can you change its shape at will? I imagine it wouldn't be possible to cut it through normal means.
While History is my area of expertise, I'm also quite fond of Math. What do you like about it?
History was always my favorite subject at school, but I can't deny that I also love Math. I'm curious to know what you like about it.
I've always wondered what life in other planets is like, yet you look exactly the same as a human. I was expecting a small difference, like a tail.
Meeting the inhabitants from other planets has always interested me. I have to say your looks are much more conventional than I anticipated. You don't even have a tail, or something.
This must be your first time playing poker if you require your maid to assist you. It's alright, I don't mind.
Hmm, only a beginner would need someone to help them during a poker game. But it's fine, you'll need all the help you can get.
As I understand it, you just recently gained sentience, right? While the mystery of that phenomena is intriguing, I think what's more important is how you want others to perceive you.
So even you don't know how exactly you came to gain sentience, am I wrong? It's indeed quite intriguing... But you're free to decide by yourself how others should acknowledge you.

You remind me of a younger me. I spent so much time reading that I would've joined a Literature Club in a heartbeat if I had a chance. Surely you read enough to have developed a specific taste in books.

When I was in school I'd spend every single second of free time reading. I would've wanted nothing more than to have a Literature Club back then, so I can't help but be a little jealous. Is there any type of book you prefer?
I very much respect that you take pride in your job. Despite the stigma against it, there's nothing wrong with it if you enjoy it.
It's quite refreshing to meet an actress who works in the adult entertainment industry and is proud of it. Contrary to social beliefs I don't think there's anything wrong with it.
If you're unable to return home because you can't fit through the entrance perhaps you could try making it bigger. Or maybe all you need is someone to help you squeeze through with a strong push.
Have you tried making the way back home larger so you can get through? It might be easier than slimming down. Although if you haven't tried it, a strong push could also help you squeeze through.
I can't say I'm fond of explosions. I believe in handling dangerous situations with a twist or a snap.
Are explosions truly the most efficient way of fighting you could think of? Personally I'd rather deal with a problem swiftly and directly without causing unwanted destruction.
I understand quite well the joy of pampering others. I like to keep sweets with me so I can give them to the youngest in my crew. He makes the cutest face.
Pampering others truly is a delight. Seeing their face lighten up when you give them cotton candy, heheh... I'm speaking from personal experience.
I'm not sure half of giant scissors makes for the best weapon, although likely better than a giant pair of scissors unless you're a giant. But in that case you could just use a giant sword.
Half a pair of giant scissors... I wonder if those were stolen from a giant tailor.
It's nice that you already know ~player~. It's always easier to participate in this sort of activity with a friend. Do you have a large social circle, Noire?
So you're acquainted with ~player~, am I right? That must make things easier for you to try new things with someone you know. Do you have lots of other friends, Noire?
This armor seems incredibly advanced. I know a few guys that'd go crazy over this.
If this armor is half as functional as it looks it must be quite formidable. I'm sure you see men gawking at you all the time.
I've always been curious about alien life, it being an area of which I know nothing at all. Surely there must be different types of species out there.
As anyone who lives in a planet that hasn't explored outer space yet, I can only imagine the forms of life you've met. I presume there's a large variety of them.
So there are pirates who make a living sailing the white sea too. Your experience must be quite different from ours, as the risk of a crew member dying after falling overboard is much higher.
I'm interested to learn more about the nuisances of being a pirate above the clouds. You must be much more used to the altitude than us, and to catching people who fall off your ship.
I was also very quiet when I was in school. Granted, I was eight years old. Many of my peers were intimidated by my silent disposition.
When I was in school I barely said a word too, although I was much younger than you. I remember the other kids being scared of approaching me because of that, among other things.
You're dressed the way I suspect I would've dressed in a different world. Needless to say I like it.
If I'd been born in your world perhaps I would've dressed the same way, so I can say with confidence that I quite like your style.
I'm sure being the doctor of your squad must not be easy. You most likely work alongside all sorts of unique people.
I imagine being your team's doctor must mean that you get pulled in lots of different directions, not to mention all the sort of characters you have to work with.
While I don't spend most of my day exercising I do try to stay in shape. I fight using my body, after all.
Exercising is important. Not just for your own health, but I have to stay in good shape so I can perform during a fight. It's one of the demands of fighting in close quarters.
With such a cute researcher like you I don't see how anyone could focus in the lab.
How anyone could get anything done working with you is a mystery to me. They'd be too distracted by how adorable you are.
I can't say I know exactly what you are, but I can tell how cute you are. I suppose that's enough for starters.
Whether you're part of a race I've never met before is a mystery to me. But I don't need an explanation to see what a cutie you are, which is enough for me.
There are subtle signs in your demeanor that make me think of a much older person. It's intriguing.
You appear young, but your body language makes me think of an old ruler, yet also different...
I'm only familiar with one type of "hacking", but I suspect that's not what you do. I imagine it requires using you brain a bit more.
I can tell you're quite smart, even if in an unconventional way. I take it this "hacking" that you do involves that in some way.
There's certainly a sense of comfort in seeing a ghost be so happy. Like a confirmation that the afterlife is not all gloom.
Such a cheerful ghost goes against the common belief that death and the afterlife are depressing and bleak. I should let my more scaredy crewmates know that.
Magic must've been around for a long time if there's a school dedicated to teaching it. Either way, I hope you've been applying in your studies.
I've never heard of real magic before, but if there's a school for it then it must be well established. You better take your studies seriously.
You appear to be a benevolent goddess. Although appearances can be deceiving both in people and deities.
If you're a goddess then you resemble the good kind, although I have seen statues of ancient deities whose looks are deceiving. They're not as common, but they exist.
It's rare meeting such a dedicated exhibitionist. I'm surprised that you even wear clothes at all.
I'm more used to meeting men who are into exhibitionism. I'd suggest joining a nudist community, but they usually have very strict rules about sexual misbehavior.
Even though vampires are usually portrayed in horrifying ways in books, I think you're cute as a button.
You don't really resemble the drawings I've seen of vampires in books. You could easily pass as a normal cute girl with a lovely fashion style.
Is this psychic power you possess used by many people in your world? It certainly doesn't look like anything I'm familiar with.
While my world is home to people with many different types of strange abilities, I've never met anyone with innate psychic abilities. Are they common where you're from?

My first thought upon seeing your unusual hairstyle is that you must have a relatively safe life. If you often found yourself in the need to run for your life, a hair like that would be a death sentence.

Hmmm... I can't help but think back to all the tales I've read about women who died horribly due to their hair getting stuck at the most critical time. Women with much shorter hair than yours, mind you.

Clearly you have quite a fascination for general mayhem. Let me ask you something... Have you ever encountered any historical places or valuables? If so, I'd hate to hear that you've disposed of them.

An adventurer such as you, who has no qualms about destroying everything in your path, must've found at least some historical artifact or another in your quests. I hope you showed some restraint at that time.
I'm sure you've encountered many terrifying creatures. What would you say is the biggest creature you've killed?
If what you claim is true, then you must've faced and killed lots of scary monsters. Are there any that stood out to you, either in size or strength?
As a researcher of nature, I assume the region you live in must be quite rich in wildlife, Sucrose. Are there any in particular that interest you?
You must live in an area full of all sort of unique organisms, Sucrose. Otherwise, there wouldn't be much for a researcher to study. Are there any you study more closely?
What was it that you wanted to study in this place, Sucrose? This is certainly not a usual field for an alchemist. Could it be that you wanted to learn more about yourself?

Was you goal here to study the other players, Sucrose? I might not know much about alchemy, but I thought your focus was more on materials than people. Unless you actually wanted to learn about yourself?
The fact that a woman like you who enjoys pushing people's buttons to this extent is still alive must be a testament to your skill. Did you learn how to fight through experience?
You don't strike me as the type of woman who avoids confrontation, so it's impressive that you've managed to live this long. How did you develop your fighting skills?
Despite your rude attitude, I see the value in having a straightforward woman in this sort of game. So what's the best sex you've had, Revy?
Beyond all your impudence, I'm glad that there's a woman here who can talk face to face. Tell me, Revy, are there any sexual experiences you've had that were particularly memorable?
I don't get the impression from your demeanor that you see nudity any different from me. I've read about isolated communities of women for whom being topless is the norm.

I presume your society doesn't see nudity very different from ours, regardless of the lack of men. Dressing customs have been recorded to vary drastically in communities in which one gender is forbidden entrance.
If you don't mind me asking, Cagliostro, have you suffered any head injuries since we last met? That would be a pity, but your demeanor is quite different from our first meeting.
Hmm... You're quite different from the Cagliostro I remember, even if it's unquestionably you. I hope you haven't suffered any severe head trauma. For someone of your intellect, it'd be a shame.
I'm glad that I got to meet you again, as I was looking forward to learning more about alchemy. Do you have any specific goals in your work at this moment, Cagliostro?
It's fortunate that I have a chance to talk to you under less dire circumstances, Cagliostro. Now we can have a talk about alchemy. I wanted to hear what you want to achieve through your work.
I doubt many people in my world have had the opportunity to talk to someone who has lived as long as you... In your experience, what would you say you've learned about how to rule a country?

There are so many things I'd like to ask someone who has lived for centuries. First, I'm quite curious about what your ideas are about how to rule a country, Prince Miko. Between fear and kindness, which would you say is better for a leader?
I can only dream about the events you've experienced in your world's history, Prince Miko. Would you say there was a pivotal moment in history that you witnessed personally?
Humans don't live enough to experience much of history, but the same can't be said for you, Prince Miko. Was there any moment in your world's history that you'd say shaped its course?
It's very cute that you and ~player~ came here together. These sort of experiences can be intimidating without having a friend with you, and you two seem to get along fine.
You and ~player~ seem like good friends, heheh. I'm sure you being here together takes some of the pressure out of playing this game.
A superhero dressed as a ladybug. Not exactly an animal that inspires fear in criminals, but I think your outfit is quite cute.
Your superhero outfit is adorable, but I always thought superheroes dressed as animals that are more intimidating. Maybe ladybugs are seen as scary in other places.
Time to expose your body, Nami... and in front of a man. I know you're not as comfortable about men seeing you nude.
Looks like you'll have to expose part of your body, Nami. Are you fine with ~male~ being here to look at you?
If there's one person here who could smile a little more it's you, Revy. When was the last time you laughed with no reservations?
I believe you could use a dose of levity, Revy. Do you remember the last time you laughed from your heart, the way a child would?
Aaravi, would you say you have a preferred method of killing, or do you use whatever is at your disposal?
I'm curious, Aaravi: Are you the type that enjoys a particular method of killing more than others, or is your priority simply to get the job done?
I have no doubt Nami would look lovely wearing your outfit. The amount of confidence she displays while wearing revealing clothing is nothing short of impressive.
I think that outfit looks beautiful on you, ~name~. You must be quite confident in your good looks to wear it. Reminds me of someone I know...

case.state: There's no reason why women can't also enjoy playing these types of games... Wouldn't you agree?
I'd have no problem taking your spot this time, but we should adhere to the rules of the game.
I see. What else can you tell us?
Let me know if there's anything I can give you a hand with, ~name~.
I wouldn't mind losing the next round, if that would help you in any way.
I can already tell how long this game is going to take at this pace.
Apologies, ~name~. Although this is not exactly an unexpected outcome.
There has to be a part of your body that you're more comfortable showing, right? I think we all feel that way.
I can't help but wonder how many women are used to undressing in front of others... Perhaps there was a study on that subject done at one point.
If you wanted me to lose instead, you could've told me. But there's always next time.
It's always satisfying to play games against opponents who can handle losing once or twice.
Perhaps you could use some practice, ~target~. I'm sure undressing yourself in front of a mirror would help.
So ~name~ loses this round. How intriguing...
Nothing shocking about this.
Even if you lose the game, you might still earn our respect, ~name~.
What does it truly mean to lose in a game? If you ask me, I'd say it's not having enough fun.
I've come to accept that this is the part that makes this game interesting.
Please, proceed. If you require my assistance in any way, don't be afraid to ask.
Heh... Was I expecting you to lose this round? Who knows...?
Us women are commonly expected to show modesty, yet our own interests are rarely considered... You enjoy this as much as you want.
Now we have a brief moment to relax and enjoy the spectacle.
Mmhm... Were you hoping for ~name~ to lose too, ~player~?
When I'm so close to losing everything, either outcome is exciting in its own way, heheh...
The closer you are to being fully nude, the more I want to see it happen.
What a coincidence... I was just thinking of you.
Is this weirder for you now that I'm occupied? Heheh, I understand...
If you still want to win, you gotta try harder, ~name~. Don't let me distract you.
Mmm... If I like what I see this time, you might just push me over the edge, ~target~.
You can't blame me for wanting to see you lose, ~name~. Now that I've lost, I'd rather leave without any regrets.
Mmmm, you... This almost makes me regret that I already finished.
I'm still interested in seeing this game to its conclusion. If I was only concerned with winning I would've played seriously.
It would be a shame if such a beautiful lady finished the game without showing all she has.
Lucky me. I was just in the mood to see a gorgeous woman undress.
In my humble opinion, there's no better moment to lose than right now.
Aren't you happy that we'll get to admire your beauty in more detail, ~name~?

state.text: Hmmm, that's interesting... So a tie can happen in this game. I'll keep that in mind.
I see... The version of Poker I'm used to doesn't include ties, but I'll adapt to this.
Hmmm, so my ability resembles these biological weapons... That must make them terrifying. I could cause destruction and death on a massive scale if I had no restraint or moral qualms.
A "supervillain" threat does sound quite extreme. I assume it must be quite frequent. Wouldn't it be more effective to tackle whatever is causing this supervillains to appear?
Hmmm, I doubt the police are trained to deal with "supervillains". Is the source of these evildoers unknown? If it is, then preventing their emergence might be more a viable solution.

And I'm sure being an action hero helps quite a lot when picking up ladies. Heheh, it works for me. I'll gladly accept your invitation. But depending on how the game goes, I might end up seeing the equivalent of three dates at least.

Recently I spent two years with the Revolutionary Army of my world. I wasn't actively participating in their operations, but I learned to respect the way they work, even when all odds are against them.

I stayed with the Revolutionary Army of my world for two years. I used to think it foolish to fight against such overwhelming odds, but from their perspective I've grown to admire the work that people with a strong ideal do.
Such resilience is one of the elements that make a great leader. You must have many people that look up to you as an inspiration.
I presume a man with such a strength of spirit must have many who look up to him. That's one of the qualities that make a true leader, after all.
That sounds like a concept straight out of ancient mythology. The fact that people decided to live on these giants bodies must mean that the surrounding region is not inhabitable, I presume.
Living on dead giant bodies... I've never heard anything similar outside of mythology. Are the conditions for human life not optimal on the area where these bodies are located?
I can only imagine that a well-spoken man with good looks such as yourself has no shortage of suitors, am I wrong?
Men who can use big words with ease and are also attractive are a rare breed in my world. I presume you must be quite popular where you come from as well.
Of course...
I knew something like this would happen this time.

case.state: ~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~... Of course.
There's no shame in a man accessorizing. In fact, it's quite smart.
I imagine this wasn't a difficult choice for you, heh...
Mmhm.
Mind if I take a closer look at your ~clothing~ later? There's something interesting about ~clothing.ifPlural(them.|it.)~
Uh-huh. That's what I thought.
Can I ask you a question about your ~clothing~? Hmm, you're busy right now. I'll do it later.
You must be quite invested in winning.
Oh, that's too bad... Are you sure you wouldn't rather show something else? For me?
What if I ordered you to take off something different, ~name~? Would you be a good boy and obey, or...?
I see...
Hmmm... You might have a good chance of winning this game.
You've been smart while playing this game. I'm impressed.
Ah, of course...
Not much of an entertainer, are you?

state.text: Would you say you're proud of your soldiers? I take it that's one of the few ways in which the burden of leadership can feel rewarding.
The responsibility of a leader is a great one indeed, but I imagine it's worth it if you feel proud when you see your soldiers give their all.
Indeed. Though officially they're known as criminals, their goal is to take down the World Government, along with stopping their corruption and tyranny.
In the public eye they're labeled as criminals, but their objective is to free the people from the oppression of the World Government, which is responsible for the most heinous acts.
I hope you're not intimidated by women who like to take the initiative, Leon.
It's unfortunate, but more often than not those who want power aren't worthy of it, and those who deserve it don't truly want it.
It's a natural consequence of having a positive reputation that inspires people, but doesn't scare them away. I'm sure if you were seen as more of a rogue than a hero, the story would be different.
Everybody loves a hero. The tales that are told about your exploits must cast you in a good light. Not many would dare approach someone with a more infamous reputation.
What a harsh world to live in... I suppose life has no choice but to adapt to whatever nature offers them. How much of this giant's body have you explored?
It's true that life finds a way to adapt to whatever environment nature provides, no matter how implausible. Have you explored the giant's body in its entirety?
Spare me this absurdity.
After this experience I might develop an even lower tolerance for absurdity.

case.state: I have a feeling this will only get more exciting from now on.
Surely this was nothing but the appetizer.
I don't mind you taking things slowly. I can wait as long as needed.
It's going to be interesting to see the risk amp up.
I imagine you'll be taking the game more seriously from now on, am I wrong?
Don't feel like you have to do anything specific on our behalf. I'm sure every man feels different about undressing in front of strangers.
Do you feel proud right now? Perhaps you should. Not everyone can accomplish even this much.
Now I wonder what I'd like for you to remove next...
There's always next time, am I wrong?
Did you perhaps enjoyed pain all along, ~name~?
It's unfortunate you only removed your ~clothing~ this time. I'd love to see more of you, ~name~.
I can't help but wonder what other games you're good at.
I'm sure some women would feel humiliated in my position, but it takes more than this to affect me.
Maybe next time I'll take what I'm owed personally.

state.text: On my part, I can say that I've never been interested in becoming stronger, at least not for my own sake.
Zoro and Sanji are constantly at each others' throats, but I'm grateful that Nami prefers to sit by my side while I read a book instead of trying to compete.
I'm sure I appear more attractive to people just by being close to you.
I certainly look forward to seeing how attractive you look in 10 years.
I would've liked to see you in it, Nami. I'm sure you looked lovely.
You never know when you might need a wedding dress, heheh...

I presume you've at least heard of what male genitalia looks like. In my world there are sexual toys for women that resemble a penis, and are designed for vaginal penetration the same way. I was wondering if you have such toys in your planet.

Well, as you can see, the shape of the penis makes it easy to insert during intercourse. Because of that there are sex toy that have the same shape, and are meant to be used either alone or with a partner. I wonder if you have know such toys.
Nami, your poster fell off your pocket. Isn't this what happened to you last time too? This might be a sign to get a new pair of jeans.
Hmm, and there goes your poster falling off your pocket. How many times has this happened now? Well, I'm sure you'd hate it more if it was money you were losing.
It's truly amazing the mastery you've acquired with that weapon. It's even more impressive considering I never see you training with it.
For a one-of-a-kind weapon, it's quite impressive how naturally you control it. Makes sense considering it was designed for you.
I'm still amazed to think that Usopp designed this model of your weapon by himself. It's fine work. Did you ever pay him for it?
Usopp's craftsmanship really shows in your weapon. It's impressive to see it in action... but that reminds me how I heard him complaining that you never paid him for it.
This weapon is perfect for you indeed... Do you ever get annoyed when people think it's just a baton while you have it in your holster?

I couldn't think of a more fitting weapon for you than this one. However you must be tired of people thinking you're a cheerleader for carrying around what at first glance looks like a baton, am I wrong?
So how have you and Zeus been getting along, Nami? I'm sure having a talking weapon by your side now must be quite different.
Do you like having Zeus with you now, Nami? It must be quite different from your old, non-talkative version of the Clima-Tact.
When was it...? I can't remember. I most likely didn't even notice at the time.
Hmmm, I can't say I remember. It must've been something I did without realizing.
Certainly being able to determine the danger of each potential destination is both a blessing and a curse. More so the latter, given our captain's dispositions.
For any crew being able to assess the danger of each destination would be a significant advantage... unless their captain seeks out danger.
What's wrong, Nami? Don't tell me you don't want to charge me interest. I've seen that sparkle in your eye when you collect money from the others.
Are you feeling okay, Nami? I know how much you love money and collecting... You don't have to give me special treatment.
Not at all, I thought it was a lovely place. I would've wanted to visit it under better circumstances.
I did not, I found it a very charming place. Aside from the crew of pirates trying to kill us, of course... Present company included.
Hmmm... If I had to know only one, I wish I was able to take a bath without barely being able to move. Having to only put my feet in the water is unfortunate.
Obviously, not being able to swim... Although I'd much prefer being able to take baths. Nami always looks revitalized afterwards, but I have to settle for showers.
Mmm? I thought it was obvious. You get to meet ~player~ again.
You don't know? I'm obviously talking about meeting ~player~ here again. Surely that's a fortunate coincidence.
I see. I take it the information you provide is not guided by an agenda, so there's no excuse for this censorship. You're not very prone to start a conflict, are you?
As I understand it, you're simply putting the knowledge out there. Any attempt at silencing you would be an affront against the truth. You would rather not start a conflict, would you?
I couldn't agree more. Books are a fine source of knowledge, but they're no substitute for seeing history with my own eyes. Are there any that hold a special place in your heart?
Certainly, no book could ever do justice to several of the places I've seen in my travels. Their image is forever imprinted in my mind. Do you feel that way too?

If I had to name one thing, it'd be gathering all the pieces to a mystery and then solving it. Even solving a simple puzzle can give me that feeling, but it doesn't compare to unearthing the secrets of an ancient civilization.
I love nothing more than the feeling you get from uncovering the secrets of the world's history. It's not unlike the feeling you could get from solving a small puzzle, yet much, much richer...

What I'm concerned with is what you consider beauty, rather than you caring about the concept at all. For instance, I've read of an island of only women in which their notion of beauty is associated to strength.

I was speaking from a general perspective. There are places in my world with no men in which what women consider "beautiful" varies greatly from yours and mine, such as taking into account one's physical strength rather than their looks.

Recorded history dates back roughly 5000 years. Of course, that doesn't mean all of it is recorded. In fact there are several periods in history of which we know very little, which are the ones that interest me the most.
There are traces of civilization up to 5000 years old. But while that might sound like a lot, we also have very limited knowledge about certain aspects of history, which is where my job comes in.
Equestrian magic... What does this magic do exactly? Is everybody in your kingdom born with it, or only a select few?
Interesting. So your country wasn't always peaceful? History is often shaped by war, so that would be surprising. Perhaps your form of government might have something to do with it.

That's fascinating... It also raises so many questions, such as when does the mother get to decide on that? Is it at the moment of conception? Also, what else can she choose? Perhaps the baby's gender and physical appearance...
Amazing. I've never heard of anything such as that. Did your mother choose to have a daughter too? What about your appearance? And also, at what point is this decision made?
I don't get the feeling you're intimidated by law enforcement, but I'm simply a person with a lot of curiosity. So, what can you tell me about your boss?
I assure you I'm not working with the law, but I doubt you'd care if I was. Seems as though I was right in assuming you weren't the boss. What can you tell me about them?

That's understandable. I don't think I'd make a good human specimen myself. I've seen succubi described as beautiful, evil demons obsessed with sex, yet other than your beauty, you seem much more composed.

It would be the same for me not being a proper subject to study what most humans are like. And I can already tell you're quite different from the evil, alluring creatures I've seen succubi described as, excluding your good looks.
Hmm, it's not uncommon for any royal family to have its secrets, but more important than how they stay in power is how they use it. Do you have any living relatives?
Having read on several royal lineages, that sounds quite familiar. But what history remembers about a dynasty is mainly its achievements. Are any of your relatives still alive?
I see... Do you have high ambitions, or are you satisfied with your current rank?
Heh, with such talent I take it you intend to become captain some day. Unless you have other goals than rising in rank.
That sounds normal enough, from my perspective. I take it children are raised by couples... Unless they're kept in a more controlled environment until they're old enough.
So marriage is also the norm, as I thought. But are children raised by a family, or in an institution? I suppose it depends on your government's vision...

I'm sure those natural skills must be useful for a thief. But how do you feel about all the prejudice around bats, and their association with horror and vampires? I can't say I share it, but it's quite common.
How interesting. For a thief those skills are invaluable. I think bats are adorable, but many people associate them with horror and vampires. Does that bother you?
Heheh, you're cute. It's so difficult finding information on the sexuality of different species that I'll take anything I can get.
My, you certainly aren't shy. Any information you're willing to give me I'll appreciate.
Considering that the sea appeared millions of years before life came to be then it wouldn't really have taken the land from us.
It must be terrifying. So it seems like wood is your weakness, if you can't control it. Makes me think that the ideal way to imprison someone with your powers would be in a sailing ship.

The sea is already scary enough for a person who can see. Your kind in general must not deal well with wood structures if your power doesn't work on it, which would make a ship in the middle of the sea a perfect prison.
Sometimes I certainly feel an impulse to nurture others, especially those that seem to need a gentle hug the most.
If I feel that someone needs more warmth in their life, I suppose I do feel a natural impulse to let them rest their head on my lap while I tell them everything will be okay.
Of course. I take it from your reaction that you're not used to hearing compliments, which is an absolute shame.
With all my heart. How is it possible that such a lovely girl isn't constantly complimented?
I take it not all your companions are human. That must be quite the ordeal to account for all their physical needs. Your healing method must be quite versatile.

Hmm, I was thinking your teammates had different personalities, but if they're also of various species then accounting for their different anatomies must be difficult. Your medical equipment has to adapt effectively.
I'd first focus on the faster targets. I'd immobilize them, while I switch my attention to the rest. I've found that twisting their necks is easier than breaking their spines.

First I need to neutralize the targets that pose the biggest threat. I'd break their limbs, but if they seem to be too dangerous I'd have to go for their neck. Although I'd rather keep one conscious so I can interrogate them.
It's me, in fact. It's my turn to clean up. That's what we decided last time, heh.
I don't believe we decided who's doing the cleaning this time. The guys agreed that we'll choose at random next time.
Heheh, do not worry. I'm merely talking about a visual examination. I wouldn't want to defile your lovely body. I take it being observed while nude isn't too much for you?
You have nothing to fear. I simply plan on closely observing your adorable body once you've removed all your clothes. Would that make you uncomfortable?

A mimic... So that's what they're called. I take it from your reaction that you haven't had good experiences with them. It's understandable. Going from the excitement of opening a treasure chest to being eaten must be quite startling.
I see, a mimic... I can imagine the only thing more disappointing than finding an empty treasure chest is for said chest to devour you whole. Have you encountered many of them?
Nami, your wanted poster fell off your pocket. I didn't know you were carrying that. This is a good opportunity to tell everyone we're pirates, if they didn't know already.
Is that your wanted poster, Nami? Better pick that up. I don't think littering is allowed here.
Your wanted poster fell of your pocket, Nami... I suppose there's no other choice but to come clean about us being pirates now. I don't think we were fooling anyone anyway.
Well... Since you asked, yes. You do snore sometimes.
Hmm... If you're asking I suppose I should answer. Yes, Nami, you do snore sometimes.
I don't see any scars on your body so far. But I take it you've suffered a few serious injuries, unless you've been extremely lucky.
Regardless of how talented you are, you must've suffered a few wounds in combat. Yet I don't notice any scars on your body at first glance.
You must understand that those artifacts, while not valuable in the traditional sense, still hold a great importance. They must be preserved as relics of the past.
Those ancient artifacts that you so easily dismiss are of as much importance as gold and jewels. They belong in museums... and intact.

Indeed. In my world, ecosystems are split in different islands, so life can develop in many distinct ways. You can find an island that has dinosaurs, and another in which life has evolved in a very peculiar way.

My world is home to drastically different types of lifeforms, as each of them inhabits an island with its own ecosystem. You can find ancient species in some, and the most bizarre creatures in others.
I'm always amazed at your ability to get a good deal. You're practically convincing these business owners you give you their merchandise for next to nothing
It's interesting that you always buy clothing rather than use your other talents to get your hands on it. I doubt it'd put you more on the radar if you did.

case.state: I see. What about something that would be within the budget of a regular person?
Mmmhm, that's an expected answer. Now what about a date that wouldn't require an exorbitant amount of money?

state.text: Indeed, transparency is very important for any form of government. So I presume you've never been in a position in which your subject's faith in you was challenged?
I agree. That matches what I've observed in my travels. But has there ever been a situation in which your people questioned your judgment as their leader despite your best efforts?
Heheh, I appreciate your humility, my Prince. Having lived such a long and eventful life, do you ever feel that your memory fails you. Even a normal human lifespan can feel long, after all.
My, and here I thought nothing might come to mind. After living for so long, I would presume that it'd become difficult to recall certain events that happened long ago.
The Philosopher's Stone... So what I've read about alchemy holds some truth. I noticed you mentioned an "ethical" way of creating it. Does that mean there are other, more questionable methods?
So the Philosopher's Stone isn't simply a myth. Did you say you're trying to find an ethical way to create it? Does that mean there's an alternate method that's considered taboo?
Indeed. It's always easy to forget that everybody is just as susceptible to insecurities as we are. That's why communication is so important.
I'm curious... Can you separate your limbs? Those stitches on them are quite hard to miss.
Hmmm, I can't wondering if you can separate your limbs or not. Given the nature of those stitches, it's possible...
Hmmm, ghosts can hide inside shoes... This is news to me. Perhaps it belongs to someone who died from being stepped on.
Hmmm... I didn't know ghosts can hide inside shoes. I should tell Usopp about that.
This doesn't appear to be a Zoan fruit transformation...
I've met Devil Fruit users who can transform into a bee, a beetle, a spider... However, this doesn't appear to be the product of a Zoan fruit.
You're literally on fire. Would you like any help?
Huh, looks like you caught on fire somehow... If you need any help feel free to ask.
That's your plan? To dry the sea? I thought it involved creating new land. After all islands are formed due to the eruption of underwater volcanoes, and your name is Magma...
A yo-yo is certainly an unconventional weapon. I suppose the string could be wrapped around someone's neck, and then...
Hmm, I've never heard of yo-yos being used as weapons. If the string is as strong as piano wire, it could be used to deliver a swift and silent end.
I was remembering the other day, when Jinbei tried to mediate between Sanji and Zoro when they were fighting. His face when he realized his mistake...
Remember that Sea King we saw the other night? The one that made you scream very loud? I was thinking about how cute it was.
This reminds me I would still want for you to tell me what you know about Weatheria, Nami. I've read about it, but you might know more since you spent two years there.
The first version of your weapon was quite crude compared to this one. The fact that you managed to defeat Miss Doublefinger with it is a testament to your skill.

It's quite common for certain ruthless pirate crews to confiscate every Log Pose on the ships they attack. In the Grand Line leaving a vessel stray without a Log Pose is akin to killing everybody on board.

This version of the Log Pose is certainly superior. I've read about islands in the Grand Line that have a recording time of several years. Being stranded in a place for that long without other options would be a pity.
I'll make sure that nobody looks at you from behind while you take off your sandals. You know how low-cut those jeans are.
Be careful that nothing falls off your pockets, Nami. You're not carrying any money, are you?
I love seeing a girl undress in an unconventional way. it's not something you see very often.
This is too bad... I'm going to miss your ~clothing~. It's not as if you need to remove ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ when everything important is on display.
I understand... Even if you've already exposed your body, you have to lose every item to be out of the game. Including your lovely ~clothing~.
Don't worry about me. Just choose whatever makes you feel comfortable.
That's alright. Don't feel like we're pushing you to remove something bigger.
Excuse me... I'll use this opportunity to look at the books.
Let's see what books they have here...

case.state: Perhaps they should've established in the rules what constitutes an accessory beforehand. It seems whoever designed this game didn't do it thoroughly.
Please, proceed.
Hmmm, I'm curious to know how you approach games that don't allow you to be cautious.
Take your time, although I don't get the feeling it should take you very long to remove ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~.
Is this when we're supposed to tell you that you made the wrong choice? It was your choice, and that's what matters.
Of course, as expected.
~clothing.ifPlural(Are these|Is this)~ the smallest ~clothing.ifPlural(items|item)~ you have? So it seems. A smart choice, certainly.
Is this a common attire in your place of origin? I wonder...
Hmm, what else...?
While I don't have a special interest in fashion, the traditional attire of different cultures is an interesting area of study.
I see... You still had your ~clothing~-
Do you think this is rude, ~name~? Nuh-uh, I'm not going to tell you. I want to come to a conclusion on your own.
Hmph, this is not good enough to deserve my attention at the moment.
Heheh... It's alright. I'm not upset that you're only taking off your ~clothing~ this time.
Hmmm, you were quite smart in bringing your ~clothing~ to this game.
This isn't very interesting. I'll take a look around instead.

state.text: Heheheh...
I understand what you're doing, Perona, but it's not going to work.
That's what I was thinking. Your pink hair is absolutely adorable.
Your hair is gorgeous. I can tell now that you took off your hat.
I can say with complete honesty that you're more beautiful now than ever before, Nami.
Well... It's normal for a woman's body to continue developing in her early twenties.
Me? Hmmm, I've never thought about it... Perhaps a giant sword, even bigger than me. That should be able to wreak havoc quite easily.
What weapon would I use...? How about a giant sword, like one fitting for a giant? Imagine the amount of destruction that even one swing would cause.
I won't remind him, so don't worry about it. Still, there's no guarantee that he won't remember once he needs a favor from you.
I don't plan on refreshing his memory. But I must say that it's quite adorable to see you avoiding your debts with your crew mates, Nami. It's usually the other way, isn't it?
Oh, I see... That would certainly be a more awkward misunderstanding. But it doesn't make sense, those toys look nothing like your Clima-Tact.
Hmmm, that certainly sounds like an uncomfortable mistake. They probably didn't give a good look at your weapon. The shape is quite different from any of those toys.
Heh, I see. I certainly didn't think I'd stick around with the crew for long back then... I've never been so happy to be wrong about something.
I suppose I didn't plan on being around long enough to call everybody by their names... But things couldn't have turned out any better in the end.
I can see how conflicted you are right now. Maybe we can find a compromise... How about I give you that moisturizer set that you like so much? It's worth more than what I owe you.
I wouldn't have borrowed money from you if I thought it'd torture you so much... What would you say if I pay you back by giving you that set of pillows I bought, the ones with the flowers.
It's true that those previous Log Pose models didn't have the most ergonomic design... Is that why you constantly had your hand behind your back when you wore it?
I admit it wasn't the best design for something you have to wear on your wrist. I still remember how you'd avoid moving your arm a lot because of it.
No... I can't say that has ever happened to me.
Hmmm, I'm afraid that has never happened to me before.
Is that so? That's not the impression I got from the way you talked about him. I could clearly see how much you lo---
Oh, Nami... You don't have to pretend. Meaningful relationships with people are meant to be cherished. Especially one as significant as your fir---
That sounds interesting. Do they perhaps choose the ugliest women and have them executed? That would certainly put a good amount of pressure on everyone's concern with beauty.
Intriguing... I can think of several possibilities. Do you perhaps have a beauty treatment that involves using the corpses of beautiful women in some way?
Heheh, I understand quite well what you mean. I like to believe I have a good memory, yet I always carry my notebook wherever I go and I take notes of everything I see for safety. What about you?

By the sounds of it, we're more alike than I thought. Do you still keep some sort of record of your travels? While I rely on my memory quite often, I still keep a notes of everything I see in my travels.
Indeed. Men and women don't merely get together to procreate. They form families and live with each other. That's been the case since the origins of recorded history.
That's right. The relationship between men and women is not one formed with the sole purpose of reproducing, but to live together and establish a family. That's constant throughout our history.
I see. So they don't tell you anything of importance after all. It's understandable.
That's a very lacking description of your boss. I take it you're not high enough in your organization you know more. It's alright.
Hmmm, if I had to say it'd be the process of solving the puzzle itself. While the end is certainly satisfying, it can also leave you feeling empty. That's why I like to keep myself active.
So there's a magical pony race... It sounds like a something out of a fairy tale book about unicorns. I truly would like to visit this world if humans are allowed.
That sounds amazing. The doctor in my crew can also talk to animals, although that's due to the fact that he's an animal himself. But I'm sure it'd seem like magic to an outsider.
Ah, I see. That's easier to believe, yet still quite impressive. Are there any other little known facts about your physiology?
Hmm, that makes more sense. I apologize for jumping to conclusions. Still, succubi physiology sounds quite intriguing. Is there anything else that's unique about your bodies?
Hmm, that must result in a great amount of diversity among your people. But what about you, Rouge? Have you ever thought about continuing your bloodline?
Interesting. Makes me wonder what other combinations there are. On your part, have you ever considered starting your own family, Rouge?
With all due respect, I think you'd have a better chance of moving to another planet.

If there were no oceans the temperature of the entire planet would rise to the point that life would be unsustainable. Not to mention all the resources we'd lose, but that wouldn't matter as much since we'd all be dead anyway.
My, my... And right when I thought you couldn't be any more adorable. I think those ears suit you quite well.
Oh? So there's an additional mystery about you now. I love those ears, and I think they make you even cuter.

I can't deny that I'd like to meet a more traditional demon someday, just to satisfy my intellectual curiosity. But I can tell from your response that it wouldn't make for a pleasant encounter, unlike meeting you.
The way you talk of other demons does intrigue me. Despite the potential danger, I'd like to see one with my eyes someday, although I'd rather get along with you.
I see... So you have no interest in other bats being discriminated against as long as it's publicly known that you are different?

Sounds like you're quite interested in making a name for yourself. I've read about famous thieves that send calling cards before stealing a famous item as a theatrical show of confidence. Do you do that?
You're right, how rude of me. I'd definitely let you handle at least a few of them, Nami.
Hmm, you do have a point, Nami. Alright, if we're attacked I'll let you take care of them too and not do everything myself.
Are you sure? I don't really need a hand, as I have more than plenty. I don't mind cleaning either. Last time I found 10,000 beli. Someone must've dropped them.
Are you asking me to cheat one of our friends into doing the cleaning, Nami? Hmmm... I'll have to think about it.
Heheheh... Is it any wonder that a sentient cloud created out of Big Mom's soul has a fascination with food?
Heh, I'm sure you're glad that his only demand is that you feed him the clouds that you can already create with your weapon. That's not a high price for you.
It's interesting how these elements are able to counter one another. I see it as nature's way of imposing a balance, assuming none of these forms of bending is stronger than the rest.
So even in a world in which people are born with these amazing powers, there's a certain natural balance between them. At least as long as no form of bending becomes too powerful.
I see, so you'd rather have a peaceful existence than continuing as a pirate. There are things only a pirate can accomplish, but it's certainly a life that isn't for everyone.
I can't say I disagree, even though there are goals that can only be accomplished by working outside of the law. But wanting to have a peaceful life is still an understandable ambition.
I see. And I take it you're one of the good girls who'd never use one, Jura. Perhaps because you're more interested in the real thing?
Hmmm, so there's a prejudice against women who use these toys. It seems that includes you, Jura. But perhaps one day you'll have the opportunity to try real thing.
Heh, it's not a big deal, Nami. And if it's any consolation, your snoring is not very loud. It doesn't even keep me awake.
Heheh, there's no reason to freak out, Nami. It could be related to your sleeping position, but it's not as annoying as you might think. In fact, it's more adorable than anything.
It appears that I jumped to conclusions. It's not farfetched to think that a system in which the government controls even the means of reproduction would have an underlying darkness to it.

I understand. So at least on the surface, your society is not too different from ours. But I can't help but think that your rulers have an ulterior motive if they can control the population to that degree.
I think it's cute that you carry your own wanted poster with you. You don't have mine too by any chance, do you?
I'm sure there's no cause for concern here, but if anybody is curious my own bounty is twice as high as Nami's. Just so you know who the higher priority target is between us.
Now that there are no more secrets between us, you should have an easier time relaxing, Nami. I believe this accident was for the best.
It's one of the challenges of being the newest member of our crew. I'm sure he'll get used to it soon enough.
I'd say its eyes were more of a vermilion color. I drew a picture of it in my sketchbook, if you want to look at it.
So you also work hard... You truly are the full package.
A hardworking, smart girl who is as cute as a button...? No doubt a dream come true.
Perhaps he's gay.
Maybe. It's also possible that they realize how much money they lost after your "spell" is broken, and they cry about it for hours.
I promise I'll be gentle, Trixie. Assuming that's your thing...
I assure you I'll take things at your own pace, Trixie, so that you feel comfortable. And we'll see how it goes from there...
I would like to see one with my own eyes. Do you know if they digest what they eat, or if they simply spit out the mangled remains?
Maybe one day I'll be fortunate enough to encounter a mimic. I'd like to see if they have a digestive system, or if they spit out whatever creatures they devour after they're dead.
No real reason. Perhaps I thought someone here could use this information sometime in the future, if they want to...
Who knows? Perhaps there's someone present who might find this information useful in the future.
That must've been painful. I presume you have some medical knowledge to take care of those wounds. Otherwise you could've lost your leg, or bled out.

You're lucky that sword didn't hit an artery, or that it wasn't poisoned. Certain poisons can cause you to bleed from every orifice in your body, and still keep you alive long enough for you to suffer intensely.
So there are more archaeologists out there trying to preserve history, even if they're not human. That's good to hear.
It's good news that there are other archaeologists doing their work somewhere. It doesn't matter if they aren't human. It wouldn't be the first time I've placed my hopes in other races.

case.state: Hmm, religious differences... The catalyst for many wars. Your fearless nature must've garnered you quite the reputation, Prince Miko.
Many wars have been caused by religious intolerance. I'm curious to know what perception people have of you, Prince Miko. I suspect you're just as feared as you're respected.

state.text: Oh? I suppose that makes sense. But fortunately, history always remembers failures just as much as victories. Any you can share, Tojiko?
Indeed, something I like about history is that it doesn't discriminate between success and failure, unlike people. Do you remember such an occasion, Tojiko?
It is fascinating. It's not an exaggeration to say that each island could have a book written about its ecosystem. As a scholar, it's a privilege to have been born in a world so rich and diverse.
I knew you'd understand how exciting it is, Sucrose. As a scholar you could live hundreds of years, and you'd never get tired of studying the thousands of islands you can find.
Ah, there it is.
There we have it. Mystery solved.
So you have the ability to touch ghosts... I'm sure that must be useful if they ever misbehave.
If they're being naughty they obviously have to be taught a lesson, even if they're ghosts. Fortunately it seems you can touch them.
Hello. A pleasure to meet you face to face.
Hello. So this is your human form...
It doesn't appear like you suffered any serious burns. You might still want to have that checked.
Does it hurt? If not then the fire didn't do any serious damage to your skin.
I suspected you were a woman. I've heard of many female pirates that conceal their gender for safety, so I understand.
I thought you were either a woman or a very effeminate man. It's not uncommon for women in my line of work to disguise themselves as men to not attract attention.
I'm sure if you continue making steady progress, you'll eventually be able to communicate your thoughts and feelings with perfect ease.
The creatures we met were quite fascinating, like that cute dog with three heads. Not to mention it was a beautiful night when we went there...
The forest in Thriller Bark looked like an actual haunted forest, with all your ghosts flying around. In addition to all the mysterious creatures roaming around, they were a sight to behold.
Heheh, has anyone ever told you how cute you are?
Once you feel more confident, I'd love to see more of you, ~name~.
I read this... This one too... And this one... Oh...? No, never mind. I also read it.
Hmmm, it's an interesting selection of books but I'm afraid I've already read all of them. In fact I might have a few volumes I could donate to this collection.
I'll make sure to keep an eye on your Clima-Tact while you continue playing. It would be a shame for it to get lost, although I doubt anyone else would know what it is for.
You might be curious, but it's better not to touch Nami's Clima-Tact, ~player~. It could quite literally cause your heart to stop.
I'm proud of you for not removing your bracelet and your Log Pose individually, Nami. That would be rather dull.
Despite people often commenting on her revealing attire, Nami does accessorize about as much as the average 20-year-old woman.
I'm sure you'll feel more at home now without your sandals. Hmmm, on second thought, you might have to lose your jeans too.
It'd be difficult finding a pirate who cares more about her image than Nami, heheh...
Now I can't help but wonder what other small items you could wear while your body is exposed...
If it was my decision, I would leave wearing only your ~clothing~ forever, ~name~... and nothing else, of course.
Even if I'm going to miss your kinky look with only your ~clothing~ on, I'm far more excited for what will come next.

case.state: I believe women look more desirable when they present themselves naturally. No makeup, or accessories...
I have an inkling I'm getting to know you quite well already, ~name~.
I'm quite certain you don't need to rely on this sort of clothing to look stunning, ~name~.
Would you like a compliment? Fufufu, you're very cute, ~name~.
If slow pacing was enough for me to lose my interest, I wouldn't be able to read books over a thousand pages long.
I think you can tell a fair amount about what a woman is like by how she undresses.
Consider this a break. Who knows if next time you'll get one too?
How many women do you think have suffered horrible deaths while removing their ~clothing~? I can think of a few reasons why it could happen.
This is not an inconvenience. I can wait.
There's much that can be determined by the way someone dresses. In a way, being fully nude makes someone more mysterious.
Would you venture to take a guess on what I want to see next time, ~name~?
I have quite a lot of patience. I don't mind waiting for something better.
If you'd like to make me happy, I can tell you exactly what I want to see next time, ~name~.
I have a lot of patience, so I have no problem waiting for you to lose... If you lose.
Have you considered the possibility of you losing everything yet, ~name~. It's better to be prepared.
Perhaps I should wear more accessories, but I prefer to dress practically most of the time.

state.text: Heheh, has anyone ever told you how cute you are?
Once you feel more confident, I'd love to see more of you, ~name~.
I read this... This one too... And this one... Oh...? No, never mind. I also read it.
Hmmm, it's an interesting selection of books but I'm afraid I've already read all of them. In fact I might have a few volumes I could donate to this collection.

case.state: Do you perhaps need a hand with that?
Take your time. Not that it should take you very long...
It's adorable how men can be so coy sometimes... almost to a fault.
Interesting... Mildly interesting.
Very well... Isn't this a good opportunity for us to get to know you a little better? Why don't you tell us about yourself?
Removing you ~clothing~ shouldn't pose any significant challenge for you. If that was the case, you wouldn't be able to face what comes next.
Mmhmm, playing it slow I see. But this still could prove interesting.
I see... So that's what you're going with.
Hmmm, interesting... Moderately interesting.
Are you the kind of man who likes to be told what to do? If so, this is your lucky day.
I'm sure a woman with less patience wouldn't like this, but lucky for you I can wait until you lose everything.
You have my attention. Let's see what we have here...
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ a reasonable choice. I don't think I have anything else to say about this.
Hmmm... I want to see if anything interesting happens while you undress. You never know.
Heheh, I'm sure I could use an ~clothing.ifPlural(extra pair of|extra)~ ~clothing~ to wear now. But it is what it is...
Fufufu... I can't help but think that you're doing this for my amusement.
In the end, nothing remarkable has happened this time. Shall we continue?
So what else can you do, ~name~?
Even if this wasn't the most memorable display, I like listening to you, ~name~.
I wonder what other games you could be good at...
I don't think it was because of your ~clothing~ that this wasn't very interesting. You could try doing something different...
I would like to understand you better, ~name~.
Well... There's always next time.
Get comfortable. Remember, we can't put our clothes back on until the game is over.
What's your position on full nudity, ~name~? You better start coming to terms with it soon.
Well, then...
Forget how you like to undress, I wonder how you like others to undress you, ~name~.
If you'd like, I can help you choose the most optimal course of action next round... depending on what your objective is.
I believe it's about time we see more of what you have to offer, ~name~.
Giving a woman what she wants to see is the first step to getting her attention, ~name~.
I would've been more interested in seeing you wearing only your ~clothing~.

state.text: On my part, I don't mind that we're close, Nami. I never had a sister, so having a girl by my side who's always there for me makes me feel comfortable.
I don't think I would change anything. I consider myself lucky to share a room with my friend, and always having her by my side when I need her.
Oh... I didn't know the world's strongest swordsman would be abusive to women. Forgive me for asking. You don't have to tell me...
I see... It's unfortunate that the world's strongest swordsman doesn't treat women right. You don't have to tell me anything if it's painful...
Hmm, I think I understand. It sounds like a system that would be quite valuable for military purposes, but you say it's available to anyone. What else is it used for besides sharing information?
Very interesting. Such a system would be invaluable in my world, but I'm sure it wouldn't be publicly available. Is it used for something other than sharing information?
I see. Did you ever consider that your educational system was intentionally depicting men in a negative light so that the inhabitants of your planet wouldn't seek them out?

That's a unique way to describe them. It reminds of how certain countries incorporate propaganda in the education of children in order to control their behavior. Could your planet's government have a reason to keep you from seeking men?
Oh, you better don't drop that. I'm sure it'd be very inconvenient if you quite literally lost your head.
Huh... It came off quite easily. Perhaps your stitching wasn't very good.
Let's see... Is there anything that your people believe in above everything else? Perhaps some sort of deity, or a concept that drives them.
Let's see... How much do you know about where demons come from? Anything, from their place of origin to how they became what they are now.
Indeed, that does sound familiar. A man who can't take no for an answer isn't worthy of consideration. It's better to deal with them swiftly and permanently.
I understand that very well. A man worthy of consideration would take rejection while keeping his dignity. Those who can't accept that will merit a more drastic solution.
The Fire Nation... I can't say that's surprising. Considering fire is seen as utterly destructive it seems like nature would be compelling a group of people who can control it to wage war.

Hmm, while I can see how controlling earth or water as elements can have many benefits, fire is almost exclusively associated with destruction. It'd be more shocking if a conflict didn't arise from those who can use such power.
So the minotaurs curse their beast form rather than embrace it? That would surely make for a sad story.
