A wish that went awry... That's no doubt a common situation in many folklore tales. Who or what was this wish presented to?
Hmmm, so short, bearded people... It's interesting how different races find pride in different physical attributes. What about female dwarves? What do they take pride in?
Ah, sounds like there's a deep-rooted animosity between goblins and elves. Have your two races ever gone to war, by any chance?
You didn't bother keeping a memento of your victory? Perhaps a part of the beast's carcass? It's difficult for some people to believe such a story without proof.
Surely, you must've made a trophy out of their bodies in some form, am I wrong? I know a few people who are very competitive about such matters, and would never believe such a feat without evidence.
I see... So these reactions you want to study must be linked to sexual pleasure and orgasms. This truly is the ideal setting for a test. If I can help you in any way, I'd be delighted to.

I presume you're interested in studying sexual pleasure in the context of your research. A game such as this would indeed prove to be the ideal situation. As a fellow scholar, if I can assist you in any way, you simply need to ask.
Regardless, keeping such powers a secret from the world might be the sensible choice. You never know who might want to take them for themselves.
I'd fully understand for someone with such powers to not want them to become common knowledge, so as to avoid attracting unwanted attention.

case.state: Oh, of course. I sometimes forget that not everybody has an easy time expressing their feelings clearly.
Of course, pardon me. Feel free to use the label you prefer for your relationship. It can be intimidating to put your feelings into words sometimes, don't you think?

state.text: Hi there, heheh. You make quite a cute monkey, Shantae.
My, what a cute little monkey. I like this look on you too, Shantae.
Oh? Is that a ghost? I've read tales about ghosts not having legs, but this is my first time confirming it.
Huh, is that a ghost? I didn't see where she came from. She's somewhat different from the ghosts I've seen before, but I suppose those weren't exactly ghosts.
Oh? That's interesting. I wonder how much force you're able to apply with this power. But it's not less impressive even if you're only capable of lifting small objects.
Huh... Psychic powers... An ability such as this in the wrong hands would be terrifying, assuming you're able to apply a high amount of force. But I'm merely theorizing as to what its limits are.
I understand. We only known each other briefly, so I must admit you're still a mystery to me. But I'm sure you have your reasons regardless.
I see... As long as it's only a change in demeanor, it's no cause for concern. I wouldn't want anything to happen to that impressive brain of yours.

case.state: That's an appropriate choice for a strip poker game. Significant enough that nobody should feel the need to complain, am I wrong?
Not only a sensible choice, but also an optimal one, ~name~.
Anything but your ~clothing~ would've been a more unexpected choice, if you ask me.
If this game was any balanced, we would all be forced to wear the same number of clothing items. But I suppose it's not a priority.
This only serves to raise expectations, didn't you know?
Take all the time you need. There's no need to rush.
Uh-huh. I like how ~clothing.ifPlural(those look|that looks)~ on you, but ~clothing.ifPlural(they|it)~ most likely would've been my choice as well if I was in your situation.
Considering how cute you are, you can choose anything and you'll still have my attention.
Are there even any rules about what type of clothes people can wear to this game? Probably not.
I could see why others would find this dull, but perhaps it's because they aren't paying enough attention.
Anything interesting you can tell us about your ~clothing~, ~name~? Where you got ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~? How long you've had ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~?
I'm sure I could learn a good deal more about you if I only had a chance to examine your ~clothing~ up close.
I wonder what kind of ~clothing.toPlural~ people had 800 years ago...
That wasn't a tough choice now, was it?
Was that...? Hmm... Excuse me, I thought for a moment that something interesting what happening over there.
Do people here generally get offended when other players strip small items after they've lost?
This doesn't bother me, even if I've already lost. Take your time.
Under normal circumstances, I'd be much more interested in seeing you remove your ~clothing~. But now there's something more pressing that's occupying my attention.
I see... A sensible choice, if a slightly disappointing one.
Sigh...

state.text: Why, thank you, Nami. If we were a couple we could cuddle together in cold nights. That wouldn't be bad at all.
Fufufu, that's very sweet of you, Nami. I can say I feel the same way, because I doubt anyone knows you better than me.
Hmmm, so he's not exactly abusive towards you, just dismissive. I empathize with him... But what do your thigh highs have to do with anything?
You answered my question anyway. I think I understand why he behaves that way towards you. It'd be difficult for anyone to keep up with your need for attention.

Manipulating information is the easiest way to spark a war. That's why you should always doubt what they tell you, and learn who to trust. I'm sure this opposing race of men are also believe that your people are monsters.

I can't help but wonder what stories the men in this other planet are told about women. Either way, whoever is manipulating you is the one that deserves your hatred. You shouldn't believe what they say.
The Abyss? Is that the name of the place that demons inhabit? Hmm, but is it a place in the literal sense? Perhaps demons are not bound by the laws of physics.
Amazing... So how sinful a soul was on Earth determines what kind of demon they become? Is that a natural process, or is it decided by someone? I mean, who's to say what truly constitutes a "sin"?

Interesting that minotaurs have a naturally good sense of direction. I know someone who could use that. So considering how common magic is in your world, isn't there any way for a minotaur to regain their human form?
A Djinn... Even among all the bizarre powers that can abound in my world, I doubt such powerful wish-fulfilling entities exist there. Have you ever met a Djinn, Trixie?
I'm sure that sort of incident must happen often. While controlling water and earth have uses beyond hurting others, fire is different. I hope your friend has been able to find a purpose.
Hmm, anyone who can control fire would have a hard time not hurting others to a much higher degree than with the other elements. I take it your friend found a better way to use his power?
How interesting. In that case I presume you don't often use this power on people.
That's intriguing, but restraint is quite important while using a mysterious power such as this. Using it on people must be a last resource for you.

I understand. I don't know if there are elves in my world, but giants live for hundreds of years. At least the knowledge that our lives are short by comparison sometimes is enough to make you want to live to the fullest.
Female dwarves have beards too? Interesting. That might make them the target of jokes from other races, so I understand why they'd want to attract less attention by shaving.
XP? Does that stand for experience? How interesting that there's a formal way to track that. I take it it's impossible to "lose" XP?
Is XP a unit that tracks your proficiency in combat? I've never heard of such concept. I presume you can only gain XP, but never lose it, am I wrong?
I came here only to have a good time, which I have. But I wish I'd known about your goal earlier. I could've had it in mind when I had to pleasure myself.
I'm here merely to enjoy myself. But now, if I lose the game, I'll keep in mind your research and give you something that will pique your interest, Sucrose.
My only goal here is to have a good time. Even if you don't need my assistance, I'll be keeping in mind your research, and enjoy myself to the fullest if I happen to lose.
A zombie, huh? I wasn't aware that they concern themselves with their personal image. You're certainly the cutest one I've ever met.
That was a good disguise. It's interesting to learn that zombies choose to hide their identity too. I don't think I've ever met one as cute as you.
This begs the question: Would you still feel pain if somebody stepped on your head?
I have several questions about zombies you might be able to answer, such as how much pain you feel on your disembodied limbs. The zombies I've met in the past were not quite as talkative as you.
If you have more transformations that would make you similar to my ship's doctor, Chopper. You're half human too, after all.
I would like to see your other transformations, assuming there's no danger. For instance Chopper, my ship's doctor, can transform into a giant monster.
I didn't think I'd confirm the existence of spirits and meet such interesting people. This is proving to be a very productive ~background.time~.
I'd like to learn more about the specifics of your relationship, but I don't mean to pry. Anything you're willing to tell us I'd love to hear.
Heheh, if that's how you want to put it, it's fine. But I believe ~player~ is quite perceptive. I'm sure ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ already knows exactly what your true feelings are.
Well, labels are not as important as what's in your heart. And I'm confident that ~player~ already knows what's in yours. ~player.ifMale(He|She)~ seems more perceptive than you think.

case.state: If undressing in front of others is not something you're used to, I can see how this part would be uncomfortable for some people.
Hopefully this place isn't an elaborate enterprise designed to steal people's clothes. That would be quite unfortunate.
Is it the norm here to compliment the losing player after they've undressed? Well then... Good job, ~name~.
I'm going to be honest, I have nothing of interest to say about this. Can we move on?
Watching other women undress isn't nearly as awkward as I anticipated. It is the purpose of the game, after all.
Don't mind me. I enjoy the build up.
You might have an easier time focusing on the game if you feel comfortable. This was most likely a wise decision.
I've read on the type of ~clothing~ you're wearing. I could tell you some of the facts I remember, but I'm sure you know more about ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ than me.
That wasn't a lot, but at least it was enough to pique my interest.
I have no doubt a woman as attractive as you could wear anything and still look good. Well, almost anything.
It's interesting that you can play this game wearing a different outfit, and get a different experience. Although what truly matters is what's underneath.
This is good practice for the next time you have to undress yourself in front of someone else. Unless you'd rather be undressed.
Just do whatever helps you enjoy this game more, ~name~.
While I might have some preferences as to what items you can choose, you won't hear me complain either way.
Are you pleased with yourself? That's all that matters in the end.
Come on, ~name~... I wouldn't want to leave to~background.time~ without seeing everything you have to offer.
I'd regret leaving here without getting to see more of such a lovely girl.
By the way, this isn't how you dress every day, right?
I look forward to seeing how far you can push yourself.
There will be plenty more opportunities for you to show us your determination.
Let's keep going. I believe we're past the point of caring about clothes anymore, wouldn't you say?
There are good reasons to take more of your clothes off. For instance, there's a very pleasant breeze right now.

state.text: Whatever sort of technology this suit is made with must be quite advanced. I'm no expert, but that much is clear.
This suit seems very advanced... Assuming it was developed through science and not other more mysterious means.

case.state: I always prefer games with higher stakes for a reason...
I doubt this is the biggest difficulty you've faced in your life, so get going.
It's not cruel to find this satisfying when it's the entire point of the game.
What do you have for me this time...? For us?
How could I ever complain about a man taking this game seriously?
Good. Considering your body type, I don't think you need to ~clothing.ifPlural(wear|wear a)~ ~clothing~.
Perhaps this game would be even more exciting if we had to undress each other instead of merely watching.
I could never say no to the opportunity to see something I've never seen before, and that includes your body.
I don't think the male body gets the recognition it deserves. Let's see if I'm proven right.
Hmmm... Who wouldn't pay attention when such a handsome man undresses in front of them?
Don't mind if I look...
My, I have a feeling this is going to be a treat, heheh...

state.text: You're younger than I expected. Either you've been training since you were a kid or you're a natural.
I was expecting someone who frequently risks his life for the sake of others to be older than you. As long as you're confident on your skills...

case.state: What do we have here? I know... A handsome man who's not wearing his ~clothing~ anymore.
I can only hope you're getting even more into the game now, ~name~.
Only one thing you can do now: try to win... if you can.
I wasn't expecting you'd look so adorable taking off your ~clothing~, heheh...
Considering what a substantial change this was, shouldn't you give us a spin, ~name~? Or are you feeling shy?
As I quite enjoy gazing at the male body, I welcome this. If only I had my sketch book right now...
I'm sure your body is warm right now... I have no proof, just a very strong feeling that is the case.
The more I see of your body the more convinced I am that it'd be a delight to play with you...
Mmm, I can't wait to see what else you have to show us...
I hope you're comfortable enough with nudity. It would be a pity if you're not.
You should know that my curiosity has no limits.
Very nice, heh... I always prefer to be a silent observant, but having to comment on what I see is fairly enjoyable.

state.text: Sanji will literally do anything Nami and I ask of him. I once asked him to drink a bottle of bleach to test him, and before I could ask him to stop he was already halfway finished.
Ah, yes... I thought you'd find the story amusing, but your reaction was nothing like what I expected.
I think I remember that. I found an ancient artifact that an old man was selling. I could've taken it by force, but he needed the money to feed his family.
"Mom"...? Do you see me as a maternal figure, Nami?
"Mom"...? I don't think I'm that much older than you.
Do you think it has anything to do with Sanji's food? I've also noticed... changes.
Hmm, I wonder if it has anything to do with Sanji's cooking. He's not only in charge of the food after all, but also our diets.
Are you tired, Nami? Did you not sleep well last night?
What's wrong, Nami? Don't tell me you're getting sleepy in the middle of this game?

case.state: Since you're so confident that you shall not lose again, do you care to make a bet? The one that has to expose her body first loses.
About how we make a wager, since you're so confident that this is the last time you lose. The first one who has to expose her body loses.

state.text: I was being sincere. Why are you apprehensive? Do you not like people complimenting you?
Hmm, I was serious about my compliment. Do you not want people to tell you how good you look?
I see. But ~player~ is a handsome man. Odds are that he's had relations with many other women. Are you sure you're fine with that?
I thought you might say that. So the idea that ~player~ might be involved with other women, and even have relations with them doesn't make you jealous?
Huh, look at that bullet go...
Hmmm, clearly that's a very powerful rifle. To be able to ricochet a bullet that many times...

I'd like to see it personally. It must be quite a large dungeon to include such a diverse selection of traps. Your staff must be quite skilled at taking care of it... I take it they're happy to work for you.
Those are all quite flashy ways to eliminate someone, but I'm not sure they'd be the most efficient. Have you ever had any issues with one of your traps terminating one of your suitors?
What an overwhelming aura... It feels different from Haki, somehow.
My, this powerful aura. I've never felt it before. It's not quite the same as Haki...
A transforming schoolgirl uniform... Sounds like something Franky would come up with, minus the schoolgirl uniform.
So even schoolgirls are into these type of transformations... I'm concerned for the future.
It's true that in my field of work it's not uncommon to see people with missing limbs...
I'm sure what you've faced is quite unlike most girls your age.
Still, I am more interested in seeing the woman underneath all this metal.
But as impressive as it is, I want to meet the woman wearing this equipment.
Hmmm, so this transformation has a time limit. That makes it all the more impressive that you've managed to hold on to your secret identity.
Keeping your secret identity while dealing with your transformation's inconsistent duration must be difficult. I'm sure it's ran out in more dire situations than this one.
It was a voice from someone who was in excruciating pain. At times it seemed to come from just outside the door.
It sounded like the voice of someone being tortured. You could feel the pain in their tone.
Hmmm...
I can't believe you're even more adorable when you feel shy... Excuse me, please continue.
Take all the time in the world, ~name~. Just keep in mind that you have nothing to be embarrassed about.
A lot of people consider shyness in girls to be a very endearing trait. But of course, your comfort is more important.
I'm sure you must be fun to play against in any game, ~name~. But the sexual component is what allows you the chance to truly shine.
Heh, I was expecting no less from you.
It's satisfying to see that you stick to your words, ~name~.

case.state: Humans are curious creatures by nature. There's nothing wrong with embracing who we are sometimes.
It's wise to remove your ~clothing~ now, if nothing else but as a sign that you're taking this game seriously.
Is this what I was expecting from you? Who knows...? Perhaps it's too early to say.
My, at this rate I might have to lose on purpose soon. I wouldn't want to be the only woman that's still properly dressed.
Are you really comfortable? Showing this much skin...?
It shouldn't surprise anyone that it's come to this, am I wrong? Least of all you, ~name~.
I don't blame you. ~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(cover|covers)~ too much.
Heh... Well, isn't she nice, ~player~? I'm sure you're glad that she's playing with us right now.
Good to see I'm not the only one who's enjoying this part of the game.
Excellent... Do it slowly, if you don't mind. I want to enjoy this.
If you'll listen to my request, I'd like to see you remove your ~clothing~ with a slow yet confident movement.
No matter how you take this, what matters the most is that you act as yourself.
Lovely...
Heh... I'm interested in seeing more of your body, ~name~. I'm sure you'll match my expectations.
How could I deny the opportunity to see you without your ~clothing~?
Mmm... While I enjoy using my imagination, it can't beat seeing the real thing.
Something interesting is happening right in front of me. How could I not give it my undivided attention?
I don't think it's just me that wants to hear what your laugh sounds like. So let's find out... {flower}Dos Fleur.{!reset}
Alright, then. This is for your own good, Revy... {flower}Dos Fleur.{!reset}

state.text: You were shivering like a wet dog, heheh... I couldn't simply let you go to sleep with the lights off.
You were silently cursing me? Is that why you were making that cute pouty face every time I was next to you?
That's right, Sanji is surprisingly tough. Case in point, the day after that I asked him to eat a bar of soap.
Heheheh... That's very cute, Nami. I suppose Chopper would be the baby, then. I do think I coddle him a lot.
That's quite amusing, heeheeh... Lucky me, for having two husbands.
But think about it, Nami, is it really a bad thing? Sanji would never give us anything that would be bad for us, and you can clearly see the results of your new diet, can't you?
It's still not a significant problem, isn't it? After all, it's clear that you look more attractive now than ever before... And Sanji would never compromise our nutrition in any way.
And then he wakes up not long after I do. Sometimes we have breakfast together. You'd expect someone with such an erratic sleep schedule to barely be functional during the day.
It's truly a mystery how he's not more exhausted at the end of the day, considering he spends most of his waking time exercising.

case.state: We're not betting money. Let's say whoever wins can ask the loser a question, no matter how uncomfortable... and the loser has to answer honestly.
I don't think betting money would be in the spirit of this game. How about instead whoever wins asks the loser a question that they have to answer. A personal question.

state.text: But I do think it's cute. I may not look like it right now, but I also have a preference for darker colors. However, I don't dress the same way every day.
My, I'll have you know that I also like gothic style fashion. I simply don't dress the same way every day. Even your undergarments are something I'd wear.

state.text: Unfortunately for you, you can't charge people for seeing you naked to~background.time~. We're playing a completely fair game.
I know for a fact you've never played a game like this before, so you understand why I was curious to see how you'd react after losing.
Don't be embarrassed. I'm quite familiar with the female form.
There's nothing about the female body I don't know in detail. There's no reason why you should feel embarrassed in front of me.
Nudity shouldn't be something that flusters you. But I understand, so take your time.
Don't be scared, ~name~. I'm right by your side.
If we're among the first people to see you naked, I understand. Take this at your own pace.

case.state: This was inevitable, and therefore predictable.
You might very well discover that wearing your ~clothing~ is not always a necessity.
Perhaps people in ancient times knew something we didn't. Being hung up on our own perceptions about nudity is pointless.
Yes... I think this would be more uncomfortable if we all stayed quiet.

state.text: I hope you don't find this unpleasant. The purpose of this game is to have fun, isn't it?
Isn't this fun, ~name~? I wish I could hear you say it.
Even if I'm the kind of woman that's more stimulated by touch than images, doesn't mean I won't thoroughly enjoy this.
As they say, "I show you mine, you show me yours". Well, now it's your turn.
We've come so far already, that now I have to see everything. Otherwise, I won't be satisfied.
Fufufu, I can't wait...
I'm not sure what kind of woman wouldn't have her heart flutter even slightly in this situation, but I'm sure she must be dull.
~blank~
~blank~
You're absolutely adorable when you're naked. I liked your outfit, but there's simply no comparison...
You must be one of the cutest naked girls I've ever seen. Not just because of your body, but for your reaction too. You're a lot of people's exact type.

Nineteen? My goodness... Even for orgies, that's a high number. And with you at the center, it must've been a challenge to keep it going. Unless those guards were enjoying each other's company as well.
Quite a turn of events, for you to end up using a different set of skills to get your hands on the treasure. Even if you won, I presume nobody left that temple unsatisfied.

Oh, my. There's not much more someone could lose in a game than that, except maybe for their life. But if she was so quick to offer her fiancé's body, maybe she enjoys the idea of others having sex with them.
I was just messing with you, Nami. However it was funny when that one woman said your body was a national treasure, fufufu...
I was simply checking, Nami. I thought taking that situation with some humor might help you. I even heard a rumor later about a woman using Haki in the bathhouse. They didn't even know...
In that case I feel like I should congratulate ~player~ for being one of the few men to see you naked without being punished in any way.
I see.., Well, aren't you a lucky one, ~player~? You're one of the first men to see Nami fully naked without risking losing your life or your money.
You've come a long way from the young girl that was too scared to even put a razor close there. But fortunately you asked me to teach you. You'd never be able to wear a bikini otherwise.
I still remember it clearly when you asked me for help... Let's just say you were quite the free spirit before I taught you how to shave.

case.state: Alright, you can stop now, Nami... My, my, I knew that's a sensitive spot for you, but this? I wouldn't want you to have an accident this early in the game.
Heh, excellent, Nami. You're getting better at saying what's on your mind. And having a cute girl talk about your body like that? You're welcome, ~player~.

state.text: By the way, Perona, allow me to also compliment your lovely body. Fufufu, it's delightful.
On another topic, I must say you have a gorgeous body, princess.
You see, Perona, I don't think you're a bad girl, but you clearly lack one thing in particular: discipline. This is an easy method to teach you that, so you better appreciate it.
This is what happens to girls who misbehave, Perona. It's a shame you had to learn this lessons a decade too late, but as they say, better late than never. Remember it.

case.state: Fufufu... I think you can spread those cheeks a little more. But it's alright. I think at least ~player~ and I have seen enough.

state.text: Nami, you naughty girl... I'm sure they must've been quite grateful.

case.state: Heheh, that was quite bold of you. You must've been feeling particularly daring that day.

state.text: I see. So he's either slow-witted, or he has trust issues. If you're more honest with him, you might have a chance. And I mean honest both with your words as well as with your body.

Hmm, those are valid concerns. Of course, there's nothing stopping you from flirting with him, just to confirm whether he has a positive reaction down the line. Tip your toes in the water, as they say.
Interesting. It's not as if you could simply erase that knowledge from your brain, even after you broke up. Maybe Topaz has shared with others your own intimate preferences and quirks, Rouge.
I stand corrected, Nami. Heheheh...
My, my... It seems I was wrong to question you, Nami, fufufu...
It's difficult to ignore the male gaze sometimes. Even more so coming from men who aren't familiar with women, I presume.
Men usually aren't subtle about what they like in a woman. If the men you speak of aren't used to seeing women, I'm sure they must be even more curious.
You're delightful. I could look at you all day long... and yet it's your reaction that I find most alluring.
You clearly have an amazingly gorgeous body, and yet it's your adorable reaction that makes it difficult to look away.
I have to wonder what's the limit of pieces your body can be split into before you can no longer move them individually. If it's more than five that'd be impressive.
There's no scientific explanation for how a zombie can continue moving their limbs after they've been separated. That makes me wonder how far it can be pushed...
Oh, is that supposed to be a heart? Then I think you should trim the edges a bit more... It's possible your hair grew since you last did that.
Is that...? Oh, it's a heart. It looks similar to a symbol from an ancient civilization from the South Blue. I was excited for a brief moment.
Remember Nami, you can't cover yourself this time, fufufu...
Isn't it adorable how timid Nami can get sometimes, ~player~? It's a nice reminder that she's still innocent in certain ways.
Very nice, ~name~... Now why don't you turn around for us? You didn't expect we wouldn't notice what you have back there, right?
~Name~, would you be so kind as to turn around for us? I'm sure I'm not the only one interested in seeing your other side too.
I have a suspicion you're the kind of woman that would let out a light moan if someone even gently touched that place... In other words, my kind of woman.
Fufufu, I like you, ~name~. The idea of helping a woman as adorable as you discover the unknown pleasures of intimacy makes my heart flutter...
Such a lovely body... But only because it belongs to such a lovely girl. I'm very fortunate to find someone who's my type here. It'll be a challenge to take my eyes off you, ~name~.

case.state: Are you done? Let's keep going then. Nice figure, by the way.
If you're confident enough, you could also turn around. I'm sure someone here would appreciate it.
Isn't the female form beautiful? I believe here's a prime example of what I mean.
My... I could even see an artist using your body as inspiration for crafting a true masterpiece.

state.text: Mmmm... I can already imagine what kind of touch you prefer, ~name~.
Simply adorable... It's hard to decide what I like more: your expression, or...
As delightful as your body is, ~name~, I prefer focusing my attention on your lovely expression at this moment.
Your body is a treasure... I can't wait to see you in different positions.
Such a lovely body. Now, I can't wait to see your nimble fingers close in on that spot, slowly... Perhaps soon.
All the curves that form your body... I could stare at them for days.
What a pretty color... I'm sure it'll look even prettier with a touch of moisture.
You did an adequate job shaving. It's looks quite... smooth.
Not a single hair, huh? Whoever helped you shave did a great job.
Do you think having a bit of pubic hair is charming? Fufufu, regardless I think this suits you.
Have you ever shaved, ~name~? Maybe you'd like it. But don't feel like you have to, this is not a bad look for you.
Excuse me. I'd like to take a look around, if you don't mind.
I've been curious about this ~background~. I'll explore for a bit while you undress, ~name~.
It doesn't seem like anything interesting is going to happen for now, so I'll use this opportunity to explore this ~background~.
Excuse me. I'd like to take a look at the books, if you don't mind.
I've been curious about this library. I'll examine the bookshelves for a bit while you undress, ~name~.
It doesn't seem like anything interesting is going to happen for now, so I'll use this opportunity to examine the books they have here.
Excuse me. I'd like to take a look at the books, if you don't mind.
I've been curious about this library. I'll examine the bookshelves for a bit while you undress, ~name~.
It doesn't seem like anything interesting is going to happen for now, so I'll use this opportunity to examine the books they have here.
You appear to be very non-traditional when it comes to pirates. Granted, there isn't much of a rule as to what constitutes a pirate in our world.
I'm very curious to learn more about you, ~name~. While we both call ourselves pirates, I feel like our similarities end there.
I'm not surprised that more pirates have gathered here. Still, that doesn't mean we can't get to know each other on our own terms.
I don't believe I recognize your name, ~name~. Regardless, we're not here as pirates, but simply as participants in this game.
I'm always willing to hear about the travels of those who have visited many different places. I'd be honored if you'd join me sometime, ~name~.
If you have an afternoon free, I'd love to hear about your adventures, ~name~. You never know what you learn from other people's travels.
I'm very curious to know what kind of places you've visited, ~name~. Maybe you can tell me about them sometime, perhaps over a cup of coffee.
As far as undeads go, I'm far more interested in you than the zombies I've seen before. They were nothing but corpses reanimated through the power of a Devil Fruit.
After seeing those zombies in Thriller Bark, it's interesting seeing undead people that are able to maintain their free will... Hmm, I suppose there's also Brook.
Those animal traits... Are they cosmetic? They appear to be real. I wonder if that's a trait that can be found in humans with Mink ancestors.
Those appear to be real animal ears... I can think of at least five explanations for why a human would have animal traits. But maybe in your case it's a sixth option I hadn't considered.
If my friend Nami were here, I'm sure she'd be quite eager to make your acquaintance, ~name~, albeit her initial interest in you might be misguided.
~Name~, did you by any chance previously meet an orange-haired woman? I'm sure she'd be very happy to get to know you better.
I suggest you take the game more seriously next time, ~name~.
I have to wonder what other kinds of things you give up on this easy, ~name~.
If you don't even try you completely remove the fun aspect of this game. You're aware of this, aren't you?
Clearly, you only care about making this entertaining for yourself.
I'm sure there are other places in which you're seen as weird because of your appearance, ~name~, but I'm quite intrigued in seeing more of it.
It's a pity that this world is not more welcoming to people who look different. But you can be sure that there are people here who are quite interested in seeing more of you, ~name~.
You clearly like taking photos, ~name~. However, I'll have to ask you to be discreet while photographing me, for your own good. There are dangerous people who would like to know my whereabouts.
~Name~, if you don't mind I'll have to ask you to avoid taking my picture. I don't want to alarm you, but there are people that would definitely hurt to get any photo you take of me.

~Name~, if you take any pictures of me, I'll have to ask you to delete them later. I don't mean to alarm you but there are very bad people that would do anything to get any information on me, including hurting others.
~Name~, you can take my picture with your camera if you want. However, I'll have to ask you to delete the photos afterwards. It's for your own sake.
I see your eyes are a different color... Heterochromia, I believe it's called. From what I understand there's no deeper meaning to it, although it does give off an aura of mysticism.
Your eyes... If I'm not mistaken, that condition is called Heterochromia. I don't know much more about it, other than it's determined by the Lineage Factor.
I find your eyes quite fascinating, ~name~... I don't believe I've seen that condition before. I'm curious to know if it means anything.
Your eyes, ~name~... I apologize, I didn't mean to stare. I'm sure you get enough of that already. I find them quite cute, in fact. I'm simply curious to know where they come from.
I've always wondered what the inhabitants of other planets look like. I'm not saying I'm disappointed, but I was expecting less humanoid traits.
So this is what extraterrestrial races look like... Not all of them, I'm assuming. I'm sure there are more than can be counted, and some most likely look a lot less humanoid.
After spending time with Franky, other cyborgs start looking much more unremarkable by comparison... Not that I understand what the appeal of mechanical enhancements is.
I understand the usefulness of mechanical enhancements to make up for a damaged body, but I don't get the value of adding useless features to said enhancements.
Fufufu... The way you're dressed is like something I'd like to wear for Halloween.
Did I already tell you how much I like your style? Perhaps I have a special appreciation for demons and devils... Who knows?
I believe I've been seeing more Minks around the world lately. Could there be more civilizations than the one located on the back of Zunisha? One way or another, it's a good sight.
I like seeing members of the Mink race all around. As lovely as Zou is, it's always nice to see more of the world.
It's a good feeling to know that no matter how different people look at you in other parts of the world, here you'll always be accepted for who you are, don't you think?
I'm sure it must feel exhausting after a while to see people being afraid of you, ~name~. You can rest easy knowing that at the very least I find you quite charming.
It's astonishing that someone was able to create a robot that so perfectly mimics humans... There might only be a handful of people in the world with the skills to accomplish this.
At first, or even second glance, nobody could tell you're not human... I think I'd rest easier knowing that this technology won't fall in the hands of the World Government.
In Skypeia, "God" was a title rather than a status... I'm curious to know if it was the same for you. The idea of someone being born as a God is rather far-fetched from my perspective.
I've met a God before, he wasn't very pleasant. Granted, he had simply usurped that title from a more deserving man. I wonder what made you a deity.
A succubus... I've read about your kind. I always assumed they were folklore that was born long ago in an attempt to demonize sex. It seems I was wrong.
I've heard of succubi before, but I didn't expect to meet one in person. According to what I've read, I expect this to be an interesting spectacle.
A real vampire... Interesting. I'm quite curious to learn which parts of the stories are fact and which are myth. Your mere presence here has already proven some of them false.
I never could've expected I'd meet a real vampire today, heheheh... I've read extensively on them. I'm sure most of what's in the stories is fabrication, but I can't help but wonder.
Could that tail be your weak point, ~name~? I'm sure it provides a great deal of extra mobility for you during combat.
I take it your tail feels special when touched... But I have to wonder if it gives you discomfort or pleasure when others touch it. I hope it's the latter.
I can't deny it was a disappointment to learn that the horns most of the people in Kaido's crew had were purely cosmetic. But yours appear to be real.
There are at least some races in the world that characterize for having horns... But they're usually taller than you, which makes me curious.
I've seen several people with pointy ears, yet I've never been able to discern if it's a trait from a specific race. Perhaps you can answer my question, ~name~.

Pointy ears as a physical trait specific to certain races appears to be quite common in fiction. I didn't expect that to be based on fact... But looking at you, I'm thinking I might not be very well versed on this subject.
I would like to hear what your tattoo is meant to represent, if you'd like to share it, ~name~.

A lot of tattoos are meant to represent religious allegiances, or even just have a simple personal meaning, even if that meaning is the owner's overwhelming love for booze to the point of blacking out.
I've seen people try to pass more elaborate objects than your wand as powerful weapons. Still, I don't want to doubt you. Even if magic is real, that doesn't mean it's beyond explanation.
I'm very interested in learning the inner workings of that wand of yours. Even if it works through "magic", surely there's some correlation between movement, words spoken and the type of wand itself.
Meeting a colleague here is a surprise for sure, but a welcomed one. We could spend hours talking about our respective work, ~name~, but for now we should focus on the game.
I thought it more likely to meet strange creatures from another world to~background.time~ than another archaeologist. It's good news, as I'm certainly intrigued by your world's history, ~name~.
I'm alchemy isn't a dead discipline in my world, yet I've never had the pleasure of meeting an alchemist personally until now.
I look forward to learning more about alchemy from you, ~name~. I've seen science accomplish amazing feats, but I'm sure even a protoscience has its merits.
If you'd like to elaborate on your death, I'd like to hear about it. I'm imagining a gruesome demise full of pain. Mutilation... Incineration perhaps...
I wonder if the amount of pain inflicted upon death is necessary for the creation of a ghost. If so, I can imagine multiple ways in which your life could've ended.
Did you know that in certain parts of the world scars are considered a sign of status? I think that's a foolish idea. After all, there's no guarantee that they weren't self-inflicted.
In certain primitive tribes, the leader was determined by who had the most scars. That system was abandoned after people started self-inflicting injuries in an attempt to be chosen as the leader.
I'd love to hear about some of the cases you've solved, ~name~. Who doesn't love a good mystery, after all?
I mostly read non-fiction, but when I try something different detective stories are some of my favorites. I guess you can say I'm a fan of your profession, ~name~.
I'd like to hear more about these videogames, ~name~. Just the mere concept sounds intriguing.
I wonder if I'd be interested in these videogames if I were to try one. I prefer books, but if there's another way to experience masterfully craft worlds, I can't help being curious.
If I'm not mistaken, this concept of "idols" seems to be similar to the oiran from Wano. It's interesting how different parts of the world still have similar traditions.
I believe I understand the idea of "idols". It must be a tough life when your name becomes more important than yourself.

From my experience, the existence of lawyers seems to be nothing more than a formality. In this world many presumed criminals are executed without a fair trial every day in the name of "justice". I'm sorry, ~name~.
I admire the sentiment of wanting to protect the innocent, but I'm afraid there's not much that can be done as a lawyer when the system is already corrupt, ~name~.
I very much admire the work that certain journalists do, seeking the truth at any cost. Of course that also means that you have to be very careful with your work.
I hope you work as a freelancer, ~name~. Most newspapers, such as the World Economic News, are under the direct control of powerful organizations.
I'm very intrigued by this concept of "magical girls". Whatever the source of their power is might be worth looking into further.
I'm curious if there are only "magical girls", or if there are also boys... Perhaps being female is a requirement for them to access this power.
Perhaps you can help me see the appeal of giant robots, ~name~.... But probably nobody can.
So you sometimes pilot a giant robot, ~name~? I see... I don't have any further questions on that subject.
I didn't have any preconceptions about ninjas before meeting one, but now I have to wonder how different you're to the ones from Wano, like Shinobu and Raizo.
The first thing that comes to my mind when I think about ninjas now is how cute Chopper looked dressed as one, heeheeh...
So this "police" is the law enforcement force where you come from... That's all I need to hear to be sure that we come from drastically different settings.

The mere idea of a law enforcement organization different from the Marines and not affiliated to the World Government like this "police" is ludicrous were I come from. I want to learn more about what you do, ~name~.

I've seen both good and bad examples of monarchy. Of course, there's no guarantee that a ruler will be fair and able if they're simply chosen by blood. I can only hope you're one of the good ones, ~name~.
If I'm honest, I believe that monarchy as a form of government is inherently flawed. I can only hope you and your family make good rulers, ~name~.
You could say I have a casual interest in science. My collection of scientific books pales in comparison to my history books, and I rarely pick one over 2000 pages long.
Science is an amazing thing when you consider the way it can alter people's lives. It's unfortunate many would rather use it to find new ways to hurt others rather than help them.
What is it that defines a "superhero" really? Is it simply doing good deeds with the use of superpowers? In that case I'd already know a few superheroes myself.
I'm convinced Luffy, Chopper and Usopp would love the idea of "superheroes". I don't even need to ask them. Perhaps this is a good direction for the next time I need a gift for them.

case.state: This might come as a surprise, but gathering information is one of my specialties too. Espionage becomes far easier once you possess an ability like mine.

state.text: Perhaps I can learn something from you, ~name~. I'm one of the members of my crew who's most qualified for espionage, thanks to my ability. But that doesn't mean I can't be better.
When I was in school I didn't have great teachers, which is why I preferred learning by myself at the library. Just know that there are different options if your school isn't the best, ~name~.
I'm very curious to know what subjects are being taught at school these days. Do you have a syllabus, ~name~? Although I doubt you have it on you.
I'm curious as to how schools are run these days. When I was a kid I preferred learning through my own means.
I expect you don't have your syllabus with you, do you? I'd like to see what schools are teaching nowadays. I doubt things have changed since back then...
Teaching is indubitably one of the noblest professions in the world. A good teacher can have a positive impact on a student for the rest of their lives. I hope you take your job seriously, ~name~.
In a different world, I think I would've enjoyed being a teacher. Learning and sharing that knowledge with others is one of life's greatest pleasures.
It's not unheard for women to be referred to as "witches". I've also been called that more than once, but I didn't expect I'd one day meet a real, self-proclaimed witch.
Even today in certain parts of the world, women are still branded as "witches" for possessing a Devil Fruit ability, and then burned alive. Ignorance is a disease that only knowledge can heal.
That's a nice... outfit, ~name~. It might even fool someone here.
I like your outfit, ~name~. It's very inconspicuous, as I'm sure it was your intention.
Some of the things you say are very intriguing, ~name~... and strange. I'd like to learn more about you.
I can't decide if the way you see ~player~ and this game is the same as mine... Who's to say whose perception is more accurate?
Do people often find your appearance unsettling, ~name~? Well, I think you're very cute.
I wholeheartedly think you're cute, ~name~. You don't need to conform to traditional standards of beauty to fall in that category, in my opinion.

~Name~, I've read about a scientifically proven remedy for hangovers you might want. It's guaranteed to work 99.8% of the time. First you have to... Hmm, we should focus on the game for now. Remind me to tell you later.
I've never gotten drunk. I only in moderation, and at parties. Also I'm not very eager to partake in anything that dulls my senses. Perhaps it's an instinct I still have from my old life.

case.state: I've learned how to fly thanks to my ability, by creating wings with multiple hands. I can't lift my own weight, but I can't at least slow my descend.

state.text: I'm not usually jealous of other people's abilities, but I'm sure flying with ease must be quite useful... and fun.
I love your fashion style, ~name~. What is it called? Gothic? I could see myself forming a part of that trend when I was a teenager.
I quite like your dark fashion style, ~name~. It commands respect, while also looking very cute.
I look forward to knowing you better, ~name~. I suppose I've always been mature for my age, so I prefer spending my time with similar people.
I appreciate having opponents in this game that aren't all younger than me. I think it'd make me feel... inadequate.
~Name~, just so we're on the same page, I hope you weren't drawn to this game under the idea that there's a monetary prize. It's not uncommon for someone to make that mistake.
Did you perchance lose all your money gambling, and have now decided to play a game with no money involved? It's true that the biggest pleasures in life are free.
My current record for disarming an enemy is 0.3 seconds. Of course, that depends on the weapon and the wielder, so sometimes it can take me even a full second.

case.state: Thanks to my ability I rarely have any inconvenience disarming my enemies. They're still trying to understand what happened once their weapon's in my possession.
You might be surprised how easy it's for me to disarm someone. Fighters usually anticipate others grabbing their weapons, but not when the hands come from their chests.

state.text: Heheh, I think I understand only half of what you're saying. But please, don't let that stop you. As long as you're having fun...
I take it you're into some sort of role playing activity. It seems like you're having fun, so I have no issue if you want to continue. I'll even play along.
I'd love to see you have a good time here and leave with a big smile on your face, ~name~.
You remind me a bit of myself when I was a kid, ~name~. I looked so gloomy all the time that a good friend of mine had to teach me how to laugh, heheh... It's easier than it seems.
I have a feeling you and I might have common interests, even if it doesn't seem that way at first glance. If you'd like to have a coffee after, ~name~, I'm available.
Heheh, I have this feeling I might enjoy some of your hobbies, ~name~. I'd like to learn more about them. Anything that stimulates the imagination would be of interest to me.
You don't have to talk if you don't want to, ~name~. You simply have to let us watch you.
I understand people who aren't very talkative. If I have nothing of interest to say, I prefer listening to those around me.
I'm sure you'd enjoy seeing more of the world, ~name~. There's something for everyone out there.
You look like you could use a vacation, ~name~. Of course, picking a destination is not easy. Many people make the wrong choice and then never make it back home.
Most communication is non-verbal. We can still understand what you're trying to say, ~name~.
It's impossible for a person not to communicate, even if you're unable to talk. Besides, looks speak much more in this game.
Personally, I wouldn't be comfortable being "one of the guys". But I like that you know who you are, ~name~.
I like that you seem content with who you are, ~name~. Don't ever let people make you doubt yourself.
You're the living example of the expression "wearing your heart on your sleeve", ~name~, fufufu...
I find it amusing how sometimes the person that tries to hide their emotions the most are the ones that are a complete open book.
"Loving" and "owning" are very much not the same thing. That's a lesson you might yet need to learn, ~name~.
It's true what they say in the East Blue about love being a hurricane, but it's unfortunate that hurricanes can be incredibly destructive.
I can't help but wonder what other sort of activities your significant other and you partake in, ~name~. Either together or alone.
I find it cute that your partner has no issue with you playing games like these. It takes a strong relationship to not be threaten by that.
I've heard many stories of unsuccessful artists that fall into despair, and eventually turn to a life of crime, or worse... Anyway, I'd love to see your work, ~name~.
Are you here to find some new inspiration for your work, ~name~? Now I'm very curious to see your art, heeheeh...
I regret to say, but the bounty hunters my crew and I have encountered rarely prove to be more than an inconvenient. Perhaps money is not the best motivation to become strong.
If you're a diligent bounty hunter, it's possible you've heard of me. But we shouldn't let that get in the way of us having a good time, should we?
So you're some sort of celebrity, ~name~? I apologize, but I don't recognize you. I prefer reading books more than magazines.
Are you famous, ~name~? I don't think I recognize you. I do read the newspaper regularly, so I take it you're not famous for being a ruler or a powerful figure.
No offense, but I don't particularly like clowns. I know some people are scared of them, but they don't even elicit that reaction out of me.
I've never been very fond of clowns. At least the ones that are scary are interesting to me in some way.
I'm not going to judge you for your past, ~name~. In this world, just because you're branded a criminal it doesn't mean you're guilty, as I know from experience.
I hope we get along, ~name~. Even if you're called a criminal, I have no preconceptions about you. The entity that marks people in that manner is not one I'm fond of.
~Name~, I must ask... Is there any significance to that antenna on your head? Oh... My apologies. You should probably comb your hair.

You have such messy hair, ~name~. Maybe you should be careful. Someone might mistake that strand at the top for a horn and then kidnap you to sell you to slave traders as a rarity. I hope you don't think I'm joking.
Do you plan on returning to the sky soon, ~name~? You should be careful, considering the high death rate of conventional routes. But I'm sure you knew that already.
If you don't mind, I would like to examine your wings in more detail later, ~name~. I believe different tribes of sky people have slightly different wings, but I haven't been able to confirm it yet.
Don't be embarrassed, ~name~. I'm sure nobody remembers that you lost the last round too.
Does this count as a "two for the price of one"?
Good, I wasn't fully satisfied just with last time, ~name~...
It's your turn, ~name~... again.
Perhaps you should rethink your strategy, ~name~. You do have a strategy, right?
Hmmm, I'd be concerned if I were you, ~name~. If you're having a streak of bad luck, it can only get worse. You should be careful on your way home.
I'm not superstitious, but perhaps ~name~ was born under an unlucky star after all. ~target.ifMale(His|Her)~ misfortune might be worth studying.

I can't help but wonder what other games you like to play aside from this, ~player~. I have to imagine that a ~player.ifMale(man|woman)~ like you has at least some ideas for more... intimate entertainment.
